content: Ntawm nuav moog yog Yixayee cov tub tej npe kws nyag coj nyag tsev tuabneeg nrug Yakhauj tuaj nyob huv Iyi tebchaws,
yog Lunpee, Xime‑oo, Levi hab Yuta,
Ixakha, Xenpuloo hab Npeeyamee,
Ntaaj hab Nathali, Kas hab Asaw.
Yakhauj cov tub ki huvsw muaj xyaa caum  leej. Yauxej tes yeej nyob huv Iyi tebchaws lawm.
Lug rua tom qaab Yauxej hab nwg cov kwvtij suavdawg hab tej tuabneeg kws nyob tam hov puavleej tuag taag lawm.
Yixayee caaj ceg muaj tub ki coob hab fuam vaam coob heev. Puab fuam vaam coob hab muaj zug heev nyob moog puv nkaus lub tebchaws.
Muaj ib tug vaajntxwv tshab kws tsw paub Yauxej sawv lug kaav Iyi tebchaws.
Vaajntxwv has rua nwg cov pejxeem tas, “Saib maj, cov tuabneeg Yixayee coob dhau hab muaj zug dhau peb hwv lawm.
Peb ca le ntaus tswvyim txuv cov tuabneeg nuav, tsaam tes puab fuam vaam coob hab yog muaj kev ua rog puab yuav tuaj yeeb ncuab tog ua rog rua peb hab tswv dim huv lub tebchaws moog.”
Yog le nuav puab txhad tsaa ib co num tswv lug saib yuam cov Yixayee ua num nyaav. Cov Yixayee txhad ua tej moos kws khaws hov txhua chaw ca rua Falau, yog lub moos Pithoo hab lub moos Lamexe.
Puab yimfuab raug quab yuam heev, puab yimfuab fuam vaam coob nyob nthuav daav quas zug. Cov Iyi txhad ntshai cov Yixayee heev.
Puab txhad ua nruj ua tswv yuam cov Yixayee ua num khwv.

Puab ua rua cov Yixayee ab sab kawg vem tej num khwv heev, yog ua moov swb hab thwv cib hab ua txhua yaam num huv tej laj teb. Txhua yaam kws cov Yixayee ua mas cov Iyi ua nruj ua tswv yuam ua num khwv.
Iyi tug vaajntxwv has rua ob tug quaspuj kws paab cov Henplais yug mivnyuas, ib tug hu ua Sifa ib tug hu ua Pu‑a, has tas,
“Thaus meb moog paab cov Henplais tej quaspuj yug mivnyuas, hab pum puab nyob tsawg sau txaaj yug mivnyuas, yog yug tau nyuas tub tes muab tua pov tseg, yog nyuas ntxhais tes le tseg ca nyob.”
Tassws ob tug puj kws paab yug mivnyuas hov paub ntshai Vaajtswv txhad tsw ua lawv le vaajntxwv Iyi has, cov tub los kuj ca dim txujsa.
Vaajntxwv Iyi txhad hu ob tug puj hov tuaj hab has tas, “Ua caag meb ua le nuav es tseed ca cov tub caj sa nyob hab?”
Ob tug puj hov teb Falau tas, “Vem yog cov quaspuj Henplais tsw thooj le cov quaspuj Iyi, puab muaj muaj zug, tug kws paab tsw tau moog txug tub yug tau lawm.”
Vaajtswv ua zoo rua ob tug puj kws paab yug mivnyuas hov. Cov Yixayee txhad le fuam vaam coob hab muaj zug heev.
Vem ob tug quaspuj kws paab yug mivnyuas paub ntshai Vaajtswv, mas Vaajtswv txhad pub ob tug muaj mivnyuas.
Falau txhad has rua nwg cov pejxeem suavdawg tas, “Txhua tug tub kws cov Henplais yug mej yuav tsum muab laim pov tseg rua huv tug dej Nai, tseg txhua tug ntxhais caj sa nyob xwb.”
Muaj ib tug tub xeem Levi, nwg yuav ib tug ntxhais xeem Levi ua quaspuj.
Tug quaspuj hov xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub. Thaus nwg pum tas tug tub zoo nraug heev nwg txhad muab zais tau peb lub hlis.
Thaus nwg muab zais tsw tau ntxwv lawm, nwg txhad muab ib lub tawb pawj a luam roj aav hab roj ntoo. Nwg muab tug mivnyuas tso rua huv tawb coj moog tso rua huv plawv cov lojkov ntawm ntug dej.
Mas tug muam hlub sawv deb tsawv saib txhad paub tas yuav muaj le caag tshwm rua nwg.

Mas Falau tug ntxhais nqeg moog daa dej hab nwg cov nkauj qhev moog ua sw ntawm ntug dej. Falau tug ntxhais pum lub tawb nyob huv plawv cov lojkov txhad khaiv nwg tug nkauj qhev moog muab lub tawb lug.
Thaus nwg qheb lub tawb saib mas nwg pum ib tug mivnyuas, na cav tug mivnyuas saamswm quaj. Tes nwg txawm khuvleej tug mivnyuas hov hab has tas, “Nuav yog cov tuabneeg Henplais le mivnyuas.”
Tug mivnyuas hov tug muam txhad le has rua Falau tug ntxhais tas, “Koj puas xaav ca kuv moog hu ib tug quaspuj huv cov tuabneeg Henplais tuaj tu tug mivnyuas nuav rua koj?”
Falau tug ntxhais txhad has tas, “Ca le moog.” Tug muam hov txhad le moog hu tug mivnyuas hov leej nam tuaj.
Mas Falau tug ntxhais txhad has rua tug quaspuj hov tas, “Koj coj tug mivnyuas nuav moog tu rua kuv, mas kuv yuav muab nqe zug rua koj.” Tug puj hov txawm coj tug mivnyuas moog tu lawm.

Thaus tug mivnyuas hlub lawd, nwg txhad coj tug mivnyuas tuaj rua Falau tug ntxhais, mas tug mivnyuas hov ua Falau tug ntxhais le tub. Nwg muab tis npe hu ua Mauxe  tsua qhov nwg has tas, “Vem yog kuv rhu nwg tawm huv dej lug.”
Thaus Mauxe hlub lawm, muaj ib nub Mauxe moog saib nwg haiv tuabneeg mas pum puab ua num nyaav heev. Nwg pum ib tug Iyi saamswm muab ib tug Henplais ntaus, yog nwg haiv tuabneeg ntaag.
Nwg saib ncig pis leeg mas tsw pum leejtwg, nwg txhad muab tug Iyi hov tua kag, hab muab zais rua huv cov xuab zeb.
Nub tom qaab, thaus Mauxe tawm moog, kuj pum ob tug Henplais sws ntaus hab, nwg txhad has rua tug kws ua txhum tas, “Ua caag koj ntaus koj haiv tuabneeg?”

Nwg teb tas, “Leejtwg tsaa koj ua thawj kaav peb hab ua tug kws txav txem rua peb? Koj npaaj sab yuav tua kuv ib yaam le koj tua tug Iyi hab lov?” Mauxe txawm ntshai xaav tas, “Zaaj hov tub nchaa moog thoob lawm lauj.”
Thaus Falau nov txug zaaj hov, nwg nrhav kev muab Mauxe tua pov tseg. Tassws Mauxe tswv ntawm Falau moog nyob rua huv Mintee tebchaws lawm. Nwg moog nyob tsawg ntawm ib lub qhov dej.
Cov Mintee tug pov thawj muaj xyaa leej ntxhais. Cov ntxhais hov tuaj ntaus dej laub rua huv lub daab rua leej txwv tej yaaj tej tshws haus.
Tes txawm muaj ib co txwvneej yug yaaj yug tshws lug lawv cov ntxhais hov tswv moog. Mas Mauxe sawv tseeg paab cov ntxhais hab ntaus dej rua puab tej yaaj tej tshws haus.
Thaus puab rov moog txug Le‑u‑ee  kws yog puab txwv, mas leej txwv nug tas, “Ua caag nub nua mej lug tau ntxuv?”
Puab teb tas, “Muaj ib tug tuabneeg Iyi paab peb dim huv cov tuabneeg yug yaaj txhais teg hab tseed ntaus dej rua peb tej yaaj tej tshws haus.”
Leejtxwv has rua puab tas, “Tug yawm hov nyob hovtwg? Ua caag mej muab nwg tso tseg? Ca le moog hu nwg lug noj mov maj.”
Mauxe kuj txaus sab nrug nwg nyob, mas Le‑u‑ee muab tug ntxhais Xipaula qua rua Mauxe.
Xipaula yug tau ib tug tub mas Mauxe muab tis npe hu ua Kawsoo,  tsua qhov nwg has tas, “Kuv yog ib tug kws ua qhua nyob rua huv luas tebchaws.”

Dhau ntau xyoo lug rua yaav tom qaab, vaajntxwv Iyi tuag lawm. Cov Yixayee quaj ntsaaj quas lawg huv txujkev ua qhev, txhad le quaj hu thov kev paab. Puab lub suab quaj kws raug ua qhev nuav txhad nrov moog txug Vaajtswv.
Vaajtswv nov puab lub suab quaj ntsaaj, hab nwg ncu txug tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj.
Vaajtswv saib ntsoov cov Yixayee hab paub puab lub neej zoo le caag.

Mauxe yug nwg yawm txwv Yethoo kws yog cov Mintee tug pov thawj tej yaaj tej tshws. Nwg coj nwg tej yaaj tej tshws moog rua tebchaws moj saab qhua saab nub poob moog txug lub roob Haule, kws yog Vaajtswv lub roob.
Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj lug tshwm huv cov nplaim tawg kws cig huv ib tsob nyuas ntoo rua Mauxe pum. Mauxe saib mas pum tsob nyuas ntoo cig quas plawg kuas tsw kub nyab le.
Mauxe txhad has tas, “Kuv yuav moog saib yaam kws phemfwj nuav saib yog ua caag tsob ntoo tsw kub nyab le.”
Thaus Yawmsaub pum nwg txaav lug saib, Vaajtswv txawm hu huv tsob ntoo tuaj tas, “Mauxe, Mauxe 'e.” Mauxe teb tas, “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav 'os.”
Vaajtswv txhad has tas, “Tsw xob nkaag lug ze. Hle koj nkawm khau tseg vem tas qhov chaw kws koj sawv nuav yog lub chaw dawb huv.”

Hab Vaajtswv has rua nwg tas, “Kuv yog koj txwv tug Vaajtswv, yog Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv, yog Yiha tug Vaajtswv hab yog Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.” Mauxe pus nkaus lub plhu vem yog nwg ntshai tsw kaav saib Vaajtswv.

Yawmsaub txawm has tas, “Kuv tub pum kuv haiv tuabneeg kws nyob huv Iyi tebchaws txujkev txom nyem lwj sab lawm hab tub nov puab lub suab quaj lawm vem yog raug cov kws saib puab quab yuam ua num nyaav. Kuv paub puab tej kev txom nyem.

Kuv nqeg lug yuav cawm puab dim huv cov Iyi txhais teg hab coj puab tawm huv lub tebchaws hov moog rua lub tebchaws kws zoo hab daav, yog lub tebchaws kws muaj kua mig hab zwb ntaab ndwg ndo, yog moog rua lub chaw kws cov Khana‑aa, cov Hithai, cov Amaulai, cov Pelixai, cov Hivai hab cov Yenpu nyob.
Nwgnuav cov Yixayee lub suab quaj tuaj txug kuv lawm, hab kuv tub pum qhov kws cov Iyi quab yuam puab lawm.
Mas nwgnuav kuv yuav khaiv koj moog cuag Falau sub koj txhad coj tau kuv haiv tuabneeg kws yog Yixayee cov tub ki tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog.”
Tassws Mauxe has rua Vaajtswv tas, “Kuv yog leejtwg es yuav moog cuag tau Falau hab coj cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog?”

Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv yuav nrug nraim koj. Nuav yog tug txujci tseem ceeb kws qha rua koj paub tas kuv khaiv koj moog, yog thaus koj coj cov pejxeem tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog lawm mej yuav lug pe Vaajtswv sau lub roob nuav.”

Tassws Mauxe has rua Vaajtswv tas, “Yog kuv moog cuag cov Yixayee hab has rua puab tas, ‘Mej tej laug tug Vaajtswv khaiv kuv lug cuag mej,’ hab puab nug kuv tas, ‘Nwg lub npe hu le caag?’ mas kuv yuav teb puab le caag?”
Vaajtswv has rua Mauxe tas, “KUV YEEJ YOG KUV.”  Hab nwg has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘KUV YOG, yog tug kws khaiv kuv lug cuag mej.’ ”

Vaajtswv has dua rua Mauxe tas, “Koj ca le has rua cov Yixayee le nuav tas, ‘Yawmsaub  kws yog mej tej laug tug Vaajtswv, yog Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv, yog Yiha tug Vaajtswv hab yog Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv khaiv kuv lug cuag mej.’ Nuav yog kuv lub npe moog ib txhws, mas txhua tam tuabneeg yuav tsum ncu hu le nuav moog.

Koj ca le moog hu Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug tuaj sablaaj ua ke, hab has rua puab tas, ‘Yawmsaub, kws yog mej tej laug tug Vaajtswv, yog Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv tau tshwm rua kuv pum hab has tas, Kuv saib ntsoov mej hab pum tej kws mej raug huv Iyi tebchaws lawm.

Kuv cog lug tseg tas kuv yuav coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws kws mej raug kev txom nyem lwj sab moog rua huv cov Khana‑aa, cov Hithai, cov Amaulai, cov Pelixai, cov Hivai, hab cov Yenpu lub tebchaws kws muaj kua mig hab zwb ntaab ndwg ndo.’

Puab yuav noog koj tej lug, mas koj hab Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug yuav moog cuag vaajntxwv Iyi hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Yawmsaub kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv tau ntswb peb, mas nwgnuav peb thov koj tso peb moog huv tebchaws moj saab qhua peb nub ke sub peb txhad tau moog xyeem tsaj rua Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv.’
Kuv yeej paub tas vaajntxwv Iyi yuav tsw kheev mej moog yog nwg tsw raug tug kws muaj fwjchim txhais teg yuam nwg.
Kuv yuav tsaa kuv txhais teg ua txhua yaam txujci phemfwj tshwm lug ntaus Iyi tebchaws. Dhau ntawd Falau yuav tso mej moog.
Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Iyi hlub kuv haiv tuabneeg nuav mas thaus mej tawm moog mej yuav tsw moog teg dawb teg nplag.

Txhua tug quaspuj yuav thov npauj nyag npauj kub hab tej tsoog tsho ntawm cov Iyi kws nrug puab nyob ua ib zog hab ntawm tej quaspuj kws nrug puab nyob ua ib tse, coj tej nuav moog rua mej tej tub tej ntxhais naav. Ua le nuav mej txhad lws tau cov Iyi tej hov txhua chaw.”
Mauxe teb tas, “Ntshai puab yuav tsw ntseeg kuv hab tsw quav ntsej tej kws kuv has, tsua qhov puab yuav has tas, ‘Yawmsaub tsw tau tshwm rua koj pum le.’ ”
Yawmsaub txawm has rua nwg tas, “Daabtsw nyob huv koj txhais teg?” Mauxe teb tas, “Ib tug paas nreg.”
Yawmsaub has tas, “Ca le muab nrum rua huv peg teb nawj.” Nwg txhad muab nrum rua huv peg teb, tug paas nreg hov txawm txa hlo ua ib tug naab, Mauxe txawm tig loo tswv tug naab.
Tassws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le cev teg ntsab naab tug kwtwv.” Mauxe txhad cev teg ntsab nkaus tug kwtwv txawm txa hlo ua tug paas nreg rua huv nwg txhais teg lawm.
“Ua le nuav puab txhad ntseeg tas Yawmsaub kws yog puab tej laug tug Vaajtswv, yog Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv hab Yiha tug Vaajtswv hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv tshwm rua koj pum lawm tag.”

Yawmsaub has dua rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le muab koj txhais teg ntxwg rua huv koj hauv sab.” Nwg txhad muab txhais teg ntxwg rua huv hauv sab. Thaus rhu txhais teg lug ua cav nwg txhais teg mob ruas dawb paug le daus xwb daus npu.

Yawmsaub has tas, “Ca le muab txhais teg ntxwg rov rua huv hauv sab dua ib zag.” Nwg kuj muab nwg txhais teg ntxwg rua huv hauv sab dua. Thaus nwg rhu teg lug ua cav txhais teg tub rov zoo hlo le nwg lub cev huvsw.
Yawmsaub has tas, “Yog puab tsw ntseeg koj hab tsw quav ntsej tug txujci tseem ceeb zag ib, nyab puab yuav ntseeg tug txujci tseem ceeb zag ob.

Yog puab tseed tsw ntseeg ob zag txujci tseem ceeb nuav hab tsw quav ntsej koj tej lug, ca le nqaa dej huv tug dej Nai ib qho lug laub rua sau npoo aav qhuav. Mas cov dej kws koj nqaa huv tug dej Nai lug yuav txa ua ntshaav rua sau npoo aav qhuav hov.”

Tassws Mauxe has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Au tug Tswv, kuv ib txwm yeej tsw txawj has lug tsw has yaav thau u los yog, taamswm nuav kws koj has lug rua kuv kws yog koj tug qhev los yog, kuv yog ib tug kws ncauj zum has tsw tau nplag.”

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Leejtwg tswm tuabneeg lub qhov ncauj? Leejtwg ua rua tuabneeg has tsw tau lug hab ua rua laag ntseg, hab ua rua pum kev hab ua rua dig muag? Kuv kws yog Yawmsaub ua los tsw yog?
Yog le nuav ca le moog, kuv yuav nyob ntawm koj qhov ncauj hab kuv yuav qha lug rua koj has.”
Tassws Mauxe has tas, “Au tug Tswv, thov khaiv dua lwm tug moog lauj!”

Mas Yawmsaub npau tawg rua Mauxe hab has tas, “Koj tug tijlaug kws yog xeem Levi nev? Kuv paub tas nwg txawj has lug. Saib maj nwg saamswm taug kev tuaj ntswb koj. Thaus nwg pum koj nwg yuav zoo sab heev.
Koj yuav pav rua nwg muab lug rua nwg has. Kuv yuav nyob ntawm koj qhov ncauj hab ntawm nwg qhov ncauj, hab kuv yuav qhuab qha rua meb ob leeg paub tas yuav ua le caag.
Nwg yuav nyob koj chaw has rua cov pejxeem, nwg yuav ua koj lub qhov ncauj hab koj yuav ua zoo le Vaajtswv rua nwg.
Koj yuav tuav rawv tug paas nreg nuav swv ua txujci tseem ceeb.”

Mauxe txhad rov moog cuag nwg yawm txwv Yethoo hab has tas, “Thov ca kuv rov qaab moog saib kuv cov kwvtij huv Iyi tebchaws saib puab tseed muaj txujsa nyob los tsw muaj.” Yethoo has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le moog zoo nawj.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe huv Mintee tebchaws tas, “Ca le rov moog nraag Iyi tebchaws, tsua qhov cov tuabneeg kws nrhav txuv koj txujsa suavdawg tub tuag taag lawm.”
Mauxe txhad muab nwg quaspuj hab cov tub caij neeg luav rov qaab moog nraag Iyi tebchaws. Mauxe tuav rawv Vaajtswv tug paas nreg huv nwg txhais teg moog hab.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Thaus koj rov moog txug Iyi tebchaws, koj yuav tsum ua tuab zoo ua tej txujci tseem ceeb huvsw kws kuv muab cob rua koj lawm taab meeg Falau. Tassws kuv yuav ua rua Falau lub sab tawv, nwg yuav tsw kheev tso kuv cov tuabneeg moog.
Hab koj yuav has rua Falau tas, ‘Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Yixayee yog kuv tug tub hlub.
Kuv has rua koj tas, “Ca le tso kuv tug tub moog sub nwg txhad tau kev pe hawm kuv.” Tassws koj tsw yeem tso nwg moog, kuv txhad yuav muab koj tug tub hlub tua pov tseg.’ ”
Thaus Mauxe puab su ntawm ib ntog kev Yawmsaub lug ntswb Mauxe yuav muab nwg tua pov tseg.
Mas Xipaula muab zeb hauv swm lug hlais nwg tug tub daim tawv noov mas coj moog ntsuav Mauxe txhais kwtaw, hab has tas, “Koj yog tug nraug vauv ntshaav rua kuv tag tag le lawm.”
Mas Vaajtswv txhad tsw tua nwg. Tug quaspuj tau has tas “Koj yog tug nraug vauv ntshaav” yog tim qhov kws ua kevcai txav.
Yawmsaub has rua Aloo tas, “Ca le moog ntswb Mauxe tom tebchaws moj saab qhua.” Aloo txawm moog mas ntswb Mauxe ntawm Vaajtswv lub roob hab nwj nwg.
Mauxe txhad pav tej lug kws Yawmsaub has hab khaiv nwg moog huvsw rua Aloo noog hab has txug tej txujci tseem ceeb huvsw kws Yawmsaub kuas nwg ua.
Mauxe hab Aloo txawm moog hu Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug suavdawg tuaj sablaaj ua ke.
Aloo txhad has tej lug kws Yawmsaub tau has rua Mauxe lawm huvsw rua cov pejxeem noog, hab Mauxe ua tej txujci tseem ceeb taab meeg rua puab saib.
Cov pejxeem kuj ntseeg. Thaus puab nov tas Yawmsaub lug saib cov Yixayee hab pum puab tej kev txom nyem lwj sab lawm, puab kuj nyo hau pe hawm Yawmsaub.

Dhau ntawd Mauxe hab Aloo moog cuag Falau hab has tas, “Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv has le nuav tas, ‘Ca le tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog sub puab txhad tau moog ua kevcai noj haus pe kuv huv tebchaws moj saab qhua.’ ”
Tassws Falau has tas, “Tug Yawmsaub hov yog leejtwg es kuv yuav tsum noog nwg lug hab tso cov Yixayee moog? Kuv tsw paub Yawmsaub, hab kuv yeej yuav tsw tso cov Yixayee moog hlo le.”

Ob tug txawm has tas, “Cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv lug ntswb ib lawm. Thov ca peb moog rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua peb nub ke sub txhad tau tua tsaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv. Yog tsw ua le ntawd Vaajtswv yuav tso mob kis lossws nav ntaaj nav rag lug raug peb.”
Iyi tug vaajntxwv has rua ob tug tas, “Mauxe hab Aloo, ua caag meb yuav ua rua cov pejxeem tso puab tej daag num tseg? Mej ca le rov qaab moog ua mej tej num los maj.”
Falau has dua tas, “Saib maj, nwgnuav cov pejxeem huv lub tebchaws coob heev mas meb yuav ua rua puab tso puab tej num tseg.”
Mas nub hov Falau has tawv rua cov num tswv kws saib cov qhev hab has rua cov thawj coj ua num tas,
“Txwj nub nua moog mej tsw xob pub tej quav nyaab rua cov tuabneeg ua thwv cib yaam le yaav taag lug lawm. Ca puab moog khaws puab quav nyaab.
Tassws cov thwv cib mas yuav tsum kuas puab ua tau npaum le qub, tsw tseev kuas ua tau tsawg hlo le. Vem puab cis nkeeg, puab txhad quaj has tas, ‘Thov ca peb moog xyeem tsaj rua peb tug Vaajtswv.’
Mej ca le yuam kuas puab ua num nyaav dua qub sub puab txhad ua num khwv hab tsw quav ntsej tej lug daag ntawd.”
Cov num tswv kws saib cov qhev hab cov thawj coj ua num kuj moog has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Falau has le nuav tas, ‘Kuv yuav tsw pub quav nyaab rua mej lawm.
Mej moog khaws mej quav nyaab lawv le kws nrhav tau. Tassws mej tej num yuav tsw tseev kuas ua tau tsawg hlo le.’ ”
Cov pejxeem txhad moog rw quas sua thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws khaws tej hauv paug quav nyaab.
Cov num tswv kws saib cov qhev kuj txhwb has tas “Mej yuav tsum ua kuas ib nub tau npaum le kws teem ca yaam le thaus tseed muaj quav nyaab.”

Yixayee cov thawj coj ua num kws Falau cov num tswv kws saib cov qhev tau tsaa lug saib puab hov, kuj raug nplawm hab raug nug tas, “Ua caag nub nua mej ua tsw tau thwv cib npaum le kws teem ca yaam le yaav taag lug?”
Yixayee cov thawj kws coj ua num txhad tuaj quaj rua Falau tas, “Ua caag koj ua le nuav rua peb kws yog koj cov qhev?
Puab tsw pub quav nyaab rua peb kws yog koj cov qhev, tassws puab tseed has tas, ‘Ua thwv cib los maj.’ Saib maj, peb kws yog koj cov qhev raug nplawm yog tim koj cov tub teg tub taw ua txhum.”
Falau has tas, “Mej cis nkeeg, cis nkeeg tag tag le, mej txhad has tas, ‘Ca peb moog xyeem tsaj rua Yawmsaub.’
Mej ca le moog ua num taamswm nuav. Yuav tsw pub quav nyaab rua mej le lawm, tassws mej tseed yuav tsum ua kuas tau thwv cib npaum nkaus le qub.”
Yixayee cov thawj coj ua num txhad pum tas puab raug ceblaaj lawm tsua qhov luas has tas, “Tsw tseev ib nub ntawd mej ua tau thwv cib tsawg dua le teem tseg.”
Thaus puab tawm huv Falau lug puab ntswb Mauxe hab Aloo tseed tog puab.

Puab has rua ob tug tas, “Thov Yawmsaub tshuaj saib meb hab txav txem rua meb, vem yog meb ua rua peb raug Falau hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw ntxub heev hab meb muab ntaaj muab rag rua huv puab txhais teg tua peb ntaag.”
Mauxe txawm rov moog cuag Yawmsaub has tas, “Au tug Tswv, ua caag koj coj kev ceblaaj lug rua haiv tuabneeg nuav? Ua caag koj khaiv kuv lug?
Txwj thaus kuv moog cuag Falau hab tuav koj lub npe has rua nwg, Falau ua nruj ua tswv rua haiv tuabneeg nuav, hab koj tub tsw cawm koj haiv tuabneeg dim le.”

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Nwgnuav koj yuav pum tej kws kuv yuav ua rua Falau. Vem kuv txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim Falau yuav tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog, yog kuv txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim ntaag mas nwg yuav ntab puab tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws moog.”
Vaajtswv has dua rua Mauxe tas, “Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
Kuv lug tshwm rua Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj huv lub npe kws hu tas Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus  tassws tsw tau qha puab paub kuv huv lub npe kws yog Yawmsaub
Dua ib qho kuv cog lug ruaj khov rua puab tas kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws Khana‑aa rua puab, yog lub tebchaws kws puab txeev ua qhua nyob huv.
Tsw taag le ntawd, kuv tau nov cov Yixayee kws cov Iyi muab yuam ua qhev lub suab ntsaaj quas lawg lawm hab kuv ncu txug kuv tej lug cog tseg.

Vem le nuav ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Kuv yog Yawmsaub, kuv yuav coj mej tawm huv tej num nyaav kws cov Iyi yuam mej ua hab kuv yuav cawm mej dim qhov kws ua puab qhev, hab kuv yuav tsaa hlo kuv txhais teg hab txav txem luj kawg txhwv mej dim.
Kuv yuav txais mej ua kuv haiv tuabneeg hab kuv yuav ua mej tug Vaajtswv, mas mej yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej dim huv tej num nyaav kws cov Iyi yuam mej ua.
Kuv yuav coj mej moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv tau cog lug ruaj khov tas kuv yuav muab rua Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj. Kuv yuav muab rua mej ua mej teej mej tug. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.’ ”
Mauxe txhad coj tej lug nuav moog pav rua cov Yixayee noog, tassws puab tsw noog Mauxe vem puab sab ntsws puag taag hab raug yuam ua qhev txom nyem kawg le.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le nkaag moog has rua Iyi tug vaajntxwv Falau kuas nwg tso cov Yixayee tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws moog.”
Tassws Mauxe has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Cov Yixayee los kuj tsw noog kuv has, Falau yuav noog kuv le caag? Kuv has lug tsw nplag hlo le.”
Yawmsaub txhad has rua Mauxe hab Aloo kuas has rua cov Yixayee hab Iyi tug vaajntxwv Falau tas yog Yawmsaub has kuas ob tug coj cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog.
Ntawm nuav moog yog has txug cov thawj huv txhua xeem Yixayee. Yixayee tug tub hlub Lunpee cov tub yog Hanau, Palu, Hexaloo hab Khami. Cov nuav yog xeem Lunpee cov quas cum.
Xime‑oo cov tub yog Yemu‑ee, Yami, Auha, Yakhi, Xauha, hab Sa‑u kws yog tug puj Khana‑aa yug. Cov nuav yog xeem Xime‑oo cov quas cum.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Levi cov tub ki tej npe lawv le kws tub muab sau ca lawm, yog Kwsoo, Khauha hab Melali. Levi noob nyoog muaj ib puas peb caug xyaa xyoo le tuag.
Kwsoo cov tub yog Lini hab Sime‑i. Ob tug hov yog puab ob cum hov lub hauv paug.
Khauha cov tub yog Alaav, Ixaha, Heploo hab Uxi‑ee. Khauha noob nyoog muaj ib puas peb caug peb xyoo le tuag.
Melali cov tub yog Mali hab Musi. Cov nuav yog xeem Levi cov quas cum lawv le tub muab sau ca lawm.
Alaav yuav nwg txwv tug muam Yaukhenpe ua quaspuj mas yug tau Aloo hab Mauxe. Alaav noob nyoog muaj ib puas peb caug xyaa xyoo le tuag.
Ixaha cov tub yog Khaula, Nefe hab Xikhi.
Uxi‑ee cov tub yog Misa‑ee, Eexafaa hab Xithi.
Aloo yuav Aminanta tug ntxhais Elisenpa kws yog Nasoo tug muam ua quaspuj, mas Elisenpa yug tau Nanta, Anpihu, Ele‑axa hab Ithama.
Khaula cov tub yog Axi, Eekhana hab Anpiyaxa. Cov nuav yog Khaula cov quas cum.
Aloo tug tub Ele‑axa yuav Puti‑ee ib tug ntxhais ua quaspuj mas yug tau Fineha. Cov tuabneeg nuav yog xeem Levi cov quas cum le thawj.
Aloo hab Mauxe ob tug nuav ntaag yog ob tug kws Yawmsaub has tas, “Meb ca le coj cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog lawv le puab tej paab tej pawg.”
Ob tug nuav yog ob tug kws thov Iyi tug vaajntxwv Falau txug qhov kws coj cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws, yog tug Mauxe nuav hab tug Aloo nuav ntaag.
Nub kws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe huv Iyi tebchaws hov,
Yawmsaub has rua nwg tas, “Kuv yog Yawmsaub. Koj ca le has txhua yaam kws kuv qha koj rua Iyi tug vaajntxwv Falau noog.”
Tassws Mauxe has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Kuv yeej has lug tsw nplag, Falau yuav ua caag noog kuv has?”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ua le nuav nawj, kuv tsaa koj ua zoo le Vaajtswv rua Falau, mas koj tug tijlaug Aloo yuav ua tug kws cev koj le lug.
Koj yuav tsum has tej lug huvsw kws kuv has rua koj mas koj tug tijlaug Aloo yuav has rua Falau kuas nwg tso cov Yixayee tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws moog.
Tassws kuv yuav ua rua Falau lub sab tawv. Txawm yog kuv ua kuv tej txujci tseem ceeb hab txujci phemfwj tshwm rua huv Iyi tebchaws ntau zuj zug,

los Falau yuav tsw noog meb has. Mas kuv yuav tsaa kuv txhais teg ntaus Iyi tebchaws hab rau txem nyaav txhad coj tau kuv cov tuabneeg Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog lawv le puab tej paab tej pawg.
Cov Iyi yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub rua thaus kuv tsaa kuv txhais teg tawm tsaam Iyi tebchaws hab coj cov Yixayee tawm huv puab moog.”
Mauxe hab Aloo ua lawv le ntawd. Ob tug ua lawv nraim le kws Yawmsaub has.
Thaus ob tug moog has rua Falau, Mauxe noob nyoog muaj yim caum xyoo, Aloo noob nyoog muaj yim caum peb xyoo.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas,
“Thaus Falau has rua meb tas, ‘Ca le ua txujci phemfwj rua kuv saib,’ mas koj ca le has rua Aloo tas, ‘Muab tug paas nreg nrum rua ntawm Falau xubndag,’ tug paas nreg yuav txa hlo ua ib tug naab.”

Mauxe hab Aloo txhad moog cuag Falau hab ua lawv nraim le Yawmsaub has. Aloo muab nwg tug paas nreg nrum nroog rua ntawm Falau hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw xubndag, mas tug paas nreg txa hlo ua ib tug naab.
Falau txawm hu cov kws txawj ntse hab cov kws txawj ua khawv koob yeeg swv tuaj. Puab yog Iyi cov kws txawj ua yeeg swv mas puab swv puab tej khawv koob ua tau zoo ib yaam le ntawd hab.
Thaus puab nyag taug nyag nrum paas nreg tes tej paas nreg hov kuj txa ua naab huvsw hab, tassws Aloo tug paas nreg muab puab cov paas nreg nqog taag huvsw lawm.
Txawm le ntawd los Falau lub sab tseed tawv, tsw yeem noog ob tug has, ib yaam le Yawmsaub has ca lawd.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Falau lub sab tawv, tsw kaam tso cov Yixayee moog.
Thaus sawv ntxuv koj ca le moog cuag Falau rua thaus nwg moog nraag tug dej. Koj moog sawv ntawm ntug dej tog nwg, tuav rawv tug paas nreg kws txa ua naab moog hab.

Koj yuav has rua nwg tas, ‘Yawmsaub kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv khaiv kuv tuaj cuag koj has tas, Ca le tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog sub puab txhad tau moog pe hawm kuv huv tebchaws moj saab qhua. Txug taav nuav koj kuj tsw noog has hlo le.

Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Koj yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub tsua qhov kws ua le nuav. Saib maj, kuv yuav xuas tug paas nreg kws nyob huv kuv txhais teg nplawm tug dej Nai, mas dej yuav txa ua ntshaav.
Tej ntseg huv tug dej Nai yuav tuag hab tug dej Nai yuav tsw lwj quas lawg hab cov Iyi yuav haus tsw taug tug dej ntawd.’ ”

Yawmsaub has dua rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le has rua Aloo tas, ‘Tuav koj tug paas nreg huv koj txhais teg tsaa rua sau tej dej huv Iyi tebchaws tsw has puab tej nam dej, tej kwj deg, tej paag dej, tej qhov dej huvsw mas tej dej yuav txa ua ntshaav. Yuav muaj ntshaav thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws tsw has huv tej thoob ntsug hab tej hub.’ ”
Mauxe hab Aloo kuj ua lawv nraim le kws Yawmsaub has. Nwg tsaa tug paas nreg nplawm tug dej Nai taab meeg Falau hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw, mas tej dej huv tug dej Nai txa ua ntshaav huvsw.
Tej ntseg huv tug dej Nai kuj tuag. Tug dej Nai tsw lwj quas lawg cov Iyi txhad haus tsw taug tug dej ntawd. Muaj ntshaav thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws.
Tassws Iyi cov kws txawj ua yeeg swv mas puab swv puab tej khawv koob ua tau ib yaam le ntawd hab. Tassws Falau lub sab tseed tawv, tsw yeem noog ob tug has, ib yaam le Yawmsaub has ca lawd.
Falau tig hlo rov qaab moog rua huv tsev, tsw khaws tej xwm txheej nuav ca rua huv lub sab.
Cov Iyi suavdawg txhad khawb qhov dej lawv ntug dej Nai nrhav dej haus, tsua qhov haus tsw taug tej dej huv tug dej Nai.
Suav txwj Yawmsaub nplawm tug dej Nai tau xyaa nub,
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le nkaag moog cuag Falau hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Ca le tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog sub puab txhad tau moog pe hawm kuv.
Tassws yog koj tsw kaam tso puab moog, kuv yuav tso qaav nce thoob plawg koj lub tebchaws ua rua koj raug txom nyem.

Qaav yuav puv nkaus tug dej Nai, hab yuav nce lug rua huv koj lub vaaj lub tsev, lug rua huv koj lub txaaj hab nce rua sau koj lub chaw pw, hab lug rua huv koj cov tub teg tub taw hab koj cov pejxeem tej tsev, hab lug rua huv koj tej qhov cub qhov txus hab lug rua huv koj tej phaaj zuaj ncuav.
Tej qaav yuav nce koj hab koj cov pejxeem hab koj cov tub teg tub taw lub cev huvsw.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Koj ca le has rua Aloo tas, ‘Tsaa koj txhais teg kws tuav tug paas nreg rua sau tej nam dej tej kwj deg tej paag dej ua kuas tej qaav nce lug rua sau Iyi tebchaws.’ ”
Aloo txawm tsaa hlo teg rua sau tej dej huv Iyi tebchaws, mas qaav txawm nce lug laum nkaus Iyi tebchaws.
Tassws cov kws txawj ua yeeg swv mas puab swv puab tej khawv koob ua kuas qaav nce lug rua sau Iyi tebchaws ib yaam nkaus hab.
Falau txawm hu Mauxe hab Aloo tuaj hab has tas, “Meb thov Yawmsaub coj tej qaav nuav tawm ntawm kuv hab kuv cov pejxeem moog, mas kuv yuav tso meb cov tuabneeg moog xyeem tsaj rua Yawmsaub.”

Mauxe txhad has rua Falau tas, “Nyob ntawm koj pum zoo teem rua lub swjhawm twg rua kuv thov Yawmsaub paab koj hab koj cov tub teg tub taw hab koj cov pejxeem kuas tej qaav nuav puam tsuaj taag ntawm koj hab koj tej vaaj tse, tsuas yog tseg cov kws nyob huv tug dej Nai xwb.”
Falau teb tas, “Ca pigkig.” Mauxe txhad has tas, “Yuav muaj lawv le koj has mas koj txhad paub tas tsw muaj ib tug twg zoo cuag le Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv.
Tej qaav yuav tswv ntawm koj hab koj tej vaaj tse hab koj cov tub teg tub taw hab koj cov pejxeem moog, tsuas yog tseg cov kws nyob huv tug dej Nai xwb.”
Mauxe hab Aloo txhad tawm ntawm Falau moog lawm. Mas Mauxe thov Yawmsaub txug tej qaav kws Yawmsaub tso lug rua Falau.
Yawmsaub ua lawv le Mauxe thov. Mas tej qaav txhad tuag taag rua huv tej vaaj tse hab tej tshaav puam hab tom tej laj teb.
Puab khaws tej qaav tuag hov ua tej nam pawg, mas lub tebchaws tsw lwj quas lawg.
Tassws thaus Falau pum tas tej kev txom nyem hov pluj lawm, nwg txawm ua lub sab tawv tsw kaam noog Mauxe hab Aloo has, ib yaam le Yawmsaub tub has ca lawd.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le has rua Aloo tas, ‘Tsaa hlo koj tug paas nreg nplawm moov aav kuas txa ua yoov qab thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws.’ ”

Ob tug kuj ua le ntawd. Aloo tsaa hlo nwg txhais teg xuas nwg tug paas nreg nplawm moov aav, tes txawm muaj yoov qab lug ntsauv tuabneeg hab tej tsaj txhu. Tej moov aav huvsw txa ua yoov qab thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws.
Cov kws txawj ua yeeg swv kuj swv puab tej khawv koob ua kuas muaj yoov qab tassws puab ua tsw tau. Yoov qab lug ntsauv tuabneeg hab tej tsaj txhu huvsw.
Cov kws txawj ua yeeg swv txhad has rua Falau tas, “Tej nuav yog Vaajtswv tug ntiv teg ua.” Tassws Falau lub sab tseed tawv tsw noog puab has, ib yaam le Yawmsaub tub has ca lawd.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le sawv ntxuv moog tog Falau rua thaus nwg moog nraag ntug dej mas has rua nwg tas, ‘Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Ca le tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog sub puab txhad tau moog pe hawm kuv.

Yog koj tsw tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog, mas kuv yuav tso tej paab yoov ntsuab lug ntsauv koj hab koj cov tub teg tub taw hab koj cov pejxeem, hab lug rua huv koj tej vaaj tse. Huv cov Iyi tej vaaj tse hab huv tej aav kws puab nyob yuav muaj tej paab yoov ntsuab puv nkaus.

Nub ntawd kuv yuav cais Kausee tebchaws kws kuv haiv tuabneeg nyob rua ib caag, tsw pub muaj tej paab yoov ntsuab rua huv, sub koj txhad paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub kws nyob huv plawv lub tebchaws nuav.
Kuv yuav cais kuv haiv tuabneeg hab koj cov tuabneeg. Qhov txujci phemfwj nuav yuav tshwm rua pigkig.’ ”

Yawmsaub kuj ua lawv le ntawd. Tes txawm muaj yoov ntsuab coob kawg lug rua huv Falau lub vaaj tse hab lug rua huv nwg cov tub teg tub taw tej vaaj tse ua rua muaj kev lamswm thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws.
Falau txawm hu Mauxe hab Aloo tuaj hab has tas, “Ca le moog tua tsaj xyeem rua meb tug Vaajtswv rua huv lub tebchaws nuav.”

Tassws Mauxe teb tas, “Ua tsw tau le ntawd, tsua qhov peb yuav muab tej tsaj kws cov Iyi caiv tua xyeem rua Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv. Yog peb tua tej tsaj xyeem taab meeg cov Iyi kws puab caiv tas yog yaam kws qas vuab tsuab, puab yuav tsw xuas pob zeb ntaus peb lov?
Peb yuav tsum moog rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua peb nub ke tua tsaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lawv le nwg has rua peb.”

Falau txhad has tas, “Kuv yuav tso mej moog sub mej txhad tau moog xyeem tsaj rua Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv huv tebchaws moj saab qhua, tassws tsw xob moog deb deb. Koj ca le thov Vaajtswv paab kuv.”

Mauxe txhad has tas, “Thaus kuv tawm ntawm koj moog lawd kuv yuav thov Yawmsaub ua rua tej yoov ntsuab tswv ntawm koj hab ntawm koj cov tub teg tub taw hab ntawm koj cov pejxeem moog rua pigkig. Tassws koj tsw xob ntxeev dua lug es tsw tso peb haiv tuabneeg moog xyeem tsaj rua Yawmsaub.”
Mauxe txawm tawm ntawm Falau moog lawm, nwg kuj thov Yawmsaub.
Yawmsaub ua lawv le Mauxe tej lug thov txhad ua rua tej yoov ntsuab tswv ntawm Falau hab ntawm nwg cov tub teg tub taw hab ntawm nwg cov pejxeem moog, tsw tshuav ib tug le.
Tassws zag nuav Falau tseed ua lub sab tawv hab, tsw kaam tso cov Yixayee moog.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le nkaag moog cuag Falau hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Yawmsaub kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv has le nuav tas, “Koj ca le tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog sub puab txhad tau moog pe hawm kuv.”
Tassws yog koj tsw kaam tso puab moog tseed taav puab ca,
mas Yawmsaub txhais teg yuav tso mob kis luj heev lug rua mej tej tsaj txhu huv tej tshaav zaub tsw has neeg neeg luav ntxhuav nyuj yaaj hab tshws huvsw.
Tassws Yawmsaub yuav cais cov Yixayee tej tsaj txhu hab cov Iyi tej tsaj txhu, mas cov Yixayee tej tsaj txhu yuav tsw tuag ib tug le.’ ”
Yawmsaub teem swjhawm ca has tas, “Pigkig Yawmsaub yuav ua tej nuav rua huv lub tebchaws.”
Mas nub tom qaab Yawmsaub txawm ua ntaag. Cov Iyi tej tsaj txhu tuag taag nrho huvsw, tassws cov Yixayee tej tsaj txhu tsw tuag ib tug le.
Falau txhad khaiv tuabneeg moog saib na cav cov Yixayee tej tsaj txhu tsw tuag ib tug le. Tassws Falau lub sab tseed tawv heev, tsw kaam tso cov Yixayee moog.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas, “Ca le tsuab ob peb taus teg tshauv huv qhov cub lug, ca Mauxe muab w rua sau nruab ntug taab meeg Falau.
Cov tshauv hov yuav txa ua moov aav yaa moog thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws, ua rua tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu mob rwj ua kav txhaab thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws.”
Ob tug txhad tsuab tshauv huv qhov cub moog sawv ntawm Falau xubndag. Mauxe txawm muab cov tshauv hov w rua sau nruab ntug, mas cov tshauv hov ua rua tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu mob rwj ua kav txhaab.
Cov kws txawj ua yeeg swv kuj nyob tsw taug ntawm Mauxe xubndag vem yog tim tej rwj, tsua qhov puab hab cov Iyi suavdawg mob rwj.
Tassws Yawmsaub ua rua Falau lub sab tawv, tsw noog ob tug has, ib yaam le Yawmsaub has ca rua Mauxe lawd.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le sawv ntxuv moog cuag Falau hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Yawmsaub kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv has le nuav tas, Ca le tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog sub puab txhad tau moog pe hawm kuv.

Mas zag nuav kuv yuav tso kuv tej xwm txheej phem huvsw lug raug koj hab koj cov tub teg tub taw hab koj cov pejxeem, sub koj txhad paub tas thoob plawg lub nplajteb tsw muaj ib tug twg yuav zoo cuag le kuv.
Yog kuv tsaa hlo teg ua rua koj hab koj cov pejxeem raug mob kis txhad ua rua mej pluj plag huv lub nplajteb, los kuv yeej ua tau.
Tassws qhov kws kuv tseed tseg koj txujsa ca kuj yog kuv yuav ua kuv tug fwjchim tshwm rua koj pum sub txhad tshaaj tawm kuv lub npe moog thoob nplajteb.
Koj tseed tsaab ua luj tawm tsaam kuv haiv tuabneeg hab tsw kaam tso puab moog.
Saib nawj, pigkig lub swjhawm nuav kuv yuav tso lawg lug hlub heev kawg. Txwj thaus rhawv Iyi tebchaws lug txug naj nub nwgnuav tsw tau muaj dua ib zag kws lawg hlub le nuav.

Vem le nuav ca le has kuas coj koj tej nyuj hab txhua yaam kws koj muaj tom tej tshaav zaub moog rua huv tej chaw nraim, tsua qhov lawg yuav lug ntaus txhua tug tuabneeg hab txhua tug tsaj txhu kws tseed nyob tom tshaav zaub es tsw lug rua huv tej chaw nraim kuas tuag taag huvsw.’ ”
Falau cov tub teg tub taw kws ntshai Yawmsaub tej lug txhad le kuas puab tej qhev hab puab tej tsaj txhu maaj lug nraim huv tsev.
Tassws cov kws tsw quav ntsej Yawmsaub tej lug tseed tso puab tej qhev hab puab tej tsaj txhu nyob huv tshaav zaub.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le tsaa teg rua sau ntuj, sub lawg txhad le poob lug thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws ntaus tej tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu hab ntaus tej txham laj txham xwm huv tej teb thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws.”

Mauxe txawm tsaa hlo nwg tug paas nreg rua sau ntuj. Tes Yawmsaub txawm ua rua xub nroo nrov ntwg hab lug lawg, hab nplaim tawg lab quas vog lug rua huv aav. Yawmsaub tso lawg lug rua huv Iyi tebchaws.
Muaj lawg hab nplaim tawg laim quas lag huv cov lawg hov tsw tu le. Lug lawg hlub heev thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws, txwj thaus muaj lub tebchaws lug tsw txeev muaj hlub le hov ib zag le.
Lawg ntaus txhua yaam kws nyob huv tej tshaav zaub thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws, tsw has tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu pam taag. Lawg ntaus tej zaub huvsw ntsoog taag hab ntaus tej xyoob ntoo luv taag huvsw.
Tsuas yog tshuav huv Kausee kws cov Yixayee nyob txhad tsw lug lawg xwb.
Falau txhad hu Mauxe hab Aloo tuaj hab has rua ob tug tas, “Zag nuav kuv ua txhum lawm tag. Yawmsaub yeej ua raug lawm, kuv hab kuv cov tuabneeg ua txhum.
Thov koj thov Yawmsaub lauj! Kuv dhuav xub nroo hab cov lawg nuav hwv lawm. Kuv yuav tso mej moog, tsw txug mej nyob nuav lawm.”
Mauxe has rua nwg tas, “Thaus kuv tawm huv lub nroog nuav lawm kuv yuav tsaa teg thov Yawmsaub. Mas xub yuav ntsag lawg yuav tu, sub koj txhad paub tas lub nplajteb yog Yawmsaub le.
Tassws kuv paub tas koj hab koj cov tub teg tub taw tseed tsw ntshai Vaajtswv Yawmsaub le hab.”
Maaj hab qeb raug lawg puam tsuaj taag, tsua qhov qeb saamswm txhawv hab maaj saamswm tawg paaj.
Tassws mog hab txhuv tsw raug puam tsuaj tsua qhov tseed tsw tau tuaj kaug.
Mauxe txawm tawm ntawm Falau huv lub nroog moog, nwg kuj tsaa hlo teg thov Yawmsaub. Xub txawm ntsag, lawg hab naag txawm tu tsw lug rua huv lub tebchaws lawm.
Tassws thaus Falau pum tas naag hab lawg tsw lug xub tsw nroo lawm, nwg hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw rov ua txhum dua hab ua lub sab tawv.
Falau lub sab tawv tsw kaam tso cov Yixayee moog ib yaam le Yawmsaub has ca rua Mauxe lawd.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le moog cuag Falau. Kuv ua Falau lub sab hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw lub sab tawv sub kuv txhad tau ua kuv tej txujci tseem ceeb nuav tshwm rua huv plawv puab,

mas koj txhad tau pav rua koj tej tub ki xeeb ntxwv noog txug qhov kws kuv tawb cov Iyi le caag hab noog txug tej txujci tseem ceeb kws kuv ua huv plawv puab, sub mej txhad paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.”

Mauxe hab Aloo nkaag moog cuag Falau hab has rua nwg tas, “Yawmsaub kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv has le nuav tas, ‘Koj yuav kwv tawv tsw txu koj tug fwjchim rua ntawm kuv moog ntev le caag? Ca le tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog sub puab txhad tau moog pe hawm kuv.
Yog koj tsw yeem tso kuv haiv tuabneeg moog, mas pigkig kuv yuav coj kooj ntaas lug rua huv koj lub tebchaws.
Tej kooj ntaas hov yuav laum nkaus lub tebchaws tsw pum aav le. Tej kws tshuav tsw raug lawg ntaus, kooj ntaas yuav muab noj, hab mej txhua tsob ntoo tom teb kooj yuav muab noj taag huvsw.

Kooj yuav lug puv nkaus koj tsev hab puv nkaus koj cov tub teg tub taw hab cov Iyi suavdawg tej tsev. Txwj thaus mej nam mej txwv mej puj mej yawm nyob lub tebchaws nuav lug txug naj nub nwgnuav puab tsw txeev pum dua le nuav hlo le.’ ” Tes Mauxe txawm tig hlo tawm ntawm Falau moog lawm.

Falau cov tub teg tub taw has rua Falau tas, “Tug yawm nuav yuav ua maab ua hlua cuab peb moog ntev le caag? Ca le tso cov tuabneeg hov moog pe hawm Yawmsaub kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv los maj. Koj tseed tsw paub tas Iyi tebchaws puam tsuaj taag lawm lov?”
Mauxe hab Aloo txhad raug coj tuaj cuag Falau dua, mas Falau has rua ob tug tas, “Ca le moog pe hawm Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv. Tassws leejtwg yuav moog hab?”
Mauxe teb tas, “Peb yuav moog taag nrho cov laug cov hluas, peb yuav coj peb tej tub tej ntxhais hab peb tej yaaj tej tshws tej nyuj moog, tsua qhov peb yuav ua kevcai noj haus xyeem rua Yawmsaub.”
Falau has rua ob tug tas, “Yog kuv kheev tso mej hab mej cov mivnyuas moog, kuj ca Yawmsaub nrug nraim mej lauj! Mej tuav huv ua phem xwb.
Kuv tsw kheev. Ca cov txwvneej moog pe hawm Yawmsaub xwb, tsua qhov mej yeej xaav ua le ntawd.” Tes Falau txawm muab ob tug ntab tawm ntawm nwg moog lawm.

Yawmsaub txawm has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le tsaa koj txhais teg rua sau Iyi tebchaws sub tej kooj ntaas txhad nqeg lug rua huv Iyi tebchaws hab noj tej zaub tej nroj tsuag huvsw kws tseed tshuav tsw raug lawg ntaus.”

Mauxe txhad tsaa tug paas nreg rua sau Iyi tebchaws mas Yawmsaub ua kuas cua ntsawj saab nub tuaj lug rua lub tebchaws ib nub ib mos mas taagkig sawv ntxuv cua saab nub tuaj ntsawj tau tej kooj ntaas tuaj lawm.
Kooj ntaas nqeg lug puv nkaus Iyi tebchaws, tsaws thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws. Yaav thau tsw txeev muaj tej paab kooj ntaas coob npaum le zag nuav, hab yuav tsw muaj dua le lawm.

Kooj laum nkaus lub tebchaws huvsw tsaus quas nti. Kooj noj tej zaub nroj tsuag hab tej txwv ntoo huvsw kws lawg ntaus tsw taag. Tsw tshuav ib daim nplooj ntsuab hlo le tsw has nplooj ntoo nplooj zaub huv tej laj teb thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws.
Falau maaj nroog hu Mauxe hab Aloo tuaj hab has tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum rua Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv hab meb ob leeg lawm.
Nwgnuav thov koj zaam txem rua kuv ib zag hab, hab thov Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab txujkev tuag nuav rhu moog.”
Mauxe tawm ntawm Falau moog hab thov Yawmsaub.
Yawmsaub txhad ua cua ntsawj hlub hlub saab nub poob tuaj yaws hlo cov kooj hov moog rua huv Havtxwv Lab,  tsw tshuav ib tug nyob huv Iyi tebchaws hlo le.
Tassws Yawmsaub tseed ua rua Falau lub sab tawv, Falau tsw kaam tso cov Yixayee moog.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le tsaa koj txhais teg rua sau ntuj sub txhad tsaus ntuj nti thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws, yuav tsaus tsaus xuas teg kov tau qhov tsaus ntawd.”
Mauxe txhad tsaa nwg txhais teg rua sau ntuj tes txawm tsaus ntuj nti dub ncab thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws tau peb nub.
Cov Iyi ib leeg saib tsw pum ib leeg tsw muaj ib tug sawv tau ntawm nwg lub chaw tau peb nub, tassws qhov chaw kws cov Yixayee suavdawg nyob mas pum kev kaaj quas lug.
Falau txhad hu Mauxe tuaj hab has tas, “Mej ca le moog pe hawm Yawmsaub lauj. Kheev mej tej mivnyuas nrug mej moog, tsuas yog tseg mej tej yaaj tej tshws tej nyuj nyob xwb.”
Tassws Mauxe has tas, “Koj yuav tsum kheev peb coj tej tsaj kws xyeem hab tej kws hlawv xyeem moog hab sub peb txhad tau xyeem rua Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv.

Peb tej tsaj txhu yuav tsum nrug peb moog hab tsw tseg ib tug rau teg rau taw hlo le, tsua qhov peb yuav tsum muab qee tug tsaj huv tej paab tsaj ntawd xyeem pe hawm Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv. Peb tub tsw paub tas yuav muab tug tsaj twg xyeem rua Yawmsaub yuav yog moog txug lub chaw ntawd tsaiv le paub.”
Tassws Yawmsaub ua rua Falau lub sab tawv, Falau tsw kaam tso puab moog.
Falau txhad has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le tswv ntawm kuv xubndag moog, ceev faaj tuab zoo tsw xob tuaj pum kuv lub ntsej muag dua le lawm. Yog koj pum kuv ntsej muag nub twg koj yuav tuag nub ntawd.”
Mauxe teb tas, “Ua le kws koj has los maj. Kuv yuav tsw pum koj lub ntsej muag dua le lawm.”

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Tshuav ib zag xwm txheej phem kws kuv yuav tso rua Falau hab cov Iyi lawm xwb, dhau ntawd nwg yuav tso mej tawm moog. Thaus nwg tso mej tawm moog nwg yuav ntab hlo mej suavdawg moog.
Nwgnuav koj ca le has rua koj cov tuabneeg kuas txhua tug quaspuj quasyawg thov tej npauj nyag npauj kub ntawm cov Iyi kws nrug puab nyob koom zej koom zog.”
Yawmsaub ua rua cov Iyi hlub nwg haiv tuabneeg. Hab Falau cov tub teg tub taw hab cov pejxeem huv Iyi tebchaws pum tas Mauxe yog ib tug tuabneeg tseem ceeb heev.
Mauxe has tas, “Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, ‘Kwvlaam ib taag mo kuv yuav moog thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws,

mas tej mivnyuas tub kws yog tug hlub taag nrho huv Iyi tebchaws txwj nrho Falau tug tub hlub kws nyob sau nwg lub zwm txwv moog txug tug puj qhev kws zum zeb tug tub hlub hab taag nrho rua tej tsaj txhu thawj tug mivnyuas yuav tuag.
Mas yuav muaj suab quaj qw nrov nrov thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws, ib txwm tsw tau txeev muaj dua le nuav hab yuav tsw muaj dua le lawm.
Tassws yuav tsw muaj ib tug dev tsej cov Yixayee hab puab tej tsaj txhu hlo le, sub mej txhad paub tas Yawmsaub cais cov Iyi hab cov Yixayee.’

Mas koj cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg nuav yuav tuaj cuag kuv hab pe ntawm kuv xubndag has tas, ‘Koj hab koj cov tuabneeg suavdawg ca le tawm moog.’ Dhau ntawd kuv le tawm moog.” Mauxe txawm tawm plawg ntawm Falau moog ua npau tawg heev.
Mas Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Falau yuav tsw noog koj has, sub kuv txhad tau ua txujci phemfwj tsaav ntxwv rua huv Iyi tebchaws hab.”
Mauxe hab Aloo tau ua tej txujci phemfwj huvsw hov taab meeg Falau, hab Yawmsaub ua rua Falau lub sab tawv, nwg txhad tsw kaam tso cov Yixayee tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws moog.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo huv Iyi tebchaws tas,
“Muab lub hli nuav ua lub ib hlis rua mej, yuav ua thawj lub hli rua xyoo tshab rua mej.
Ca le qha rua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg tas nub xab kaum lub hli nuav kuas txhua tug txwvneej muab ib tug mivnyuas yaaj rua nwg tsev tuabneeg, ib yig ib tug.

Yog yim twg tuabneeg tsawg noj tsw taag ib tug mivnyuas yaaj kuj koom nrug lwm yim kws nyob sws ti npaaj lawv le cov tuabneeg muaj coob muaj tsawg hab puab yuav ntsuag saib puab noj taag ntau los tsawg.
Mej tug mivnyuas yaaj yuav tsum yog ib tug txwv hab tsw muaj chaw thuaj le hab noob nyoog ib xyoos txawm yog mivnyuas yaaj lossws mivnyuas tshws los kuj tau.
Mej yuav muab yug ca txug nub xab kaum plaub lub hli nuav, mas thaus tsaus ntuj cov Yixayee suavdawg yuav tua puab tug mivnyuas yaaj.
“Mas puab yuav tsum muab cov ntshaav pleev ob tug puab rooj hab sau hau qhov rooj rua lub tsev kws puab noj ntawd.
Mo ntawd puab yuav noj nqaj ci, ntxuag cov ncuav tsw xyaw keeb hab ntxuag tej txum lom ab.
Tsw xob noj nqaj nyoog hab nqaj hau hlo le, ca le muab ci hlo ib tug kheej nrug taubhau hab teg taw hab plaab nyuv sab ntsws.
Tsw xob tseg ib qho seem txug kaaj ntug. Tej kws tshuav rua kaaj ntug yuav tsum muab hlawv pov tseg.
“Mej suavdawg yuav noj le nuav, yuav sa hlaab khov kho ntawm duav hab rau khau rawv ntawm taw hab tuav rawv paas nreg ntawm teg. Mej yuav noj nrawm nroog. Nuav yog Yawmsaub kevcai Hlaa Dhau.

Tsua qhov mo ntawd kuv yuav hlaa moog huv Iyi tebchaws mas kuv yuav tua txhua tug mivnyuas kws yog tug tub hlub huv Iyi tebchaws huvsw, tsw has tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu. Hab yuav rau txem rua Iyi tej daab huvsw. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.

Cov ntshaav kws nyob ntawm lub tsev kws mej nyob yuav ua chaw ntaus cim rua mej. Thaus kuv pum cov ntshaav hov kuv yuav hlaa dhau mej moog, yuav tsw muaj xwm txheej phem tshwm lug raug mej rua thaus kuv ntaus Iyi tebchaws.
“Nub nua yuav ua nub kws mej ncu ntsoov hab mej yuav ncu muab nub nua ua kevcai noj haus fwm Yawmsaub. Mej yuav coj kevcai paam noj haus le nuav ib tam dhau ib tam moog ib txhws.

Mej yuav noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb kuas puv xyaa nub. Thawj nub mej yuav muab tej keeb ncuav huv mej tej tsev rhu pov tseg huvsw. Yog leejtwg noj tej ncuav kws xyaw keeb nub ib txug nub xyaa mas yuav muab tug hov txav tawm huv cov Yixayee.
Thawj nub yuav tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv hab nub kws xyaa kuj tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv. Ob nub hov tsw xob ua num daabtsw hlo le tsuas yog ua pluag noj pluag haus xwb.

Mej yuav coj kevcai noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb tsua qhov nub nua ntaag yog nub kws kuv tau coj mej cov tuabneeg tawm huv Iyi tebchaws. Vem le nuav mej yuav ncu muab nub nua lug ua kevcai noj haus ib tam dhau ib tam moog ib txhws le.
Lub ib hlis nub xab kaum plaub thaus tsaus ntuj mej yuav noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb moog txug nub tim neeg nkaum ib thaus tsaus ntuj.

Huv xyaa nub ntawd tsw kheev kuas muaj ib qho keeb nyob huv mej tej tsev hlo le. Yog leejtwg tuaj ua qhua nyob lossws yug huv lub tebchaws kuj xwj noj ncuav xyaw keeb mas tug hov yuav raug muab txav tawm huv cov Yixayee.
Mej tsw xob noj ib yaam daabtsw kws xyaw keeb rua huv txhua lub chaw kws mej nyob, yuav tsum noj tej ncuav kws tsw xyaw keeb xwb.”
Tes Mauxe txawm hu Yixayee tej kev txwj quas laug suavdawg tuaj ua ke hab has rua puab tas, “Mej suavdawg txhua yim ca le xaiv ib tug mivnyuas yaaj lug tua ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau.
Muab ib re nplooj zaub txwg theem raus cov ntshaav kws nyob huv lub phaaj, coj moog pleev rua ob tug puab rooj hab sau hau qhov rooj. Tsw xob kheev mej ib tug tawm huv nwg lub tsev txug kaaj ntug.

Tsua qhov Yawmsaub yuav hlaa tuaj moog tua cov Iyi. Thaus Yawmsaub pum cov ntshaav sau hau qhov rooj hab ntawm ob tug puab rooj, nwg yuav hlaa lub qhov rooj ntawd moog, nwg yuav tsw kheev tug kws tua nkaag moog tua mej rua huv mej lub tsev.
Mej yuav coj txuj kevcai nuav rua mej hab mej tej tub ki moog ib txhws.
Thaus mej moog txug lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub yuav pub rua mej lawv le kws nwg tau cog lug tseg lawm, mej yuav tsum coj txuj kevcai nuav.
Thaus mej tej tub ki nug mej tas, ‘Txuj kevcai nuav lub ntsab yog daabtsw?’

mej yuav teb tas, ‘Yog ua kevcai xyeem tsaj hlaa dhau rua Yawmsaub, tsua qhov Yawmsaub tau hlaa cov Yixayee tej tsev huv Iyi tebchaws, rua thaus nwg tua cov tuabneeg Iyi, tassws tseg peb txhua tsev tuabneeg.’ ” Cov pejxeem kuj nyo hau pe hawm Yawmsaub.
Mas cov Yixayee kuj moog ua tej nuav lawv le Yawmsaub tau has rua Mauxe hab Aloo lawd.

Thaus ib taag mo Yawmsaub tua tej tub hlub txhua tug huv Iyi tebchaws, txwj nrho Falau tug tub hlub kws nyob sau lub zwm txwv moog txug tug kws raug kaw huv tsev lojfaaj tug tub hlub, hab tej tsaj txhu thawj tug mivnyuas txhua tug.

Mas Falau hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg hab cov Iyi suavdawg sawv tsaus ntuj nti lug. Muaj suab quaj nyav nrov thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws, vem yog tsw tshuav ib yig kws tsw muaj tuabneeg tuag le.

Falau txhad hu Mauxe hab Aloo tuaj cuag nwg mo ntawd hab has tas, “Meb hab cov Yixayee ca le sawv tseeg tswv ntawm kuv haiv tuabneeg moog lauj. Ca le moog pe hawm Yawmsaub lawv le meb tub has ca lawd.
Ca le coj mej tej yaaj tej tshws hab mej tej nyuj moog lawv le meb tub has ca lawd. Hab foom koob moov rua kuv.”
Cov Iyi kuj txhwb kuas cov Yixayee tswv tawm huv puab lub tebchaws sai sai. Puab has tas, “Peb tuag taag lawm lauj!”
Cov Yixayee txhad muab khaubduag qhwv tej moov kws tsw tau xyaw keeb hab tej phaaj kws zuaj ncuav kwv hlo sau xub pwg moog.
Cov Yixayee tub ua lawv le Mauxe tau has lawd, yog thov tej npauj nyag npauj kub hab tej tsoog tsho ntawm cov Iyi.
Hab Yawmsaub ua rua cov Iyi hlub cov Yixayee, txhad muab txhua yaam kws cov Yixayee thov pub rua puab. Ua le nuav puab txhad lws tau cov Iyi.
Cov Yixayee sawv taw tawm ntawm lub moos Lamexe moog txug lub moos Xukhau. Suav cov txwvneej kwvlaam muaj 600,000 leej tsw suav cov quaspuj mivnyuas.
Muaj lwm haiv tuabneeg coob coob nrug puab moog hab. Suavdawg lawv tsaj txhu coob coob moog tsw has yaaj tshws hab nyuj.

Puab muab tej moov kws zuaj lawm coj tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog ci ua ncuav tsw xyaw keeb. Puab tsw xyaw keeb tsua qhov puab raug txhwb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws hab tog tsw taug txhad npaaj tsw yeej zaub mov.
Cov Yixayee nyob huv Iyi tebchaws tau plaub puas peb caug xyoo.
Thaus dhau plaub puas peb caug xyoo lawd, nub ntawd ntaag Yawmsaub haiv tuabneeg suavdawg tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog.
Mo ntawd yog mo kws Yawmsaub zuv rawv yuav coj puab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws. Yog le hov mo ntawd kuj yog mo kws cov Yixayee suavdawg yuav zuv rawv ncu txug Yawmsaub ib tam dhau ib tam moog le.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas, “Kevcai hlaa dhau yuav tsum ua le nuav. Tsw xob kheev lwm haiv tuabneeg noj le.
Tassws tug qhev twg kws mej rhu nyaj yuav lug hab muab nwg ua kevcai txav lawm nwg le noj tau.
Lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob hab tej tub zug mas tsw xob ca noj.
Yuav tsum noj huv tsev xwb, tsw xob coj tej nqaj ib qho tawm rua nrau zoov hlo le, hab tsw xob muab tej pob txhaa luv.
Cov Yixayee suavdawg yuav tsum ua txuj kevcai nuav.

Thaus muaj lwm haiv tuabneeg lug nrug mej nyob hab xaav ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau xyeem rua Yawmsaub, kuj kuas nwg cov txwvneej suavdawg ua kevcai txav tsaiv, nwg le tuaj ze hab ua kevcai tau. Nwg txhad zoo ib yaam le cov kws yug rua huv lub tebchaws. Tassws cov kws tsw tau ua kevcai txav mas tsw xob noj hlo le.
Cov Yixayee kws yug huv lub tebchaws hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws lug nrug mej nyob yuav tsum coj txuj kevcai nuav ib yaam nkaus.”
Mas cov Yixayee suavdawg kuj ua tej nuav lawv le Yawmsaub tau has rua Mauxe hab Aloo lawm.
Nub ntawd ntaag Yawmsaub coj cov Yixayee txhua xeem tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog lawv le puab tej paab tej pawg.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le muab txhua tug tub hlub pub ua kuv tug. Txhua tug Yixayee thawj plaab mivnyuas tsw has tuabneeg lossws tsaj txhu los yog puavleej yog kuv le.”

Mauxe has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Ca le ncu txug nub nua kws mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws huv txujkev ua qhev lug, tsua qhov Yawmsaub swv nwg txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim coj mej tawm lug. Mas tsw xob noj tej ncuav xyaw keeb.
Nub nua mej yuav tawm moog, yog lub hli Anpis.

Thaus Yawmsaub coj mej moog txug cov Khana‑aa, cov Hithai, cov Amaulai, cov Hivai hab cov Yenpu lub tebchaws, yog lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub cog lug ruaj rua mej tej laug tas yuav muab rua mej, yog lub tebchaws kws muaj kua mig hab zwb ntaab ndwg ndo, mas mej yuav coj txuj kevcai nuav rua lub hli Anpis nuav.
Yuav tsum noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb xyaa nub, mas nub kws xyaa yuav ua kevcai noj haus xyeem rua Yawmsaub.
Yuav noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb kuas puv xyaa nub. Tsw xob kheev kuas muaj ib qho ncuav xyaw keeb nyob huv mej lossws muaj ib qho keeb nyob huv mej lub tebchaws hlo le.
Nub ntawd mej yuav tsum has rua mej tej tub tas, ‘Qhov kws kuv ua le nuav yog vem tej xwm txheej kws Yawmsaub ua paab kuv rua thaus kuv tawm huv Iyi tebchaws.’

Txuj kevcai nuav yuav zoo le lub hom thawj kws nyob huv mej txhais teg hab ua lub chaw ncu rua ntawm mej hauv plaj, sub Yawmsaub txuj kevcai txhad nyob huv mej qhov ncauj, tsua qhov Yawmsaub swv nwg txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug.
Vem le nuav mej yuav tsum ua lawv le tej kaab ke nuav rua lub swjhawm kws teem ca rua txhua xyoo.
“Thaus Yawmsaub coj mej moog txug cov Khana‑aa lub tebchaws hab muab lub tebchaws rua mej lawv le nwg cog lug tseg rua mej hab mej tej laug lawd,
mas txhua tug kws yug thawj plaab lug yuav muab cais pub ua Yawmsaub tug. Mej tej tsaj txhu thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog txwv txhua tug yeej yog Yawmsaub le.
Mas yuav muab ib tug mivnyuas yaaj txhwv thawj tug mivnyuas neeg luav. Yog tsw txhwv mas muab luv cej daab pov tseg. Mej yuav tsum txhwv tuabneeg thawj tug tub hlub huvsw hab.

Yaav tom hauv ntej thaus mej tej tub nug mej tas, ‘Ua caag yuav ua le nuav?’ ca le has rua nwg tas, ‘Yawmsaub swv nwg txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws huv txujkev ua qhev lug.

Thaus Falau ua lub sab tawv tsw kheev tso peb moog, Yawmsaub txhad tua txhua tug tub hlub huv Iyi tebchaws tsw has tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu. Vem le nuav kuv txhad muab thawj plaab mivnyuas tsaj kws yog txwv xyeem rua Yawmsaub tassws txhua tug tub hlub kuv muab txhwv ca.’

Txuj kevcai nuav yuav zoo le lub hom thawj kws nyob huv mej txhais teg hab ua lub chaw ncu rua ntawm mej hauv plaj, tsua qhov Yawmsaub swv nwg txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug.”

Thaus Falau tso cov Yixayee tawm moog lawm, txawm yog txujkev huv Filixatee tebchaws ze dua los Vaajtswv tsw coj puab taug txujkev hov, tsua qhov Vaajtswv has tas, “Ntshai tsaam thaus kuv haiv tuabneeg ntswb kev ua rog puab yuav ntxeev sab thim rov qaab moog Iyi tebchaws.”
Vaajtswv txhad coj puab zos moog huv tebchaws moj saab qhua rua Havtxwv Lab.  Cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws muaj cuab yeej ua rog txhwj zog.
Mauxe coj Yauxej cov pob txhaa moog hab, vem yog Yauxej kuas cov Yixayee cog lug ruaj has tas, “Vaajtswv yuav lug saib mej, mas mej yuav tsum coj kuv cov pob txhaa tawm ntawm nuav moog hab.”
Puab tawm ntawm Xukhau moog tsuam chaw rua ntawm Ethaa kws npuas ntug tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Thaus nruab nub Yawmsaub nyob huv ib tug ncej fuab coj puab kev, thaus mo ntuj Yawmsaub nyob huv ib tug ncej suavtawg ci rua puab pum kev, sub puab txhad moog tau kev nruab nub mo ntuj.
Tug ncej fuab tuaj nruab nub hab tug ncej suavtawg tuaj mo ntuj tsw ncaim ntawm cov Yixayee hauv ntej hlo le.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee kuas thim rov qaab moog tsuam chaw rua ntawm Pihahilau kws nyob ntawm Mintoo hab havtxwv ntu nruab nraab, kws nyob ntawm Npa‑aa Xefoo ib saab. Mas tsuam chaw ze ntug havtxwv rua hov ntawd.
Tsua qhov Falau yuav has txug cov Yixayee tas, ‘Puab moog khuab rua ntawm ntug nqhuab, tebchaws moj saab qhua thaiv puab kev lawm.’

Mas kuv yuav ua rua Falau lub sab tawv, nwg txhad yuav lawv qaab tuaj, mas kuv yuav tau koob meej ntawm Falau hab nwg cov tub rog huvsw. Mas cov Iyi yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.” Puab txhad ua lawv le ntawd.

Thaus muaj tuabneeg has rua vaajntxwv Iyi tas cov Yixayee tswv taag moog lawm, Falau hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw txawm ntxeev sab tsua qhov kws tso cov Yixayee moog, hab has tas, “Ua caag peb ua le nuav es txhad tso cov Yixayee tswv tawm ntawm qhov kws ua peb qhev moog lawm?”
Falau txawm npaaj nwg le tsheb ua rog hab coj nwg paab tub rog nrug nwg moog.
Nwg coj rau pua lub tsheb ua rog kws zoo tshaaj plawg hab coj cov tsheb ua rog taag nrho huv Iyi tebchaws moog, muaj thawj tub rog kaav txhua lub tsheb huvsw.
Yawmsaub ua rua Iyi tug vaajntxwv Falau lub sab tawv, nwg txhad lawv cov Yixayee kws tub tswv moog ua muaj plhus ntxag lawv qaab.

Cov Iyi kws lawv puab moog yog taag nrho Falau tej neeg hab tsheb ua rog hab nwg tej tub rog caij neeg hab nwg paab tub rog huvsw, mas puab lawv cuag cov Yixayee tseed tsuam chaw nyob ntawm ntug havtxwv ze Pihahilau kws nyob ntawm Npa‑aa Xefoo ib saab.
Thaus Falau tuaj ze, cov Yixayee tsaa muag saib pum cov Iyi lawv tuaj yuav cuag puab mas puab ntshai kawg le. Cov Yixayee txhad quaj qw rua Yawmsaub.
Puab has rua Mauxe tas, “Koj coj peb lug tuag rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua vem tsw muaj qhov ntxaa rua huv Iyi tebchaws lov? Koj coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug ua daabtsw?
Peb tub has rua koj huv Iyi tebchaws lawm los tsw yog? ‘Tso peb nyob peb, ca peb ua cov Iyi qhev.’ Qhov kws ua cov Iyi qhev hov kuj zoo dua le kws lug tuag rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav.”
Mauxe has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Tsw xob ntshai, yeem meem nyob ruaj, saib Yawmsaub txujkev cawm dim kws nwg yuav ua rua mej pum nub nua. Cov Iyi kws nub nua mej pum, mej yuav tsw pum dua le lawm.
Yawmsaub yuav nyob mej chaw ua rog, mej tsuas nyob tuabywv xwb.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ua caag koj quaj qw rua kuv? Koj ca le has kuas cov Yixayee moog lawm tom hauv ntej.
Koj ca le tsaa koj tug paas nreg, hab tsaa koj txhais teg rua sau havtxwv ua rua dej havtxwv faib rua ob saab, sub cov Yixayee txhad moog tau sau cov aav qhuav huv plawv havtxwv hlaa moog.
Kuv yuav ua rua cov Iyi sab tawv sub puab txhad lawv qaab tuaj. Mas kuv yuav tau koob meej ntawm Falau hab nwg tej tub rog hab nwg tej tsheb neeg hab nwg cov tub rog caij neeg huvsw.
Thaus kuv tau koob meej ntawm Falau hab nwg tej tsheb neeg hab nwg cov tub rog caij neeg, cov Iyi yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.”
Vaajtswv tug tubkhai ntuj kws ua cov Yixayee ntej hov txawm rov moog nyob tom puab qub qaab, hab tug ncej fuab kws ua puab ntej kuj rov moog nyob tom puab qub qaab,

yog lug nyob ntawm cov Iyi cov tub rog hab cov Yixayee ntu nruab nraab. Tug ncej fuab ua rua saab kws npuas cov Iyi tsaus ntuj ua rua saab kws npuas cov Yixayee pum kev, mas ib mos kaaj ntug ob tog tuaj tsw tau sws ze.
Tes Mauxe txawm tsaa nwg txhais teg rua sau havtxwv mas Yawmsaub ua rua cua ntsawj hlub hlub saab nub tuaj tuaj ntsawj dej havtxwv ib mos ua rua havtxwv qhuav qhawv muab dej faib rua ob saab.
Cov Yixayee txhad moog taug kev qhuav qhawv huv plawv havtxwv, cov dej faib hlo rua saab xws hab saab phem ua ntsaa loog rua puab.
Cov Iyi kuj lawv lag puab qaab rua huv plawv havtxwv, taag nrho Falau tej neeg hab tej tsheb ua rog hab cov tub rog caij neeg huvsw.
Thaus yuav kaaj ntug Yawmsaub tsaa muag saib huv tug ncej suavtawg hab tug ncej fuab tuaj pum Iyi cov tub rog, mas nwg ua rua cov Iyi ceeb zum zawg.
Nwg ua rua puab tej lug tsheb caam pis nkaus  moog tsw tshua taug. Cov Iyi txhad sws has tas, “Peb ca le tswv ntawm cov Yixayee rov qaab tsua qhov Yawmsaub nyob puab chaw ua rog rua cov Iyi.”
Thaus ntawd Yawmsaub txawm has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le tsaa koj txhais teg rua sau havtxwv ua rua cov dej havtxwv nphau rov lug nyaab cov Iyi hab puab tej tsheb ua rog hab cov tub rog caij neeg.”
Mauxe txawm tsaa teg rua sau havtxwv mas thaus kaaj ntug dej havtxwv txhad nphau lug yaam nkaus le qub. Cov Iyi tswv tej dej nphau ntawd tassws Yawmsaub muab cov Iyi xyeeb rua huv plawv havtxwv.
Dej nphau rov lug nyaab hlo tej tsheb hab cov tub rog caij neeg hab Falau cov tub rog huvsw kws lawv puab moog rua huv havtxwv, tsw tshuav ib tug le.
Tassws cov Yixayee taug kev qhuav qhawv huv plawv havtxwv, cov dej faib hlo rua saab xws hab saab phem ua ntsaa loog rua puab.
Yog le nuav nub ntawd Yawmsaub cawm cov Yixayee dim huv cov Iyi txhais teg, mas cov Yixayee pum cov Iyi tej cev tuag ntawm ntug havtxwv.
Cov Yixayee pum tej num luj kws Yawmsaub tau ua rua cov Iyi, puab kuj ntshai Yawmsaub hab puab ntseeg Yawmsaub hab ntseeg nwg tug qhev Mauxe.

Thaus ntawd Mauxe hab cov Yixayee hu zaaj nkauj nuav rua Yawmsaub has tas, “Kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas Yawmsaub tsua qhov nwg tub kov yeej luj kawg nkaus, nwg muab tej neeg hab tej tub rog caij neeg laim hlo rua huv havtxwv.
Yawmsaub yog kuv tug zug hab yog kuv zaaj nkauj, hab nwg yog tug kws cawm kuv dim. Nwg yog kuv tug Vaajtswv ntaag, kuv yuav qhuas nwg, nwg yog kuv txwv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav qhuas ntxhas nwg.
Yawmsaub yog tug txawj ua rog, nwg lub npe hu ua Yawmsaub.
Yawmsaub muab Falau tej tsheb ua rog hab nwg tej tub rog laim hlo rua huv havtxwv, nwg cov thawj rog kws txawj heev kuj tog hlo rua huv Havtxwv Lab.
Dej nphau lug nyaab hlo puab, puab tog rua huv qaab thu yaam le lub pob zeb.
Au Yawmsaub, koj txhais teg xws muaj fwjchim luj kawg. Au Yawmsaub, koj txhais teg xws tsoo yeeb ncuab tawg ntsoog taag.
Koj swv koj tug fwjchim meej mom luj kawg muab cov kws tawm tsaam koj ntxeev hlo pov tseg, koj tso koj txujkev npau tawg muab puab hlawv kub nyab taag yaam nkaus le quav nyaab.
Koj lub qhov ntswg ua paa ntsawj dej sawv sab quas zug, tej dej sawv sab ua ib phaab, tej dej huv havtxwv kuj nkoog khov kho.

Cov yeeb ncuab has tas, ‘Kuv yuav lawv qaab, kuv yuav lawv cuag, kuv yuav muab tej kws txeeb tau lug faib. Kuv yuav ua txhua yaam rua puab lawv le kuv lub sab xaav kuas pov khawv nkaus. Kuv yuav rhu ntaaj, kuv txhais teg yuav ua kuas puab puam tsuaj.’
Koj tshuab koj le cua ntsawj tuaj, dej havtxwv nyaab hlo puab. Puab tog rua huv cov dej kws nphau nyaab hlo lug ib yaam le txhuas.
“Au Yawmsaub, tej timtswv huvsw tug twg zoo cuag le koj? Tug twg zoo cuag le koj, kws dawb huv kawg nkaus, hab muaj lub koob meej kws txaus fwm kawg, hab ua tej txujci phemfwj?
Koj tsaa hlo koj txhais teg xws, lub nplajteb kuj muab puab nqog taag nrho.
“Koj muaj txujkev hlub ruaj khov es coj haiv tuabneeg kws koj txhwv dim lawm. Koj swv koj tug zug coj puab txuj hauv kev moog txug koj lub chaw nyob kws dawb huv.
Ib tsoom tuabneeg tau nov, mas puab tshee quas nyo. Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Filixatee tebchaws poob sab kawg.
Nwgnuav Entoo cov thawj kuj ntshai kawg, Mau‑a cov num tswv kuj ntshai ib ce tshee quas nyo, cov tuabneeg huv Khana‑aa tebchaws suavdawg sab ntsws yaaj taag.

Puab raug kev txhawj kev ntshai ua sab puag quas tsug. Au Yawmsaub, vem yog koj txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg, puab txhad le nyob tuabywv tsw ua zug yaam le pob zeb moog txug thaus koj haiv tuabneeg hlaa dhau taag lawm, moog txug thaus cov tuabneeg kws koj tub txhwv dim lawm hlaa dhau moog.
Koj yuav coj puab lug hab muab puab txawb rua sau koj lub roob, au Yawmsaub, yog lub chaw kws koj ua ca rua koj nyob, hab yog lub chaw pe hawm koj kws koj txhais teg tswm ca.
Yawmsaub yuav kaav moog ib txhws tsw kawg.”

Thaus Falau tej neeg hab tej tsheb ua rog hab nwg tej tub rog caij neeg nqeg moog rua huv havtxwv, Yawmsaub kuj ua kuas dej havtxwv nphau lug nyaab hlo, tassws cov Yixayee mas taug kev qhuav qhawv huv plawv havtxwv.
Aloo tug muam Mili‑aa kws ua tug cev Vaajtswv lug txawm coj ib lub nruag npuaj huv nwg txhais teg hab cov quaspuj suavdawg npuaj nruag seev cev lawv nwg qaab.
Mili‑aa hu nkauj rua puab tas, “Ca le hu nkauj qhuas Yawmsaub tsua qhov nwg tub kov yeej luj kawg nkaus. Nwg muab tej neeg hab tej tub rog caij neeg laim hlo rua huv havtxwv.”
Dhau ntawd Mauxe coj cov Yixayee tawm ntawm Havtxwv Lab moog rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Su. Puab moog tau peb nub ke huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nrhav tsw tau dej haus hlo le.
Thaus puab lug txug ntawm Mala, puab kuj haus tsw tau cov dej ntawm Mala tsua qhov cov dej hov ab heev. Vem le nuav txhad hu ua Mala.
Cov pejxeem txhad le ywg ywg Mauxe tas, “Peb yuav haus daabtsw?”

Mauxe txawm tsaa suab thov Yawmsaub. Yawmsaub txhad qha ib tog ntoo rua Mauxe pum, mas nwg muab nrum rua huv dej, dej txawm qaab lawm. Thaus nyob lub chaw ntawd Yawmsaub txhad qha nwg tej kaab ke hab nwg tej kevcai rua puab hab swm puab lub sab.

Yawmsaub has tas, “Yog mej ua tuab zoo noog Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug hab ua tej kws hum nwg lub sab, hab tig ntsej noog nwg tej lug nkaw hab ua lawv le nwg tej kaab ke txhua qhov, mas tej mob nkeeg kws kuv ua rua cov Iyi hov kuv yuav tsw tso rua sau mej hlo le, tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub, yog tug kws khu mej.”
Dhau ntawd puab txawm lug txug ntawm Elee kws muaj kaum ob lub qhov dej txhawv hab muaj xyaa caum tsob toov laaj. Puab txawm tsuam chaw nyob ntawm cov qhov dej hov.

Puab sawv kev ntawm Elee mas nub tim kaum tswb lub ob hlis suav txwj thaus puab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug, ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg lug txug huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xis kws nyob ntawm Elee hab Xinai ntu nruab nraab.
Ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg ywg ywg Mauxe hab Aloo huv tebchaws moj saab qhua.

Puab has rua ob tug tas, “Peb yeem tuag rua Yawmsaub teg huv Iyi tebchaws rua thaus peb nyob ntawm tej laujkaub nqaj hab noj tej zaub mov tsau npo zoo dua. Koj coj peb suavdawg lug yoo tshaib tuag taag rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav xwb.”

Mas Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Kuv yuav tso zaub mov sau ntuj lug rua mej ib yaam le tso naag lug. Cov pejxeem yuav tsum naj taagkig tawm moog khaws kuas txaus noj ib nub ntawd, kuv txhad tau swm puab lub sab saib puab yuav ua lawv le kuv tej lug los tsw ua.
Nub rau thaus puab khaws tej kws yuav coj lug tsev puab yuav tsum khaws tshaaj ib npaug rua sau le kws naj nub txeev khaws.”
Mauxe hab Aloo txhad has rua cov Yixayee suavdawg tas, “Thaus tsaus ntuj mej yuav paub tas Yawmsaub yog tug kws coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug.
Thaus kaaj ntug mej yuav pum Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab, tsua qhov Yawmsaub tub nov tej lug kws mej ywg nwg lawm. Wb ob leeg yog leejtwg es mej yuav ywg ib?”

Mauxe has tas, “Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj Yawmsaub yuav pub nqaj rua mej noj hab thaus kaaj ntug yuav pub mov rua mej noj tsau npo tsua qhov nwg tub nov tej lug kws mej ywg nwg lawm. Wb ob leeg yog leejtwg? Mej tsw ywg ib tassws yog mej ywg Yawmsaub.”
Mauxe has rua Aloo tas, “Ca le has rua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg tas, ‘Txaav lug ze Yawmsaub, tsua qhov nwg tub nov tej lug kws mej ywg lawm.’ ”
Thaus Aloo saamswm has rua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg noog hov, puab tsaa muag saib rua tebchaws moj saab qhua mas pum Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm rua huv tug ncej fuab.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Kuv tub nov tej lug kws cov Yixayee ywg lawm. Ca le has rua puab tas, ‘Thaus tsaus ntuj zuag mej yuav tau nqaj noj, hab thaus kaaj ntug mej yuav tau mov noj tsau npo. Mas mej yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.’ ”
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj tej paab noog ws yaa lug puv nkaus puab tej chaw nyob, hab thaus kaaj ntug kuj muaj lwg ntsu ib ncig puab tej chaw tsuam.
Thaus tej lwg hov qhuav taag lawm kuj muaj tej nyuas nplai nyag nyag zoo le te nyob sau npoo aav huv tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Thaus cov Yixayee pum mas puab sws nug tas, “Nuav yog daabtsw nej?” tsua qhov puab tsw paub tas yog daabtsw. Mauxe has rua puab tas, “Nuav yog tej mov kws Yawmsaub pub rua mej noj.
Yawmsaub kuas mej ua le nuav. Mej txhua tug khaws npaum le kws txaus mej noj tsau, ib leeg khaws ib aumaw  lawv le muaj tuabneeg coob los tsawg nyob huv nwg lub tsev ntaub.”
Cov Yixayee ua lawv le ntawd. Ib txha khaws ntau ib txha khaws tsawg.
Tassws thaus puab muab lub aumaw luj, tug kws khaws tau ntau kuj tsw muaj seem, tug kws khaws tau tsawg kuj muaj txaus. Txhua tug khaws npaum le kws txaus nwg noj.
Mauxe has rua puab tas, “Tsw pub leejtwg khaws ib qho ca rua pigkig.”
Tassws puab tsw noog Mauxe has. Muaj qee leej khaws ib qho ca rua pigkig, mas cov kws khaws hov kuj lwj kaas hab tsw lwj. Mauxe txhad chim rua puab.
Puab naj taagkig nyag khaws txaus nyag noj tsau xwb. Thaus tshaav ntuj kub tej mov kws puab tsw khaws txawm yaaj taag lawm.
Thaus txug nub rau puab khaws ob npaug, ib leeg khaws ob aumaw.  Thaus Yixayee cov thawj tuaj has rua Mauxe paub,

Mauxe has rua puab tas, “Nuav yog tej kws Yawmsaub has kuas mej ua, ‘Pigkig yog nub kws caiv su tag tag, yog nub Xanpatau dawb huv rua Yawmsaub. Nub nua yuav ci daabtsw kuj ca le ci, yuav hau daabtsw kuj ca le hau, tej kws tshuav kuj khaws ca rua pigkig.’ ”
Puab khaws ca rua pigkig lawv le Mauxe has rua puab, mas tej mov hov kuj zoo tsw lwj tsw ua kaas.
Mauxe has tas, “Nub nua ca le noj tej mov hov, tsua qhov nub nua yog Yawmsaub nub Xanpatau. Nub nua mej yuav tsw pum tej mov hov tom tshaav puam hlo le.
Mej yuav khaws rau nub xwb, mas nub xyaa kws yog nub Xanpatau yuav tsw muaj lawm.”
Thaus txug nub xyaa muaj qee leej moog khaws tassws nrhav tsw muaj le.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Mej yuav tsw kaam ua lawv le kuv tej lug nkaw hab kuv tej kevcai ntev le caag?

Saib maj, Yawmsaub tub muab nub Xanpatau rua mej, vem le nuav nub rau nwg pub mov txaus mej noj ob nub. Mej txhua tug yuav tsum su nyob huv tsev, tsw kheev leejtwg tawm huv nwg lub tsev rua nub xyaa.”
Yog le nuav cov pejxeem txhad le su rua nub xyaa.
Cov Yixayee hu cov mov hov ua mana.  Tej lub dawb paug zoo le noob zaub txhwb qab, hab qaab yaam nkaus le tej ncuav nyag nyag kws xyaw zwb ntaab.

Mauxe has tas, “Nuav yog tej kws Yawmsaub has kuas ua, ‘Luj ib aumaw  mana muab khaws ca ib tam dhau ib tam moog le, sub puab txhad tau pum cov mov kws kuv yug mej huv tebchaws moj saab qhua rua thaus kuv coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug.’ ”
Mauxe has rua Aloo tas, “Muab ib lub miv hub lug ntim ib aumaw mana khaws ca rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag ib tam dhau ib tam moog le.”
Aloo txhad muab cov mana hov tso rua ntawm lub swb xaab kws muaj Yawmsaub tej lug, muab khaws ca lawv le Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe
Cov Yixayee noj mana tau plaub caug xyoo lug txug thaus puab moog txug lub tebchaws kws nyob tau. Puab noj mana lug txug ntawm Khana‑aa nrwm teb.
(Ib efa  muaj kaum aumaw.)

Ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg tshais chaw ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xis moog ua ib ntus ib ntus lawv le Yawmsaub has. Puab lug tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Lefintee, tassws tsw muaj dej rua cov pejxeem haus.
Vem le nuav puab txhad nrhav txem rua Mauxe hab has rua nwg tas, “Muab dej rua peb haus maj.” Mauxe has rua puab tas, “Mej nrhav txem rua kuv ua daabtsw? Ua caag mej yuav swm Yawmsaub?”
Tassws cov pejxeem nqhes dej heev ntawm lub chaw hov, puab txhad ywg Mauxe tas, “Ua caag koj coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug ua rua peb hab peb tej mivnyuas hab tej tsaj txhu nqhes dej tuag?”
Mauxe txhad quaj thov Yawmsaub tas, “Kuv yuav ua le caag rua cov pejxeem nuav? Puab tub yuav xuas pob zeb muab kuv ntaus tuag.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le ua cov pejxeem ntej moog hab coj Yixayee tej kev txwj quas laug qee leej nrug koj moog. Hab tuav rawv tug paas nreg kws koj nplawm tug dej Nai moog hab.

Kuv yuav sawv taab meeg ntawm koj xubndag sau phaab zeb ntawm lub roob Haule.  Koj ca le ntaus phaab zeb, dej yuav txhawv lug rua cov pejxeem haus.” Mauxe ua lawv le ntawd taab meeg Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug.
Mauxe hu lub chaw hov tas Maxa hab Melinpa,  vem yog cov Yixayee nrhav txem rua nwg hab swm Yawmsaub has tas, “Yawmsaub nrug peb nyob los tsw nyob lawm?”
Thaus ntawd cov Amalej tuaj ua rog rua cov Yixayee ntawm Lefintee.
Mauxe has rua Yausua tas, “Ca le xaiv cov txwvneej tawm moog ua rog rua cov Amalej. Pigkig kuv yuav sawv ntsug tuav rawv Vaajtswv tug paas nreg huv kuv txhais teg sau lub hauv roob.”
Yausua kuj ua lawv le Mauxe has, nwg moog ua rog rua cov Amalej. Mauxe hab Aloo hab Hawj kuj nce moog sau lub hauv roob.
Mauxe tsaa teg thaus twg, cov Yixayee kov yeej thaus ntawd, qhau teg thaus twg cov Amalej txawm kov yeej thaus ntawd.

Tassws Mauxe teg tsaug leeg. Aloo hab Hawj txhad coj ib lub pob zeb lug rua Mauxe nyob tsawg, mas ob tug txhad paab tsaa Mauxe ob txhais teg ib leeg ib saab, nwg txhais teg txhad tsaa khov kho moog txug nub poob qho.
Yausua txhad xuas ntaaj tua yeej cov Amalej swb hlo.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le sau tej nuav rua huv ntawv sub txhad ncu tau hab pav rua Yausua noog tas kuv yuav muab cov Amalej ntxuav kuas pluj taag tsw muaj leejtwg ncu tau puab rua huv qaab ntuj nuav.”
Mauxe txhad ua ib lub thaaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub hab tis npe hu tas, Yawmsaub yog kuv tug chij,
hab nwg has tas, “Tsua qhov muaj txhais teg tsaa rua sau Yawmsaub lub zwm txwv.  Mas Yawmsaub yuav ua rog rua cov Amalej ib tam dhau ib tam moog le.”

Yethoo kws yog cov Mintee tug pov thawj hab yog Mauxe yawm txwv, tau nov txug tej num kws Vaajtswv ua paab Mauxe hab paab Vaajtswv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee rua thaus Yawmsaub coj puab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug.
Mauxe yawm txwv Yethoo tau txais Mauxe tug quaspuj Xipaula rua thaus Mauxe xaa Xipaula moog,
hab nwg ob tug tub. Ib tug hu ua Kawsoo  (tsua qhov nwg has tas, “Kuv yog ib tug kws ua qhua nyob rua huv luas tebchaws.”)
Hab ib tug hu ua Eliyexaw  (tsua qhov nwg has tas, “Kuv txwv tug Vaajtswv yog tug kws paab kuv hab cawm kuv dim huv Falau raab ntaaj.”)
Mauxe yawm txwv Yethoo coj Mauxe ob tug tub hab Mauxe tug quaspuj tuaj rua Mauxe huv tebchaws moj saab qhua kws puab tsuam chaw nyob ntawm Vaajtswv lub roob.
Nwg khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Mauxe tas, “Koj yawm txwv Yethoo coj koj quaspuj hab ob tug tub tuaj rua koj.”
Mauxe txhad tawm moog tog yawm txwv hab pe hab nwj nwg. Ob tug sws thaam txug kev noj qaab nyob zoo hab nkaag lug rua huv tsev ntaub.

Mauxe pav rua nwg yawm txwv noog txug txhua yaam kws Yawmsaub ua rua Falau hab ua rua cov Iyi vem yog saib rua cov Yixayee, hab tej kev ceblaaj huvsw kws raug cov Yixayee ntawm ib ntog kev hab Yawmsaub tau cawm puab dim le caag.
Yethoo kuj zoo sab heev rua txhua yaam zoo kws Yawmsaub tau ua paab cov Yixayee rua thaus nwg cawm puab dim huv cov Iyi txhais teg.
Yethoo txhad has tas, “Qhuas Yawmsaub kws tau cawm mej dim huv cov Iyi txhais teg hab huv Falau txhais teg, yog cawm cov Yixayee suavdawg dim huv cov Iyi txhais teg.
Nwgnuav kuv paub tas Yawmsaub luj dhau tej timtswv huvsw, tsua qhov nwg ua tej nuav rua thaus cov Iyi tsuj yuam cov Yixayee ua khaav quas ntxhas.”

Mauxe yawm txwv Yethoo kuj muab tsaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab tua tsaj xyeem rua Vaajtswv. Aloo hab Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug suavdawg tuaj nrug Mauxe yawm txwv noj ib pluag mov ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag.
Taagkig tom qaab Mauxe nyob tsawg tu plaub rua cov pejxeem. Puab sawv vej vog Mauxe thaus sawv ntxuv moog txug tsaus ntuj.

Thaus Mauxe yawm txwv pum txhua yaam num kws Mauxe ua rua cov pejxeem hov, nwg has tas, “Koj ua daabtsw le nuav rua cov pejxeem? Ua caag koj tuab leeg nyob tu plaub le nuav, hab cov pejxeem suavdawg yuav sawv vej koj taagkig txug tsaus ntuj?”
Mauxe teb yawm txwv tas, “Yog cov pejxeem tuaj cuag kuv kuas kuv ua nug rua Vaajtswv.
Thaus puab muaj plaub muaj ntug puab tuaj cuag kuv, kuv txhad tu tau rua ob tog, hab kuv qha rua puab paub txug Vaajtswv tej kaab ke hab tej kws Vaajtswv phua cai.”
Mauxe yawm txwv txhad has rua nwg tas, “Koj ua le nuav tsw zoo.
Koj hab cov pejxeem kws tuaj nuav yuav qaug zug taag tsua qhov tej kws koj ua nuav nyaav dhau koj tug zug lawm, hab koj tuab leeg xwb ua tsw taug.
Koj noog kuv has, kuv yuav taw qha koj hab thov Vaajtswv nrug nraim koj. Koj ua tug kws sawv cev ntawm cov pejxeem rua Vaajtswv, coj puab tej plaub moog ua nug rua Vaajtswv.
Koj yuav qhuab qha kuas puab paub tej kaab ke hab tej kws phua cai rua puab, hab qha puab paub ua puab lub neej le caag hab paub tej kws puab yuav tsum ua.

“Tsw taag le ntawd xwb, koj ca le xaiv cov txwvneej huv cov Yixayee kws muaj peevxwm hab paub ntshai Vaajtswv hab tso sab tau hab ntxub noj nyaj xab. Tsaa puab cov nuav lug ua cov kws kaav pejxeem, kaav ib txheeb leej hab kaav ib puas leej hab kaav tswb caug leej hab kaav kaum leej.

Ca puab tu cov pejxeem tej plaub txhua lub swjhawm. Tej tshaaj plaub luj, ca puab coj tuaj cuag koj, huas tej plaub miv ca puab tu puab xwb. Ua le nuav txhad yoojyim rua koj hab puab txhad nrug koj rws lub nraa nyaav.
Yog koj ua le nuav hab Vaajtswv qha koj ua, mas koj txhad thev taug hab cov pejxeem suavdawg nuav txhad tau rov moog tsev kaaj sab lug.”
Mauxe kuj noog nwg yawm txwv tej lug hab ua lawv le nwg qha txhua yaam.
Mauxe xaiv cov txwvneej kws muaj peevxwm huv cov Yixayee ua cov pejxeem le thawj, tsaa kaav ib txheeb leej kaav ib puas leej kaav tswb caug leej hab kaav kaum leej.
Mas puab cov nuav tu cov pejxeem tej plaub txhua lub swjhawm. Tej plaub kws ceblaaj puab le coj moog cuag Mauxe, tej plaub miv miv puab tu puab xwb.
Tes Mauxe txawm xaa nwg yawm txwv rov moog, yawm txwv txhad rov qaab moog rua nwg lub tebchaws lawm.
Lub peb hlis nub xab ib suav txwj thaus cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug nub hov puab lug txug huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai.
Thaus puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Lefintee puab lug txug huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai, puab kuj tsuam chaw nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua. Cov Yixayee tsuam chaw nyob ntawm taw roob Xinai.
Mauxe nce moog cuag Vaajtswv, mas Yawmsaub hu sau lub roob tuaj rua nwg tas, “Ca le has le nuav rua Yakhauj caaj ceg kws yog haiv tuabneeg Yixayee tas,
‘Mej tub pum tej kws kuv ua rua cov Iyi lawm, hab qhov kws kuv kwv hlo mej yaam nkaus le tug daav kwv mivnyuas sau nwg phob tis, hab coj mej lug cuag kuv.
Nwgnuav yog mej noog kuv lug hab ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg, mas mej yuav ua kuv teej kuv tug huv ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg. Taag nrho lub nplajteb huvsw yog kuv le,
tassws mej yuav ua ib lub tebchaws pov thawj rua kuv hab ua haiv tuabneeg dawb huv.’ Koj yuav has tej lug nuav rua cov Yixayee noog.”
Mauxe txhad rov lug hu cov kev txwj quas laug huv cov pejxeem tuaj ua ke mas pav txhua lu lug kws Yawmsaub has rua nwg lawm rua puab noog.
Mas cov pejxeem suavdawg ib txhwj teb has tas, “Peb yuav ua txhua yaam kws Yawmsaub has ntawd.” Mauxe txhad coj cov pejxeem tej lug moog has rua Yawmsaub.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Kuv yuav lug rua ntawm koj huv tauv fuab kws tsaus quas nti, sub cov pejxeem txhad le nov thaus kuv has lug rua koj, mas puab txhad le tso sab rua koj moog ib txhws.” Mauxe coj cov pejxeem tej lug moog has rua Yawmsaub,
mas Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le moog hab tu kuas cov pejxeem dawb huv rua kuv rua nub nua hab pigkig, hab kuas puab ntxhua puab tej tsoog tsho.
Ca le npaaj kuas txhwj rua nub kws peb, tsua qhov nub kws peb ntawd Yawmsaub yuav nqeg lug rua sau lub roob Xinai taab meeg cov pejxeem suavdawg.

Koj yuav tsum kem nrwm thaiv cov pejxeem nyob puag ncig lub roob, hab has tas, ‘Mej yuav tsum ceev faaj tsw xob nce moog rua sau lub roob hab tsw xob kov lub taw roob hov hlo le. Yog leejtwg kov lub roob hov, nwg yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.

Tsw xob xuas teg kov tug hov hlo le, ca le xuas pob zeb ntaus nwg tuag lossws xuas neev tua nwg. Tsw has tsaj txhu hab tuabneeg los xwj, tsw xob tseg caj sa hlo le.’ Thaus nov raaj kub yaaj nrov ntev mas puab moog tau rua sau lub roob.”
Mauxe nqeg sau roob lug rua ntawm cov pejxeem, hab tu kuas cov pejxeem dawb huv rua Yawmsaub. Mas puab ntxhua puab tej tsoog tsho.
Mauxe has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Mej yuav npaaj kuas txhwj rua nub kws peb. Mej tsw xob moog ze quaspuj hlo le.”

Thaus txug nub peb thaus sawv ntxuv kuj muaj xub nthe ua tsag lig xub laim quas lag, hab muaj fuab tsaus quas nti sau lub roob, hab muaj suab raaj kub yaaj nrov heev, ua rua cov pejxeem suavdawg kws tsuam chaw nyob ntawd ntshai tshee quas nyo.
Mauxe txhad coj cov pejxeem tawm huv lub chaw nyob moog ntswb Vaajtswv, puab tuaj sawv quas ntsug ntawm taw roob.
Muaj paa nchu laum nkaus lub roob Xinai tsua qhov Yawmsaub nyob huv cov nplaim tawg nqeg lug. Muaj paa nchu hlub hlub ib yaam le ib cub tawg luj, lub roob kuj tseeg quas nkawg.
Thaus raaj kub yaaj nrov heev quas zug, Mauxe kuj has hab Vaajtswv ua xub nthe teb nwg.
