Yawmsaub nqeg lug rua sau lub ncov roob Xinai. Yawmsaub hu Mauxe nce moog rua sau lub ncov roob, mas Mauxe txhad le nce moog.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le rov qaab nqeg moog ntuag cov pejxeem ntshai tsaam puab hlaa lug txug ntawm Yawmsaub vem yog xaav saib, tes puab yuav puam tsuaj coob coob.
Hab cov pov thawj kws lug ze Yawmsaub yuav tsum tu puab tug kheej kuas dawb huv rua Yawmsaub ntshai tsaam Yawmsaub ua rua puab puam tsuaj.”
Mauxe has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Cov pejxeem tuaj tsw tau rua ntawm lub roob Xinai tsua qhov koj tub has tawv rua peb tas, ‘Kem nrwm puag ncig lub roob hab tu kuas lub roob dawb huv.’ ”

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le nqeg moog hab coj Aloo nrug koj nce rov qaab tuaj. Tassws tsw xob kheev cov pov thawj hab cov pejxeem hlaa tuaj txug ntawm Yawmsaub tsaam tes nwg ua rua puab puam tsuaj.”
Mauxe txhad nqeg rov moog has rua cov pejxeem lawv le ntawd.
Vaajtswv has tej lug nuav huvsw tas,
“Kuv yog Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv, kws coj koj tawm huv Iyi tebchaws huv txujkev ua qhev lug.
Koj tsw xob muaj dua lwm tug vaajtswv kws tsw yog kuv.
“Koj tsw xob ua txoov daab rua koj pe tsw has tej kws muaj yaam ntxwv zoo le tej kws nyob sau nruab ntug lossws tej kws nyob huv nplajteb lossws tej kws nyob huv dej huv nruab tiv txwv.

Tsw xob pe hab tsw xob ua koom rua tej txoov daab ntawd, tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv, yog tug Vaajtswv kws khib xeeb heev, mas yuav rau txem rua leej txwv kws ntxub kuv hab poob moog rua nwg cov tub ki moog txug peb plaub tam.
Tassws kuv yuav ua txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov tshwm rua cov kws hlub kuv hab ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai ntau txheeb tam tuabneeg.
“Tsw xob laam has saib tsw taug Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv lub npe, tsua qhov tug kws laam has saib tsw taug nwg lub npe, mas Yawmsaub yuav tsw zaam txem.
“Koj yuav tsum ncu ntsoov fwm nub Xanpatau  ua nub kws dawb huv.
Koj yuav tsum khwv hab ua koj tej num huvsw rau nub.

Tassws nub xyaa yog nub Xanpatau kws caiv rua Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv. Nub hov tsw xob ua ib yaam num daabtsw le, tsw has koj tug kheej hab koj tej tub tej ntxhais hab koj cov tub qhe nkauj qhev hab koj tej tsaj txhu hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws tuaj nyob huv koj lub moos.

Vem tas rau nub xwb Yawmsaub tau tswm lub ntuj lub teb hab havtxwv, hab txhua yaam kws muaj nyob rua huv, mas nub kws xyaa Yawmsaub su. Vem le nuav Yawmsaub txhad foom koob moov rua nub Xanpatau hab muab nub ntawd teem ua nub kws dawb huv.
“Koj yuav tsum fwm koj nam koj txwv sub koj txhad muaj txujsa nyob ntev rua huv lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv pub rua koj.
“Tsw xob tua tuabneeg.
“Tsw xob deev luas quaspuj luas quasyawg.
“Tsw xob ua tub saab.
“Tsw xob ua cuav timkhawv ab ham luas lwm tug.
“Tsw xob ua sab hlub xaav tau luas vaaj luas tsev, tsw xob ua sab hlub xaav tau luas tug quaspuj hab luas tug tub qhe nkauj qhev, luas tej nyuj tej neeg luav lossws ib yaam daabtsw kws yog luas le.”
Thaus cov pejxeem suavdawg nov xub nthe pum tsag lig xub lab quas vog hab nov lub suab raaj kub yaaj nrov hab pum paa nchu hlub sau lub roob, puab ntshai heev tshee quas nyo. Puab nyob deb deb
hab has rua Mauxe tas, “Koj ca le has rua peb xwb, peb yuav noog. Tsw xob ca Vaajtswv has rua peb tsaam tes peb tuag.”
Mauxe txhad has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Tsw xob ntshai, tsua qhov Vaajtswv nqeg lug swm mej lub sab xwb, sub mej txhad le paub ntshai nwg tsw tu ncua le hab mej txhad tsw ua txhum.”
Cov pejxeem nyob deb deb tassws Mauxe txaav moog ze qhov kws tsaus ntuj nti kws Vaajtswv nyob.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le has rua cov Yixayee le nuav tas, ‘Mej tub pum lawm tas kuv has sau ntuj lug rua mej.
Mej muaj kuv lawm mas tsw xob ua txoov daab nyaj lossws txoov daab kub rua mej pe.

Koj yuav tsum xuas aav ua lub thaaj xyeem rua kuv, hab sau lub thaaj hov koj yuav tsum muab koj tej yaaj tej nyuj tua ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo. Huv txhua lub chaw kws kuv tu kuas ncu txug kuv lub npe, mas kuv yuav lug ntswb koj hab foom koob moov rua koj.
Yog koj xuas pob zeb ua lub thaaj xyeem rua kuv, tsw xob muab tej pob zeb kws tub txhwm lawm lug ua. Yog koj swv cuab yeej txhwm pob zeb mas koj ua rua lub thaaj qas tsw huv lawm.
Hab tsw xob nce tug ntaiv moog rua sau kuv lub thaaj, sub luas txhad tsw pum koj chaw txaaj muag.’ ”
“Ntawm nuav moog yog tej kevcai kws koj yuav tsum qha rua puab paub.
Yog mej yuav ib tug tuabneeg Henplais ua qhev, nwg yuav ua koj qhev rau xyoo xwb, xyoo kws xyaa nwg yuav dim tsw txug txhwv.
Yog tug qhev ntawd lug ib leeg xwb nwg kuj dim ib leeg moog, yog nwg muaj quaspuj lug hab, tug quaspuj kuj nrug nwg dim hab.
Yog tug lospaav yuav quaspuj rua nwg hab yug tau tub lossws ntxhais, tug quaspuj hab cov mivnyuas hov tseed ua tug lospaav le qhev, nwg dim ib leeg xwb.
Tassws yog tug qhev has tseeb tas, ‘Kuv nyam tug lospaav hab kuv quaspuj mivnyuas, kuv tsw xaav tawm moog nyob ywj pheej.’

Mas tug lospaav yuav coj nwg moog cuag Vaajtswv,  coj nwg moog rua ntawm lub qhov rooj lossws ntawm ob tug puab rooj, mas tug lospaav yuav xuas koob laum nwg taub ntsej hov ntawd mas nwg yuav ua tug lospaav qhev moog taag nwg swm neej.
“Yog leejtwg muab nwg tug ntxhais muag ua qhev, mas tug ntxhais hov yuav tsw dim yaam le lwm tug tub qhe.

Yog nwg tsw hum tug lospaav kws xaiv nwg lug ua nam yau lub sab, mas tug lospaav yuav ca leej txwv txhwv nwg. Tug lospaav tsw muaj cai muab nwg muag rua lwm haiv tuabneeg, tsua qhov nwg ua tsw ncaaj rua tug ntxhais hov.
Yog tug lospaav yuav tug ntxhais hov rua nwg tug tub ua quaspuj, nwg yuav tsum ua zoo rua tug ntxhais hov ib yaam le ua rua nwg tej ntxhais.
Yog nwg yuav lwm tug lug ua nam yau, nwg yuav tsum pub nam hlub noj sws luag naav sws luag hab pw ua ke sws luag ib yaam le qub.
Yog nwg tsw ua peb yaam nuav mas tug ntxhais hov yuav dim dawb tsw txug muab nyaj txhwv.
“Leejtwg ntaus tuabneeg tuag, mas nwg yuav raug lub txem tuag.
Tassws tsw yog nwg txhob txwm tua, kuas yog Vaajtswv ca tug hov tuag rua huv nwg txhais teg, mas kuv yuav npaaj ib lub chaw ca rua nwg tswv moog nyob.
Tassws yog nwg txhob txwm xaav tswvyim phem moog ntaus tuabneeg tuag, mas koj yuav muab nwg nqug ntawm kuv lub thaaj moog, rau txem kuas tuag.
“Leejtwg ntaus nwg nam nwg txwv tug hov yuav raug txem tuag.
“Leejtwg nyag tuabneeg moog muag lossws tseed ca nyob ntawm nwg txhais teg kuj xwj, nwg yuav raug txem tuag.
“Leejtwg tshev foom nwg nam nwg txwv tsw zoo yuav raug txem tuag.
“Yog muaj ob leeg sws caav sws tshe es ib tug xuas pob zeb ntaus lossws nkaug nrwg raug ib tug, kuas tsw tuag tsuas yog mob pw huv txaaj xwb,

yog tug kws raug mob hov sawv taug tuav tug paas nreg moog tau nrau zoov huv tsev, mas tug kws ntaus hov kuj dim nwg lub txem, tsuas yog nwg yuav them tej nqe swjhawm kws raug mob, hab tu tug mob hov kuas zoo hlo.
“Yog leejtwg xuas qws ntaus nwg tej tub qhe nkauj qhev es tug qhev hov tuag, tug hov yuav tsum raug txav txem.
Yog tug qhev hov nyob tau ib nub lossws ob nub tug lospaav yuav tsw raug txav txem, tsua qhov tug qhev hov yog nwg teej tug.

“Yog ob tug txwvneej sws ntaus es tsua ntaus raug ib tug quaspuj kws suab mivnyuas ua rua pob mivnyuas tassws tug quaspuj tsw muaj le caag, mas yuav nplua tug kws ntaus hov npaum le nwg tug quasyawg hu nqe hab nwg yuav them npaum le cov kws tu plaub tu.
Tassws yog puag xwm le caag, kuj yuav muab sav pauj sav,
qhov muag pauj qhov muag, kaug nav pauj kaug nav, teg pauj teg, taw pauj taw,
qhov kub nyab pauj qhov kub nyab, qhov txhaab pauj qhov txhaab, qhov ntsoog pauj qhov ntsoog.
“Yog leejtwg ntaus nwg tug tub qhe nkauj qhev qhov muag nwg txhad dig lawm, nwg yuav tsum muab tug qhev hov tso dim dawb vem tim lub qhov muag dig lawm.
Yog nwg ntaus nwg tug tub qhe nkauj qhev ua rua luv nav, nwg yuav tsum muab tug qhev hov tso dim dawb vem tim tug nav hov luv lawm.
“Yog nyuj nraus tug yawm twg los tug puj twg tuag, yuav tsum muab pob zeb ntaus tug nyuj hov kuas tuag, hab tsw xob noj cov nqaj nyuj hlo le. Tassws tug tswv nyuj ntawd tsw txhum.

Tassws yog tug nyuj hov tub txeev nraus lwm tug tuabneeg lawm hab muaj tuabneeg tuaj qha rua tug tswv paub lawm tassws tug tswv tsw muab kaw ca, tug nyuj txhad le nraus quaspuj lossws quasyawg tuag, mas tug nyuj yuav tsum raug pob zeb ntaus tuag hab tug tswv kuj yuav raug txem tuag.
Yog luas hu nqe txhwv tug tswv nyuj, nwg yuav tsum them nqe txhwv nwg txujsa npaum le luas hu.
Yog tug nyuj hov nraus leejtwg le tub los ntxhais kuj yuav txav txem rua tug tswv lawv le tuab txuj kevcai nuav.
Yog tug nyuj hov nraus ib tug tub qhe lossws nkauj qhev, tug tswv nyuj yuav them peb caug sekhee nyaj  rua tug lospaav, hab tug nyuj yuav raug pob zeb ntaus tuag.
“Yog leejtwg qheb qhov ca lossws khawb qhov tsw muab faus, es nyuj lossws neeg luav poob rua huv,
mas tug tswv kws khawb qhov yuav tsum them tug tsaj hov nqe. Nwg yuav them nqe rua tug tswv tsaj, es nwg yuav tug tsaj tuag hov.
“Yog leejtwg tug nyuj nraus lwm tug le nyuj tuag, yuav tsum muab tug nyuj kws nraus hov muag hab muab cov nqe faib rua ob tog, hab muab tug nyuj kws tuag faib rua ob tog hab.
Yog paub tas tug nyuj hov txeev nraus lug lawm kuas tug tswv tsw muab kaw, tug tswv nyuj yuav tsum them ib tug nyuj pauj tug nyuj kws tuag, es nwg yuav tug nyuj kws tuag hov.”
“Yog leejtwg nyag nyuj lossws yaaj moog tua lossws muab muag, nwg yuav tsum them tswb tug nyuj pauj ib tug nyuj, hab them plaub tug yaaj pauj ib tug yaaj.
“Yog leejtwg pum tub saab saamswm tho qhov vaaj qhov tsev es txawm ntaus tug tub saab hov tuag, mas nwg yuav tsw muaj txem.
Yog lub nub tawm lawm tug kws ntaus hov yuav muaj lub txem kws tua tuabneeg. “Tug tub saab yuav tsum them pauj. Yog nwg tsw muaj daabtsw them, yuav tsum muab nwg muag lug them tej kws nwg nyag lawm.
Yog nrhav tau tej tsaj kws nyag huv nwg txhais teg tseed caj sa, tsw has nyuj, neeg luav los yaaj, tub saab yuav them ob npaug.

“Yog leejtwg tso tsaj moog noj zaub huv teb lossws huv vaaj txwv maab, es nwg ca tej tsaj hov tswv lug noj qoob loos huv lwm tug le laj teb, nwg yuav tsum muab nwg tej qoob loos kws zoo kawg huv nwg laj teb hab nwg vaaj txwv maab coj moog them.
“Yog leejtwg tis tawg es kub rua tej xyov xuav paug kub moog kis rua luas tej pawg qoob hab tej qoob kws tsw tau hlais hab tej teb kub nyab taag, tug kws tis tawg hov yuav tsum them puv npo rua luas.
“Yog leejtwg muab nyaj txag hov txhua chaw rua kwvtij zej zog khaws ca, es tej nyaj txag hov raug tub saab nyag huv tsev lawm, yog nteg tau tub saab, tub saab yuav them ob npaug
Yog nteg tsw tau tub saab, tug tswv tsev yuav moog cuag Vaajtswv,  yuav tshuaj saib nwg txhais teg tau nyag tug kwvtij hov le hov txhua chaw los tsw tau.

“Txhua tshaaj plaub kws muaj tuabneeg tuaj has, tsw has nyuj, neeg luav, yaaj, los rwg tsho lossws ib yaam daabtsw kws pluj lawm, yog muaj ib tug tuaj has tas, ‘Yaam nuav yog kuv le,’ mas ob tog yuav coj tshaaj plaub hov moog cuag Vaajtswv.  Vaajtswv yuav txav cai tas leejtwg txhum mas tug hov yuav tsum them ob npaug.
“Yog leejtwg muab nwg le neeg luav los nyuj los yaaj lossws lwm yaam tsaj rua kwvtij zej zog saib, es tug tsaj hov tuag lossws raug mob lossws muaj tuabneeg muab lawv moog lawm tsw muaj leejtwg pum,

mas tug kws txais saib tug tsaj hov yuav tsum twv rua tug tswv tsaj taab meeg Yawmsaub xubndag saib nwg txhais teg tau nyag tug kwvtij hov le hov txhua chaw. Mas tug tswv tsaj yuav tsum yeem hab tug kws txais saib hov tsw txug them daabtsw le.
Tassws yog tug tsaj raug tub saab nyag mas tug kws saib yuav tsum them rua tug tswv tsaj.
Yog tas raug tsaj nyaum muab tum dua taag lawm mas nwg yuav tsum coj lub cev tuag hov lug rua tug tswv pum. Tug kws saib tsw txug them tug tsaj kws raug muab dua taag lawm.
“Yog leejtwg qev kwvtij zej zog le tsaj txhu es tug tsaj hov raug mob lossws tuag rua thaus tug tswv tsw nyob ntawd, tug kws qev yuav tsum them puv npo.
Yog tug tswv nyob ntawd hab, tug kws qev tsw txug them. Yog ndav lug swv kuj yuav them nqe ndav xwb.

“Yog leejtwg moog daag ntxag tug hluas nkauj kws tsw tau deev dua hluas nraug hab tsw tau muaj leejtwg qhab, hab nrug tug ntxhais hov pw lawm, mas nwg yuav tsum them cov nqe mig nqe no hab yuav tug ntxhais hov ua nwg quaspuj.
Yog leej txwv tsw yeem muab tug ntxhais hov qua rua nwg, tug kws daag hov yuav tsum them npaum le kws nqe mig nqe no kws yuav tug ntxhais tsw tau deev dua hluas nraug.
“Tug puj kws ua txwv neeb txwv yaig tsw xob tseg nwg muaj txujsa nyob.
“Leejtwg deev tsaj txhu yuav tsum raug txem tuag.
“Leejtwg tua tsaj xyeem rua tej timtswv kws tsw yog Yawmsaub yuav raug muab ua kuas puam tsuaj taag.
“Mej tsw xob tswm txom hab quab yuam lwm haiv tuabneeg tsua qhov mej txeev ua lwm haiv tuabneeg nyob huv Iyi tebchaws.
Tsw xob tsuj yuam tej puj ntsuag hab tej mivnyuas ntsuag.
Yog mej tsuj yuam puab es puab quaj thov txug kuv, kuv yeej yuav noog puab lub suab quaj,
mas kuv txujkev npau tawg yuav npau quas vog tuaj hab kuv yuav xuas ntaaj tua mej. Mej tej quaspuj kuj yuav ua puj ntsuag hab mej tej mivnyuas yuav ua mivnyuas tsw muaj txwv.
“Yog mej muab nyaj txais rua kuv haiv tuabneeg tug twg kws pluag hab nrug mej nyob, tsw xob ua le tug kws muab tso txhawb hab tsw xob xaam paaj nyag rua nwg.
Yog mej tau txais kwvtij zej zog lub tsho ntev yuam nqe rua mej, mej yuav xaa lub tsho rov qaab ua ntej kws nub tsw tau poob qho,

tsua qhov nwg muaj tuab lub tsho hov naav npug nwg lub cev. Tsw ua le ntawd thaus nwg moog pw nwg yuav muaj daabtsw npua? Yog nwg quaj thov txug kuv, kuv yuav noog, tsua qhov kuv muaj lub sab taab ncuab.
“Mej tsw xob thuaj Vaajtswv lossws tsawm foom cov kws kaav mej cov tuabneeg.
“Tsw xob sej ntev, ca le coj mej tej qoob loos zoo zoo hab txhua yaam kua txwv ntawm lub chaw tsuam tuaj xyeem rua Vaajtswv. “Hab yuav muab mej tug tub hlub pub rua kuv.
Mej tej nyuj hab mej tej yaaj kuj ua ib yaam le ntawd. Ca nrug leej nam nyob xyaa nub. Mas nub kws yim coj tuaj pub rua kuv.
“Mej yuav ua tuabneeg dawb huv rua kuv. Yog le nuav tej tsaj kws raug tsaj nyaum muab tum tuag tom tshaav zaub mej tsw xob noj, ca le muab pov tseg rua dev noj.”
“Tsw xob coj tej lug daag moog pav rua u rua nuav. Tsw xob nrug cov tuabneeg phem koom sab ua cuav timkhawv.
Tsw xob lawv cov tuabneeg feem coob moog ua phem. Tsw xob ua timkhawv lawv kua cov tuabneeg feem coob, yog ua le ntawd yuav tu plaub tsw ncaaj.
Thaus muaj plaub tsw xob tuaj hlo tug tuabneeg pluag tog.
“Yog mej ntswb tej yeeb ncuab tug nyuj lossws tug neeg luav tswv tuaj mas mej ca le muab xaa rov qaab moog rua tug tswv kuas tau.
Yog mej pum tug tuabneeg kws ntxub mej tug neeg luav qaug vem yog thauj nraa nyaav mas tsw xob ca qaug le hov, ca le paab muab tsaa kuas sawv.
“Thaus muaj plaub mas tsw xob tu tsw ncaaj rua cov tuabneeg pluag.
Yog luas tuaj kom plaub tsw ncaaj mas tsw xob quav ntsej, tsw xob muab tug kws tsw txhum hab ua ncaaj tua pov tseg, tsua qhov kuv yuav tsw zaam txem rua cov tuabneeg limham.
Tsw xob yuav tej nyaj xab vem yog tej nyaj xab yuav ua rua tej num tswv dig muag hab yuav muab tug kws muaj cai ntxeev ua swb cai.
“Mej tsw xob tswm txom lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob, tsua qhov mej yeej paub lwm haiv tuabneeg txujkev nyuaj sab lawm vem mej txeev ua lwm haiv tuabneeg rua huv Iyi tebchaws lawm.
“Mej yuav cog qoob cog loos sau qoob sau loos huv mej tej teb rau xyoo xwb,

mas xyoo kws xyaa ca tej teb su muab tso tseg ca rua tej tuabneeg pluag tau moog de lug noj. Yog tseed tshuav seem kuj ca rua tej tsaj qus noj. Mej tej vaaj txwv maab vaaj txwv aulib kuj ua ib yaam nkaus le ntawd hab.

“Mej ua mej tej num rau nub xwb mas nub kws xyaa mej yuav tsum su, mej tej nyuj tej neeg luav txhad tau su hab mej tug nkauj qhev le tub hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob txhad le tau su lug sav.
Mej yuav tsum ceev faaj coj txhua yaam kws kuv tub qha rua mej lawm huvsw. Tsw xob tuav lwm tug daab lub npe hlo le. Tsw xob tsaa ncauj has tej daab npe hlo le.
“Ib xyoos mej yuav tsum ua peb zag kevcai noj haus xyeem rua kuv.

Mej yuav tsum ncu ntsoov coj kevcai noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb. Mej yuav tsum noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb kuas puv xyaa nub. Mej yuav noj rua lub swjhawm kws teem ca huv lub hli Anpis  lawv le kuv has rua mej lawd, vem yog lub hli hov mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug. Tsw xob tuaj pe kuv teg dawb teg nplag.

“Mej yuav tsum ncu ntsoov ua kevcai rua thaus hlais qoob loos taag, yog xyeem thawj phaum qoob loos kws cog huv mej tej teb lug rua kuv. “Mej yuav tsum ncu ntsoov ua kevcai sau qoob loos taag rua thaus lub qaab xyoo yuav taag, yog thaus kws mej tub sau txhua yaam qoob loos huv teb lug txug vaaj txug tsev tav taag lawm.
Mej cov txwvneej suavdawg yuav tsum tuaj cuag Vaajtswv Yawmsaub lub xubndag ib xyoos peb zag.
“Tsw xob muab cov ntshaav tsaj kws tua xyeem rua kuv xyeem nrug cov ncuav xyaw keeb ua ke. Tsw xob tseg tug tsaj kws tua xyeem rua kuv hov cov roj ca nyob moog txug kaaj ntug.

“Thawj phaum qoob loos kws mej sau huv mej tej teb lug mas coj tej kws zoo kawg nkaus tuaj xyeem rua huv Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lub tsev. “Tsw xob muab tug nam tshws cov kua mig lug hau tug mivnyuas tshws.
“Mej swm saib, kuv yuav khaiv ib tug tubkhai ntuj ua mej ntej tsom kwm mej taug kev hab coj mej moog kuas txug lub chaw kws kuv npaaj tseg rua mej lawd.
Yuav tsum muab sab rau noog tug tubkhai hov has hab ua lawv le nwg tej lug. Tsw xob tawv ncauj ntawm nwg, tsua qhov nwg yuav tsw zaam txem rua mej vem kuv nyob huv nwg.
Yog mej muab sab rau noog nwg tej lug hab ua txhua yaam kws kuv has rua mej, mas kuv yuav ua yeeb ncuab rua mej cov yeeb ncuab, hab yuav tawm tsaam cov kws tawm tsaam mej.

“Kuv tug tubkhai yuav ua mej ntej coj mej kev moog txug cov Amaulai, cov Hithai, cov Pelixai, cov Khana‑aa, cov Hivai hab cov Yenpu tej tebchaws, mas kuv yuav muab puab cov tuabneeg hov rhuav tshem huvsw moog.
Tsw xob pe tsw xob teev puab tej daab. Tsw xob coj lawv le puab tej kevcai daab. Mej yuav tsum muab puab tej txoov daab rhuav pov tseg hab muab puab tej ncej kws teev daab tsoo kuas pob taag huvsw.
Mej yuav tsum pe hawm Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, kuv txhad foom moov rua mej tej zaub mov hab rua mej tej dej haus. Kuv yuav sau tej mob nkeeg huv mej huvsw moog.
Cov quaspuj yuav tsw muaj ib tug pob mivnyuas, yuav tsw muaj ib tug kws mooj rua huv mej lub tebchaws. Kuv yuav pub mej muaj txuj sa luj sa ntev.
Kuv lub moo yuav ua mej ntej moog ua rua cov tuabneeg suavdawg kws mej yuav ntswb huv lub tebchaws hov ntshai raag zum quas zawg hab ua rua mej cov yeeb ncuab suavdawg tig hlo tswv.
Kuv yuav tso nkawj tso daiv  ua mej ntej moog lawv cov Hivai, cov Khana‑aa hab cov Hithai kuas tswv ntawm mej hauv ntej moog.
Kuv yuav tsw ua tuab xyoo muab puab lawv tswv tawm taag tsaam tes lub tebchaws tsua faab quas nyo hab tej tsaj qus fuam vaam coob lug txuv mej.
Kuv yuav lawv kuas puab tswv zuj quas zug ntawm mej hauv ntej moog txug thaus kws mej fuam vaam coob coob es mej txeeb hlo tau lub tebchaws hov ua mej tug.

Kuv yuav tu nrwm teb rua mej txwj nrho ntawm Havtxwv Lab moog txug ncua cov Filixatee lub Havtxwv  hab txwj nrho ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua moog txug tug dej Yufeti. Kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov cob rua huv mej txhais teg mas mej yuav muab puab lawv tau tswv ntawm mej hauv ntej moog.
Koj tsw xob nrug puab lossws puab tej daab sws cog lug daabtsw le.

Tsw xob kheev puab nrug mej nyob huv mej lub tebchaws hlo le ntshai tsaam puab yuav yum kuas mej moog ua txhum rua kuv. Yog mej moog teev puab tej daab mas qhov ntawd yeej yuav ua rooj hlua kws cuab mej ntaag.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Koj hab Aloo hab Nanta hab Anpihu hab Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug xyaa caum leej ca le nce tuaj cuag Yawmsaub hab nyob deb deb pe hawm nwg.
Ca Mauxe tuab leeg txaav lug ze Yawmsaub xwb, dua le lwm tug mas tsw xob txaav lug ze, hab tsw xob kheev cov pejxeem nrug Mauxe nce tuaj le.”
Mauxe txhad coj Yawmsaub tej lug hab tej kevcai huvsw lug qha rua cov pejxeem paub. Cov pejxeem suavdawg teb tuab lub suab has tas, “Txhua lu lug kws Yawmsaub has ntawd peb yuav ua lawv le.”
Mauxe txawm muab Yawmsaub txhua lu lug sau ca. Nwg sawv ntxuv tseeg tib ib lub thaaj kws xyeem hov txhua chaw rua ntawm taw roob hab muab kaum ob tug ncej zeb lug txhus lawv le kaum ob xeem Yixayee.
Nwg khaiv cov tub hluas Yixayee moog muab tsaj hlawv kheej xyeem hab muab nyuj tua xyeem rua Yawmsaub ua kevcai sws raug zoo.
Mauxe muab cov ntshaav khaws ca ib nraab rua huv tej phaaj, hab muab ib nraab nchus rua lub thaaj.
Nwg muab phoo ntawv kws sau Yawmsaub tej lug cog tseg nyeem rua cov pejxeem noog. Cov pejxeem has tas, “Txhua lu lug kws Yawmsaub has ntawd peb yuav ua lawv nraim, peb yuav noog nwg lug.”
Mauxe muab cov ntshaav nchus rua cov pejxeem hab has tas, “Cov ntshaav nuav yog lub hom thawj kws nas rua tej lug cog tseg kws Yawmsaub ua rua mej lawv le tej lug kws has taag nuav huvsw.”
Thaus hov Mauxe hab Aloo hab Nanta hab Anpihu hab Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug xyaa caum leej kuj nce moog,
mas puab pum Yixayee tug Vaajtswv. Vaajtswv lub chaw tag taw yog ib daim txag zeb zoo yaam nkaus le qai zeb phaithu yimlaaj, ntshab yaam nkaus le qaab ntuj.
Vaajtswv tsw ua le caag rua Yixayee cov thawj, puab tau pum Vaajtswv hab puab tau noj haus.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le nce tuaj cuag kuv sau lub roob hab nyob ntawd tog. Kuv yuav muab tej txag zeb kws muaj kuv txuj kevcai hab kuv tej lug kws kuv sau ca qha puab.”
Mauxe txhad sawv tseeg nrug nwg tug tub qhe Yausua nce moog sau Vaajtswv lub roob.
Hab Mauxe has rua cov kev txwj quas laug tas, “Mej nyob ntawm nuav tog txug thaus ib rov lug txug mej. Aloo hab Hawj nrug mej nyob. Leejtwg muaj plaub kuj moog cuag tau ob tug.”
Tes Mauxe txawm nce moog sau lub roob lawm, muaj ib tauv fuab lug laum nkaus lub roob.
Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab lug rua sau lub roob Xinai, mas tauv fuab laum lub roob hov tau rau nub. Nub kws xyaa Yawmsaub hu huv tauv fuab tuaj rua Mauxe.
Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm rua cov Yixayee pum yaam nkaus le nplaim tawg kub ceev sau lub hauv roob.
Mauxe nkaag moog rua huv tauv fuab hab nce moog rua sau lub roob. Mauxe nyob sau lub roob tau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Has rua cov Yixayee coj hov txhua chaw tuaj pub rua kuv. Koj ca le txais ntawm txhua tug kws zoo sab pub rua kuv.
Cov hov txhua chaw kws koj yuav txais ntawm puab hov, yog kub hab nyaj hab tooj lab,
hab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo hab plaub tshws,
hab cov tawv txwv yaaj kws muab foo lab lawd, hab cov tawv ntshuab havtxwv, hab ntoo kub twg,
hab roj saam lub teeb, hab tej txum lom kws xyaw cov roj tsw qaab swv ua kevcai tsaa, hab xyaw cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab,
hab cov qai zeb av txho ci laam lug hab tej qai zeb hlaws muaj nqes kws muab xaws lu rua lub tsho efauj  hab lub awv.
Kuas puab ua ib thaaj chaw pe hawm kuv sub kuv txhad le nyob huv plawv puab.
Mej yuav tsum ua kuv lub tsev hab ua tej pestwj kws swv rua huv lub tsev lawv le tug qauv kws kuv yuav qha txhua yaam rua koj huvsw.
“Puab yuav tsum muab ntoo kub twg ua lub swb xaab, ntev ob tshwm txhais, daav ib tshwm txhais, hab sab ib tshwm txhais.
Muab cov tseem kub luam taag nrho lub swb xaab hov saab huv saab nrau huvsw hab muab kub ua ib tug caaj ntswg puag ncig lub swb xaab.
Muab kub nchuav ua plaub lub ntsej tis rua plaub tug taw swb xaab, yog ua ib saab ob lub ntsej.
Muab ntoo kub twg ua ob tug laag kwv hab muab kub luam ob tug laag hov huvsw,
mas muab ntxwg rua cov ntsej ntawm lub swb xaab ob saab txhad kwv tau lub swb xaab hov.
Ca ob tug laag hov nyob huv tsw xob rhu le.
Ca le muab ob daim txag zeb kws sau kuv tej lug kws kuv yuav muab rua koj tso rua huv lub swb xaab.
“Muab cov tseem kub ua lub hau swb xaab kws roog kev txhum,  ntev ob tshwm txhais, daav ib tshwm txhais.
Muab kub ntaus ua ob tug Khelunpee  txawb rua ob tog hau swb xaab kws roog kev txhum.
Ua ob tug Khelunpee hov ib tug nyob ib tog hau sws xaab lu keev xeeb nkaus rua lub hau swb xaab.
Ua ob tug hov nthuav tis lug roog sau lub hau swb xaab, ob tug hov tig ndag ua ke, yog tig lug saib lub hau swb xaab kws roog kev txhum.
Muab ob daim txag zeb kws sau kuv tej lug kws kuv yuav muab rua koj tso rua huv lub swb xaab hab muab lub hau swb xaab kaw rua.

Kuv yuav nyob sau lub hau swb xaab kws roog kev txhum huv plawv ob tug Khelunpee kws nyob sau lub swb xaab sws cog lug mas kuv yuav ntswb koj hov ntawd hab muab kuv tej kevcai txhua zaaj rua koj coj moog qha rua cov Yixayee.
“Koj yuav muab ntoo kub twg ua ib lub rooj ntev ob tshwm daav ib tshwm hab sab ib tshwm txhais.
Muab cov tseem kub luam lub rooj hov huvsw hab muab kub ua ib tug caaj ntswg puag ncig lub rooj hov.
Ua ib daim txag daav ib xwb thaiv puag ncig lub npoo rooj hab muab kub ua ib tug caaj ntswg lu puag ncig daim txag hov.
Muab kub ua plaub lub ntsej tis rua plaub lub kaum rooj kws ncaaj plaub tug ceg rooj.
Muab cov ntsej hov lu ze ze daim txag txhad ntxwg tau laag kwv.
Muab ntoo kub twg ua ob tug laag kwv hab muab kub luam ob tug laag huvsw txhad kwv tau lub rooj.
Muab cov tseem kub ua tej taig plab taig ntim rau moov tshuaj tsw qaab, hab taig phaaj hab tej paav laam fwj kws laub cawv txwv maab xyeem.
Yuav tsum muab cov ncuav kws xyeem rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag tso rua sau lub rooj rua ntawm kuv lub xubndag moog le.
“Koj yuav muab cov tseem kub ua ib tug kaav teeb. Ntaus ua lub taw hab tug ncej teeb, hab ua cov taig zoo le paaj hab cov qa paaj hab cov nplai paaj lu keev xeeb nkaus rua tug kaav teeb.
Tug kaav teeb nuav ncau ua rau ceg, ib saab ncau peb ceg.
Txhua ceg muaj peb lub paaj zoo le paaj txwv duaj, txhua lub paaj muaj lub qa paaj hab cov nplai paaj rua rau ceg kws ncau ntawm tug kaav teeb huvsw.
Tug tseem kaav teeb muaj plaub lub paaj txwv duaj kws muaj lub qa paaj hab cov nplai paaj huvsw.
Rau ceg ntawd txhua nkawm ceg kws ncau ntawm tug kaav teeb muaj ib lub qa paaj nyob huv qaab.
Cov qa paaj ntawd hab cov ceg teeb lu keev xeeb nkaus rua tug kaav teeb, yuav muab cov tseem kub ntaus ua xwb.
Ua xyaa lub teeb hab muab txawb sau xyaa ceg teeb hov es taws kuas ci moog rua ntawm cov teeb hov saab xubndag.
Muab cov tseem kub ua raab txab kws txav teeb xeeb hab ua lub phaaj plab kws rau txab.
Muab cov tseem kub nyaav ib talaa  ua lub teeb kub hab tej pestwj kws swv ntawm lub teeb hov.
Yuav tsum ceev faaj ua txhua yaam lawv le tug qauv kws kuv has rua koj sau lub roob.”

“Hab koj yuav muab kaum chaws ntaub maag ua Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub, yuav muab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo hab muab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab ntus ua, hab kuas cov Kws txawj ntus ua duab Khelunpee  rua huv.
Ib chaws ntaub ntev neeg nkaum yim tshwm daav plaub tshwm, txhua chaws ntaub daav ntev ib yaam nkaus.
Muab tswb chaws ntaub xaws ua ke ua ib daig, muab tswb chaws xaws ua ib daig.
Muab cov ntaub xav xaws ua ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ib, hab ua ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ob ib yaam nkaus.
Ua tswb caug lub ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ib, hab ua tswb caug lub ntsej rua daim kws ob, saab npoo kws txuas ua ke kuas sws ncaaj nkaus,
hab muab kub lug ua tswb caug lub khawb lug khawm ob daig ntaub hov kuas ua hlo ib daig ua Yawmsaub lub tsev.
“Muab plaub tshws lug ntus ua kaum ib chaws ntaub vuv hlo Yawmsaub lub tsev,
ib chaws ntaub ntev peb caug tshwm daav plaub tshwm, kaum ib chaws ntaub daav ntev ib yaam nkaus.
Muab tswb chaws ntaub xaws ua ke ua ib daig, muab rau chaws xaws ua ib daig mas daim kws rau muab quav rov rua sau qhov rooj lub tsev ntaub.
Ua tswb caug lub ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ib, hab ua tswb caug lub ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ob,
hab muab tooj lab ua tswb caug lub khawb lug khawm ob daig ntaub ntawm cov ntsej kuas ua hlo ib daig.
Daim ntaub kws vuv lub tsev es tshaaj ib nraab daim hov, mas yuav muab tso dauv rua nraus qaum tsev.
Daim ntaub kws vuv lub tsev ntaub mas ua tshaaj rua ob saab, ib saab tshaaj ib tshwm txhad le kauv tau lub tsev ob saab huvsw.
Hab yuav muab cov tawv txwv yaaj kws foo lab lawd lug ua ntaub vuv lub tsev ntaub hab muab cov tawv ntshuab havtxwv lug ua ntaub vuv txheej sau.
“Muab ntoo kub twg lug ua taab tsaa xov kuv lub tsev.
Cov taab ntawd ntev kaum tshwm daav ib tshwm txhais.
Ib daim txag taab mas qhais ua ob tug taw txhad txuas tau ua ke. Ua txhua daim txag taab le nuav coj lug ua kuv lub tsev.
Ua neeg nkaum daim txag taab xov kuv lub tsev saab nraag,
hab muab nyaj ua plaub caug tug taw tag neeg nkaum daim txag taab le taw, ib daim txag taab ntxwg rua ob tug taw.
Ua neeg nkaum daim txag taab xov kuv lub tsev saab peg,
hab muab nyaj ua plaub caug tug taw tag huv taw, ib daim txag taab ntxwg rua huv ob tug taw tag.
Ua rau daim txag taab xov kuv lub tsev saab qaum tsev kws nub poob.
Ua ob daim txag taab xov ob lub kaum tsev ntaub kws yog saab qaum tsev.
Ob daim txag taab hov mas huv taw muab ib daim txawb qag mivntswv rua saab nrau, sau hauv txag muab teem ti nkaus lub ntsej sau kawg. Ua le nuav rua ob lub kaum tsev ntaub.
Saab nub poob muaj yim daim txag taab xov hab muaj kaum rau tug taw nyaj tag huv taw, ib daim txag taab ntxwg rua ob tug taw.
“Muab ntoo kub twg ua tswb tug laag tuav kuv lub tsev ib saab phaab ntsaa,
hab ua tswb tug laag rua dua ib saab hab ua tswb tug rua saab qaum tsev kws nub poob.
Tug laag nruab nraab kws tuav cov txag taab yuav ntev keev hlo txwj ib lub kaum tsev txug ncua ib lub kaum tsev.
Muab kub luam cov txag taab hov hab muab kub ua cov ntsej kws ntxwg cov laag hov, hab muab kub luam cov laag huvsw.
Tsaa kuv lub tsev hov lawv le tug qauv kws kuv tub has rua koj sau lub roob.
“Muab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ua ib daim ntaub thaiv, hab kuas cov Kws txawj ntus ntus ua duab Khelunpee rua huv.
Muab daim ntaub nuav dai rua sau cov nqai lauj kub kws nyob ntawm plaub tug ncej ntoo kub twg kws muab kub luam rua hab muab ntxwg rua huv plaub tug taw nyaj tag ncej.

Mas muab daim ntaub cov ntsej khuab rua cov nqai lauj es muab lub swb xaab sws cog lug tso rua chaav huv daim ntaub hov, mas daim ntaub hov yuav kem lub tsev ntaub chaav kws dawb huv hab chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus.
Muab lub hau swb xaab kws roog kev txhum kaw rua lub swb xaab sws cog lug huv lub chaw kws dawb huv kawg nkaus.
Muab lub rooj txawb rua nrau daim ntaub saab peg, muab lub teeb xyaa ceg txawb rua saab nraag ncaaj ntawm lub rooj.
“Muab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ua ib daim ntaub ua lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub, hab ua paaj ntaub rua.
Muab ntoo kub twg ua tswb tug ncej hab muab kub ua nqai lauj khuab daim ntaub hov, hab muab tooj lab nchuav ua tswb tug taw tag cov ncej hov.”
“Koj yuav muab ntoo kub twg ua lub thaaj kws hlawv hov txhua chaw xyeem, ua daav xwm faab xwm meem, ntev tswb tshwm, daav tswb tshwm, sab peb tshwm.
Ua plaub tug kub rua sau plaub lub kaum thaaj, yuav npawm keev hlo ntawm lub thaaj lug, hab muab tooj lab luam lub thaaj huvsw.
Muab tooj lab ua txhua yaam pestwj kws swv rua sau lub thaaj, yuav ua tej laug yawm tshauv, tej duav phuaj, tej phaaj, tej muv chob nqaj, hab ua tej yag rau ncaig tawg.
Muab kaav tooj lab qhab ua ib daim tsuav ntxaij rua lub thaaj hab muab tooj lab ua plaub lub ntsej tis rua plaub lub kaum tsuav ntxaij
hab muab tso rua huv lub thaaj hlauv kuas dhau tug caaj ntswg rua saab huv txug ib nraab thaaj.
Muab ntoo kub twg ua cov laag kwv lub thaaj hab muab tooj lab luam cov laag hov.
Muab cov laag ntxwg rua cov ntsej kws nyob ntawm lub thaaj ob saab kwv.
Muab txag ua lub thaaj hov tseg lub plawv thaaj kuas khoob. Ua lub thaaj hov lawv nraim le kws kuv qha koj sau lub roob.
“Yuav tsum tseg tshaav puam ib ncig kuv lub tsev. Saab nraag mas muab ib chaws ntaub kws muab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ntus ua ntev ib puas tshwm xov rua,
hab yuav neeg nkaum tug ncej hab yuav neeg nkaum tug taw tooj lab tag ncej hab muab nyaj ua nqai lauj rua cov ncej hab ua thi rua sau cov hauv ncej.

Ua ib yaam nkaus le hov rua saab peg. Muab ib chaws ntaub ntev ib puas tshwm lug xov rua hab yuav neeg nkaum tug ncej hab neeg nkaum tug taw tooj lab tag cov ncej hab muab nyaj ua nqai lauj hab ua thi rua sau cov hauv ncej.
Saab nub poob mas muab ib chaws ntaub ntev tswb caug tshwm xov rua hab yuav kaum tug ncej hab kaum tug taw tag ncej.
Saab ntawm rooj vaag kws nub tuaj mas ua daav tswb caug tshwm.
Chaws ntaub kws xov ib saab ntawm rooj vaag mas daav kaum tswb tshwm hab yuav peb tug ncej hab peb tug taw tag ncej.
Chaws ntaub kws xov dua ib saab ntawm rooj vaag mas daav kaum tswb tshwm hab yuav peb tug ncej hab peb tug taw tag ncej.
Muab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ua ib chaws ntaub ntev neeg nkaum tshwm ua lub rooj vaag hab ua paaj rua huv, hab ua plaub tug ncej hab plaub tug taw tag ncej.
Txhua tug ncej laj kaab mas muab nyaj lug ua thi rua sau cov hauv ncej huvsw hab ua cov nqai lauj, hab muab tooj lab ua taw tag ncej huvsw.

Lub laj kaab qhov ntev ib puas tshwm, qhov daav tswb caug tshwm, qhov sab tswb tshwm. Cov ntaub kws xov yuav tsum yog ntaub maag kws muab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ntus ua hab cov taw tag ncej yog muab tooj lab ua.
Tej pestwj kws swv huv kuv lub tsev taag nrho hab tej tswg kws txhus tsaa lub tsev ntaub hab txhus tuav lub laj kaab yuav tsum yog xuas tooj lab ua.
“Koj has rua cov Yixayee kuas muab cov roj aulib kws tsuam lim tau ntshab ntshab coj lug saam lub teeb mas lub teeb txhad le cig tsw tuag le.

Aloo hab nwg cov tub yuav tsum tu lub teeb kws nyob huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb chaav nrau daim ntaub kws thaiv lub swb xaab sws cog lug kuas cig ib mos kaaj ntug le rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag. Nuav yog ib txuj kevcai ruaj khov kws cov Yixayee yuav tsum coj ib tam dhau ib tam moog ib txhws le.”
“Ca le coj koj tug tijlaug Aloo hab nwg cov tub kws yog Nanta, Anpihu, Ele‑axa hab Ithama tawm huv cov Yixayee tuaj cuag koj, puab txhad ua tau pov thawj ua kuv teg num.
Mas koj yuav tsum xaws cev tsoog tsho meej mom dawb huv rua koj tug tijlaug Aloo naav, nwg txhad tau koob meej hab yuav zoo nkauj.
Koj has rua txhua tug kws muaj peevxwm kws kuv tau pub tswvyim rua kuas puab ua Aloo tej tsoog tsho meej mom es txhad tau tsaa Aloo ua pov thawj lug ua kuv teg num.

Puab yuav tsum ua tej tsoog hov lawv le nuav, yog ib lub awv, ib lub tsho efauj,  ib lub tsho ntev, ib lub tsho kws ntus txaij ua qhov muag, hab txuj phuam kws ntoo sau taubhau hab ib txuj hlaab sa, mas puab yuav ua tej tsoog meej mom dawb huv nuav rua koj tug tijlaug Aloo hab nwg cov tub naav, es puab txhad tau ua pov thawj ua kuv teg num.
Kuas puab muab cov xuv kub hab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab, hab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo lug ua.
“Puab yuav tsum muab cov xuv kub hab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab cov xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ntus ua lub tsho efauj zoo nkauj txaij nraug zeeg.
Ua ob pluaj ntaub khuam lub tsho efauj ntawm xub pwg muab teem rua ob saab xub pwg tsho.

Txuj hlaab sa kws ntus zoo zoo kws muab xaws lu rua lub tsho efauj, yuav ua ib yaam nkaus le lub tsho efauj. Muab cov xuv kub hab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab cov xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ntus ua.
Muab ob lub qai zeb av txho ci laam lug txaug Yixayee cov tub le npe rua huv,
mas txaug quas zug tug hlub le npe ua ntej moog txug tug yau, ib lub qai zeb mas txaug rau lub npe rua.
Koj yuav txaug Yixayee cov tub le npe rua huv ob lub qai zeb hov ib yaam nkaus le txaug txwm, hab muab xuv kub qhab ua ob lub taig kub txaij mog mog khawm ob lub qai zeb av txho ci laam lug hov.

Muab ob lub qai zeb nuav xaws lu nkaus rua pluaj ntaub kws khuam lub tsho efauj ntawm ob saab xub pwg, ua lub chaw kws ncu ntsoov Yixayee cov tub, mas Aloo yuav kwv puab cov npe rua sau nwg ob saab xub pwg ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag ua chaw ncu ntsoov.
Muab xuv kub qhab ua ob lub taig txaij mog mog.
Muab cov tseem xuv kub ntxag ua ob txuj saw hab muab ob txuj saw khawm rua ob lub taig kub hov.

“Koj yuav ua ib lub awv zoo nkauj txaij nraug zeeg kws swv txav sab rua cov Yixayee. Muab xuv kub hab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab cov xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ua ib yaam nkaus le ua lub tsho efauj.
Ua lub awv xwm faab daav ib dus ntev ib dus hab huv plawv khoob ua ib lub naab.

Koj yuav muab qai zeb hlaws kws muaj nqes teem ua plaub leej rov ntaav rua ntawm lub awv hov. Leej sau kws yog leej ib mas yog peb lub qai zeb, ib lub qai zeb lab pis tseb, ib lub qai zeb daaj pis lig, ib lub qai zeb ntsuab quas lab.
Leej kws ob mas yog ib lub qai zeb ntsuab txho, ib lub qai zeb phaithu yimlaaj, ib lub qai zeb hlaws av.
Leej kws peb mas yog ib lub qai zeb ntsuab xav, ib lub qai zeb kws txho tawg, ib lub qai zeb yimlaaj zem zwv.

Leej kws plaub mas yog ib lub qai zeb ntsuab pis xab, ib lub qai zeb av txho ci laam lug hab ib lub qai zeb daaj tshab tshab. Mas muab cov xuv kub qhab ua kaum ob lub taig kub txaij mog mog khawm cov qai zeb hov.
Kaum ob lub qai zeb hlaws hov yuav tsum muaj Yixayee cov tub tej npe txaug rua huv ib yaam nkaus le txaug txwm, yuav tsum muaj kaum ob xeem ib xeem zuj zug le npe nyob rua huv.
Muab cov tseem xuv kub ntswj ua ib txuj saw kheej zoo le txuj hlua tis rua lub awv.
Muab kub ua ob lub ntsej mas muab tis rua ob lub kaum awv.
Muab ob txuj qaab saw kub lug khawm rua ob lub ntsej ntawm ob lub kaum awv,
hab muab ob yaav qaab saw sau tis rua ob lub taig kub txaij mog mog kws muab lu rua lub tsho efauj ntawm ob saab xub pwg saab xubndag.
Muab kub ua ob lub ntsej tis rua ob lub kaum awv huv qaab saab huv kws npuas lub tsho efauj.
Muab kub ua ob lub ntsej tis rua ob pluaj ntaub ntawm xub pwg ntawm lub tsho efauj saab xubndag ze kaab lej leeg tsho ntawm txuj hlaab sa kws ntus zoo zoo saab sau.

Mas puab yuav muab xuv xav ntswj ua ob txuj hlua khi ob lub ntsej awv saab huv rua ob lub ntsej ntawm lub tsho efauj, lub awv txhad nyob saab sau txuj hlaab sa kws ntus zoo zoo kws sa ntawm duav txhad tsw nplaam ntawm lub tsho efauj.

Thaus Aloo nkaag moog rua huv lub chaw dawb huv nwg txhad muab Yixayee cov tub tej npe kws nyob ntawm lub awv kws swv txav sab rua cov Yixayee lug coj rua ntawm nwg hauv sab ua lub chaw rua Yawmsaub ncu ntsoov moog le.

Koj yuav muab Uli hab Thumi  tso rua huv lub awv, mas Uli hab Thumi txhad nyob ntawm Aloo hauv sab rua thaus nwg moog rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag. Aloo txhad yuav rws qhov kws yuav txav sab rua cov Yixayee rua ntawm nwg hauv sab taab meeg Yawmsaub lub xubndag moog le.
“Koj yuav muab xuv xav ntus ua lub tsho ntev phim lub tsho efauj.
Ua lub tsho looj hab muab lub cej daab tsho hov foob zoo zoo txhad tsw nduag.
Muab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj hab xuv lab ua tej lub zoo le txwv ntsab pobkws hab ua tej lub tswb kub lug dai quas cov txwv ntsab pobkws ntawm lub qaab tsho ntev hov,
dai ib lub tswb quas ib lub txwv ntsab pobkws, dai le nuav thoob plhawv lub qaab tsho ntev.

Thaus Aloo ua kuv le num mas nwg yuav tsum naav lub tsho nuav, hab thaus nwg moog rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag huv lub chaw dawb huv hab thaus nwg tawm rov lug mas yuav nov cov tswb hov nrov nwg txhad tsw tuag.
“Muab cov tseem kub ua ib pluaj kub mas txaug npe ntawv rua huv has tas ‘Dawb huv rua Yawmsaub’ yaam nkaus le luas txaam txwm,
hab muab xuv xav ua hlua khi pluaj kub hov rua sau hau phuam saab ntawm hauv plaj.

Aloo yuav tsum coj pluaj kub hov rua ntawm nwg hauv plaj. Thaus cov Yixayee xyeem hov txhua chaw ua kevcai dawb huv pub rua Yawmsaub es ua txhum los Aloo yuav rws puab tej kev txhum. Aloo yuav tsum coj pluaj kub hov rua ntawm nwg hauv plaj moog le Yawmsaub txhad leeg yuav puab.
“Muab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ntus ua lub tsho txaij ua qhov muag, hab muab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ntus ua phuam, hab ntus txuj hlaab sa hab ua paaj rua.
Ua cov tsho, cov hlaab sa hab mom rua Aloo cov tub naav, puab txhad tau koob meej hab yuav zoo nkauj.

Muab tej tsoog meej mom nuav ua rua koj tug tijlaug Aloo hab nwg cov tub naav es muab roj laub ywg ua kevcai xaiv tsaa puab hab tu kuas puab dawb huv rua kuv puab txhad ua tau pov thawj ua kuv teg num.
Muab ntaub maag xaws cov rwg tuab lu kws ceg txug ntawm ncej qaab xwb rua puab naav txhad npug tau puab ceg ncau.

Aloo hab nwg cov tub yuav tsum naav cov rwg nuav rua thaus kws moog rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb, hab thaus kws moog ua num ntawm lub thaaj kws xyeem huv lub chaw dawb huv sub txhad tsw muaj txem, puab txhad tsw tuag. Qhov nuav yog txuj kevcai kws Aloo hab nwg caaj ceg yuav tsum coj moog ib txhab ib txhws le.”
“Koj yuav tsum ua le nuav txhad muab Aloo puab tu tau kuas dawb huv rua kuv puab txhad ua tau pov thawj ua kuv teg num. Muab ib tug mivnyuas txwv nyuj hab ob tug txwv yaaj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab muab cov ncuav tsw xyaw keeb hab cov ncuav ntse roj tsw xyaw keeb hab tej lub ncuav tsw xyaw keeb nyag nyag pleev roj. Yuav tsum muab cov moov mog zoo zoo ua cov ncuav nuav.
Muab cov ncuav nuav tso rua huv ib lub tawb coj ua ke nrug tug txwv nyuj hab ob tug txwv yaaj tuaj.
Coj Aloo hab nwg cov tub tuaj rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb mas muab dej ntxuav puab huv huv.
Muab cev tsoog meej mom ua rua Aloo naav, yog lub tsho, lub tsho ntev, lub tsho efauj hab lub awv hab muab txuj hlaab sa kws ntus zoo zoo sa lub tsho pov thawj rua ntawm duav.
Muab phuam ua rua Aloo ntoo hab muab pluaj kub kws dawb huv sa txuj phuam.
Muab cov roj tsw qaab kws swv ua kevcai tsaa laub rua sau Aloo taubhau txhad tsaa tau nwg.
Coj nwg cov tub lug es muab tej tsho meej mom ua rua puab naav

hab muab hlaab ua rua puab sa hab muab mom ua rua puab ntoo. Puab yuav ua pov thawj lawv le kuv tub has tseg lawd moog ib txhab ib txhws le. Ua le nuav txhad yog koj ua kevcai tsaa Aloo hab nwg cov tub ua pov thawj.
“Koj yuav tsum coj tug mivnyuas txwv nyuj tuaj rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb mas Aloo hab nwg cov tub yuav cev teg npuab rua sau tug txwv nyuj taubhau.
Muab tug txwv nyuj hov tua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb.
Muab tug txwv nyuj cov ntshaav ib qho lug xuas ntiv teg pleev plaub tug kub ntawm plaub lub kaum thaaj. Cov ntshaav kws tshuav mas muab laub puag ncig lub taw thaaj hov.
Muab cov npluag roj kws lu plaab nyuv hab lu lub sab hab cov npluag roj kws lu ob lub raum hab ob lub raum huvsw hlawv rua sau lub thaaj.
Tassws tug txwv nyuj cov nqaj hab daim tawv hab cov quav mas coj moog hlawv pov tseg saab nrau lub zog. Tej nuav yog ua kevcai xyeem daws txem.
“Koj yuav tsum muab ib tug txwv yaaj lug mas Aloo hab nwg cov tub yuav cev teg npuab rua sau tug txwv yaaj hov taubhau.
Mas muab tug txwv yaaj hov tua hab muab cov ntshaav nchus kuas lu puag ncig lub thaaj.
Muab tug txwv yaaj hov txav ua tej ywb yaav hab muab tej plaab nyuv sab ntsws hab tej teg taw ntxuav coj lug tso ua ke rua ntawm cov nqaj hab lub taubhau.
Muab tug txwv yaaj hov hlawv huvsw rua sau lub thaaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub, ua tej kws muab hlawv kub nyab xyeem muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab.
“Muab dua ib tug txwv yaaj lug mas Aloo hab nwg cov tub yuav cev teg npuab rua sau tug txwv yaaj hov taubhau.

Mas muab tug yaaj hov tua hab muab cov ntshaav ib qho lug pleev Aloo hab nwg cov tub saab taub ntsej xws hab pleev tug taub teg xws hab tug taub taw xws. Hab muab cov ntshaav kws tshuav nchus kuas lu puag ncig lub thaaj.

Muab cov ntshaav sau lub thaaj ib qho hab cov roj tsw qaab swv ua kevcai tsaa ib qho nchus rua Aloo hab nwg cev tsoog meej mom hab nchus rua Aloo cov tub hab rua puab tej tsoog meej mom. Mas Aloo hab nwg cev tsoog meej mom hab nwg cov tub hab puab tej tsoog meej mom txhad dawb huv.

“Tug txwv yaaj hov mas muab cov npluag roj hab tug kwtwv kws rog rog hab cov npluag roj kws lu plaab nyuv hab lu lub sab hab cov npluag roj kws lu ob lub raum hab ob lub raum, hab saab ceg xws (vem tug txwv yaaj hov yog swv ua kevcai tsaa ua pov thawj),
hab rhu ib lub ncuav hab ib lub ncuav ntse roj hab ib lub ncuav nyag nyag kws pleev roj huv lub tawb kws muaj cov ncuav tsw xyaw keeb kws nyob ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag,
mas muab cov nuav huvsw tso rua huv Aloo hab Aloo cov tub txhais teg nqaa moog cev taab meeg Yawmsaub ua kevcai cev xyeem.

Mas koj tsua txais ntawm Aloo puab txhais teg coj lug hlawv rua sau lub thaaj ua ke nrug tug yaaj kws hlawv huvsw xyeem lawd. Tej paa kws hlawv hov tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab, yog yaam kws muab hlawv kub nyab xyeem rua Yawmsaub.
“Muab tug txwv yaaj kws swv ua kevcai tsaa Aloo ua pov thawj cov nqaj ntawm hauv nrob cev taab meeg Yawmsaub ua kevcai cev xyeem mas cov nqaj hov yuav muab ua koj feem.

Tug txwv yaaj kws swv ua kevcai tsaa ua pov thawj cov nqaj ntawm hauv nrob kws cev hab ib saab ceg kws cev xyeem rua Yawmsaub mas yuav tu kuas dawb huv rua Yawmsaub, hab muab ua Aloo hab Aloo cov tub le feem.

Ob qho nqaj nuav yog tej kws cov Yixayee yuav tseg ua Aloo hab nwg cov tub le feem moog ib txhws le. Thaus cov Yixayee tua tsaj xyeem ua kevcai sws raug zoo puab yuav tsum tseg ob qho nqaj nuav ua cov pov thawj le feem. Yog tej kws puab muab pub rua Yawmsaub.
“Aloo cev tsoog meej mom kws dawb huv mas muab rua nwg cov tub naav tau rua lub swjhawm kws ua kevcai muab roj laub ywg tsaa puab ua pov thawj txhua tam moog le.
Tug kws sawv lug ua pov thawj nyob leej txwv chaw ua kuv teg num huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb chaav dawb huv mas yuav naav cev tsoog meej mom hov xyaa nub.
“Muab tug txwv yaaj kws swv ua kevcai tsaa ua pov thawj hov cov nqaj hau huv ib qho chaw kws dawb huv ntawd.
Mas Aloo hab nwg cov tub yuav noj tug txwv yaaj hov cov nqaj hab cov ncuav huv lub tawb rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb saab nrau.
Puab yuav noj tej kws muab xyeem ntxuav kev txhum txem es ua kevcai tsaa puab ua pov thawj dawb huv rua kuv. Lwm tug noj tsw tau vem tej hov yog yaam kws dawb huv lawm.
Yog cov nqaj cov ncuav kws swv ua kevcai tsaa ua pov thawj hov noj tsw taag mas taagkig tom qaab ca le muab hlawv huvsw tsw xob noj le, vem yog yaam kws dawb huv lawm.
“Koj yuav tsum ua txhua yaam kevcai rua Aloo hab nwg cov tub lawv le kuv has rua koj lawd. Qhov kevcai tsaa puab ua pov thawj nuav yuav ua xyaa nub.

Txhua nub yuav muab ib tug txwv nyuj tua ua kevcai xyeem daws txem hab ntxuav kev txhum tseg. Hab yuav ua kevcai xyeem daws txem rua thaus ntxuav tej kev txhum kev qas sau lub thaaj hab yuav muab roj tsw qaab laub ywg lub thaaj kuas dawb huv rua kuv.
Yuav ua kevcai ntxuav lub thaaj hov xyaa nub lub thaaj txhad dawb huv ua tau kuv tug, lub thaaj txhad dawb huv kawg nkaus mas yaam kws moog phaav lub thaaj hov yuav dawb huv.
“Ntawm nuav moog yog tej kws mej yuav tsum muab xyeem sau lub thaaj moog le, yuav naj nub muab ob tug mivnyuas yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos xyeem moog le.
Muab ib tug mivnyuas yaaj tua xyeem rua thaus taagkig, muab ib tug xyeem rua thaus yuav tsaus ntuj.

Thaus xyeem thawj tug mivnuas yaaj, yuav muab ib feem kaum huv ib efa  moov mog zoo zoo hab ib feem plaub huv ib hee  roj aulib kws tsuam lim tau zoo lawd ntse ua ke xyeem, hab yuav muab ib feem plaub huv ib hee cawv txwv maab laub ua kevcai laub xyeem.

Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj yuav muab dua ib tug mivnyuas yaaj xyeem, kuj yuav muab moov mog ua ke ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab muab cawv txwv maab ua kevcai laub xyeem ib yaam nkaus le thaus taagkig, ua tej kws muab hlawv kub nyab xyeem muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab.

Mej yuav ua kevcai hlawv xyeem le nuav ib tam dhau ib tam ib txhab ib txhws moog le rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb taab meeg Yawmsaub. Kuv yuav lug ntswb mej hab nrug koj has lug hov ntawd.
Kuv yuav lug ntswb cov Yixayee rua lub chaw ntawd hab kuv tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab yuav ua rua lub chaw ntawd dawb huv rua kuv.
“Kuv yuav tu kuas lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab lub thaaj dawb huv rua kuv hab kuv yuav tsaa Aloo hab nwg cov tub ua cov kws dawb huv rua kuv ua pov thawj ua kuv teg num.
Kuv yuav nyob kag huv plawv cov Yixayee hab kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv.
Mas puab yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub, yog puab tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog tug kws coj puab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug kuv txhad tau nrug nraim puab nyob. Kuv yog Yawmsaub, yog puab tug Vaajtswv.”
“Koj yuav tsum muab ntoo kub twg ua lub thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab.
Ua daav xwm faab xwm meem ntev ib tshwm daav ib tshwm sab ob tshwm. Cov kub ntawm kaum thaaj mas ua keev hlo ntawm lub thaaj lug.
Muab cov tseem kub luam hlo lub thaaj saab sau hab plaub faab hab cov kub thaaj huvsw hab muab kub ua ib tug caaj ntswg lu puag ncig lub thaaj.
Muab kub ua ob lub ntsej tis rua huv qaab tug caaj ntswg hov ib lub ib saab kuas sws ncaaj mas yuav muab laag ntxwg rua ob lub ntsej hov kwv.
Muab ntoo kub twg lug ua ob tug laag kwv hab muab kub luam ob tug laag hov.
Muab lub thaaj hov txawb rua nrau daim ntaub kws thaiv lub swb xaab sws cog lug ncaaj nkaus lub hau swb xaab kws roog kev txhum,  yog lub chaw kws kuv yuav ntswb koj.
“Aloo yuav moog hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab sau lub thaaj hov. Txhua taagkig kws nwg moog tu lub teeb mas txawm hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab hab ntaag.

Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj kws Aloo taws lub teeb mas nwg yuav hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab sau lub thaaj, txhad muaj moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag ib tam dhau ib tam ib txhab ib txhws moog le.

Tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab kws tsw dawb huv mas tsw xob muab hlawv rua sau lub thaaj nuav. Tsw xob ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem rua sau, tsw xob ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos rua sau, tsw xob muab cawv txwv maab laub ua kevcai xyeem rua sau.

Aloo yuav ua kevcai ntxuav kev txhum rua plaub tug kub ntawm lub thaaj hov ib xyoos ib zag. Nwg yuav muab cov ntshaav kws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem lug ua kevcai ntxuav kev txhum txem, ua kevcai ntxuav lub thaaj ib xyoos ib zag ib tam dhau ib tam moog le. Lub thaaj nuav dawb huv kawg nkaus rua Yawmsaub.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Thaus koj txheeb npe hab suav cov Yixayee mas puab suavdawg nyag taug nyag nqaa nyaj tuaj pub rua Yawmsaub ua nqe txhwv txujsa, puab txhad tsw raug xwm txheej phem rua thaus koj moog suav puab.

Txhua tug kws tub txheeb npe lawd mas yuav pub ib nraab sekhee nyaj lawv le tej nyaj kws swv huv lub chaw pe hawm Yawmsaub (ib sekhee muaj neeg nkaum kela. ) Yuav tsum pub ib nraab sekhee hov rua Yawmsaub.
Txhua tug kws tuaj txheeb npe cov kws noob nyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau, yuav coj nyaj tuaj pub rua Yawmsaub.
Thaus mej suavdawg coj nyaj tuaj pub rua Yawmsaub ntxuav kev txhum txhwv mej txujsa mas cov kws muaj tsw xob pub dhau, cov kws pluag los tsw xob pub tsawg dhau ib nraab sekhee.

Koj yuav khaws cov nyaj kws txhwv cov Yixayee txujsa coj lug swv huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb ua Yawmsaub teg num, sub Yawmsaub txhad ncu txug qhov kws cov Yixayee suavdawg tub ntxuav kev txhum txhwv txujsa lawm.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Koj muab tooj lab ua ib lub phaaj hab muab tooj lab ua lub chaw txawb lub phaaj tooj lab hov ua chaw ntxuav. Muab txawb ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab lub thaaj kem nruab nraab, hab nqaa dej lug rua huv lub phaaj,
mas Aloo hab nwg cov tub yuav swv cov dej hov ntxuav teg ntxuav taw.

Thaus puab yuav nkaag moog rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab thaus puab moog ze lub thaaj ua Yawmsaub teg num es muab hov txhua chaw hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub mas puab yuav tsum muab dej lug ntxuav tsaam tes puab tuag.
Puab yuav tsum ntxuav teg ntxuav taw tsaam tes puab tuag. Nuav yog txuj kevcai kws Aloo hab nwg cov tub caaj ceg yuav tsum coj txhua tam moog ib txhab ib txhws le.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Muab tej txum lom zoo zoo le nuav, kws yog roj tsw qaab nyaav tswb puas sekhee, moov ntoo tuv nyaav ib nraab (yog ob puas tswb caug sekhee) hab tauj qab tsw qaab nyaav ob puas tswb caug sekhee,
hab moov xyaab txob nyaav tswb puas sekhee  nyaav lawv le nyaj sekhee kws puab swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub, hab muab ib hee  roj aulib.

Koj yuav muab tej nuav lug tov ua ke ib yaam le tug Kws txawj ua tshuaj tsw qaab ua, txhad tau cov roj kws dawb huv swv ua kevcai tsaa. Cov roj nuav yog cov roj kws dawb huv swv laub ywg ua kevcai tsaa.
Hab muab cov roj tsw qaab nuav ywg pleev lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab lub swb xaab sws cog lug,
hab lub rooj hab tej pestwj swv sau lub rooj, hab lub teeb kub hab tej pestwj swv tu lub teeb, hab lub thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab,
hab lub thaaj kws hlawv hov txhua chaw xyeem hab tej pestwj kws swv ntawm lub thaaj, hab lub phaaj hab lub chaw kws txawb lub phaaj.
Yuav ua kevcai tu txhua yaam nuav kuas dawb huv rua kuv mas tej nuav txhad dawb huv kawg nkaus le. Yog yaam twg lug phaav tej nuav mas yaam hov kuj ca le dawb huv lawm.
Koj yuav muab roj laub ywg rua Aloo hab nwg cov tub ua kevcai tu kuas puab dawb huv rua kuv puab txhad ua tau pov thawj ua koom rua kuv.
Koj has rua cov Yixayee has tas, ‘Cov roj nuav yog kuv le roj tsw qaab dawb huv kws swv ua kevcai tsaa ib tam dhau ib tam ib txhab ib txhws le.

Cov roj nuav tsw xob muab laub ywg rua tej pejxeem hlo le hab tsw xob muab ua dua ib co roj zoo le cov roj tsw qaab nuav. Cov roj nuav dawb huv rua kuv mas mej yuav tsum muab saib ua yaam kws dawb huv rua kuv xwb.
Yog leejtwg ua ib co roj tsw qaab zoo le nuav hab muab cov roj nuav coj moog laub ywg rua lwm tug kws tsw yog pov thawj mas tug hov yuav raug muab txav tawm ntawm nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Muab cov txum lom tsw qaab le nuav, kws yog kua mig roj nyaab hab ib qho nqaj qwj havtxwv hab kua mig qej tsua hab tej roj ntoos tsw qaab zoo zoo sws npaug zog,
coj lug tov ua ke ua cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab yaam le tug Kws txawj tov ua tshuaj tsw qaab, hab rau mivntswv ntsev txhad zoo kawg nkaus hab dawb huv.

Muab ib co tuav ua moov coj moog txawb rua ntawm lub swb xaab sws cog lug xubndag huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb kws yog lub chaw kws kuv yuav ntswb koj. Cov tshuaj tsw qaab nuav yuav tsum muab saib ua yaam kws dawb huv kawg nkaus le.
Cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab nuav kws koj muab tov lawv le kws qha nuav mas mej tug kheej tsw xob swv le. Koj yuav suav tas yog yaam kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub lawm.
Yog leejtwg ua ib co moov tshuaj tsw qaab zoo le cov nuav lug swv mas nwg yuav raug muab txav tawm ntawm nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Saib maj, kuv tub xaiv Ulis tug tub Npexalee kws yog Hawj tug xeeb ntxwv, yog xeem Yuta,
hab kuv tub pub Vaaj Ntsuj Plig puv npo rua nwg kuas nwg muaj plaab plaw tswvyim hab txawj ntse paub ua txhua tsaav txhua yaam,
hab txawj sau qauv hab muab nyaj muab kub muab tooj lab lug ua tau txaij nraug quas zeeg,
hab txawj txua hab txhum tej qai zeb hlaws kws muaj nqes es muab khawm lu rua lub miv taig, txawj sais ntoo txaij zoo nkauj, nwg txawj ua txhua yaam.
Saib maj, kuv tub xaiv Ahixama tug tub Auhaulia kws yog xeem Ntaaj ua tug kws paab nwg. Kuv kuj pub tswvyim peevxwm rua txhua tug Kws txawj, puab txhad ua tau txhua yaam kws kuv tub has rua koj lawd,
yog lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb, lub swb xaab sws cog lug hab lub hau swb xaab kws roog kev txhum hab txhua yaam pestwj kws swv huv lub tsev ntaub,
yog lub rooj hab tej pestwj swv sau lub rooj, lub teeb tseem kub hab tej pestwj swv tu lub teeb, hab lub thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab,
hab lub thaaj kws hlawv hov txhua chaw xyeem hab tej pestwj kws swv sau lub thaaj, hab lub phaaj ntxuav teg taw hab lub chaw kws txawb lub phaaj,
hab cev tsoog meej mom dawb huv kws ntus tau zoo zoo rua pov thawj Aloo naav hab tej tsoog meej mom kws Aloo cov tub naav rua thaus puab ua pov thawj ua kuv teg num,

hab cov roj tsw qaab kws swv ua kevcai tsaa hab cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab kws muab hlawv rua huv lub chaw kws dawb huv. Tej nuav huvsw mas puab yuav tsum ua txhua yaam lawv nraim le kws kuv tub has rua koj lawd.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Koj ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Mej yuav tsum ncu ntsoov su rua kuv nub Xanpatau, vem tas qhov nuav yog lub hom thawj rua kuv hab mej moog rua txhua tam sub mej txhad paub tas kuv kws yog Yawmsaub muab mej cais ua dawb huv.

Mej yuav tsum ncu ntsoov su rua nub Xanpatau, vem tas yog nub kws dawb huv rua mej. Leejtwg ua puag tsuas nub ntawd nwg yuav raug txem tuag. Yog leejtwg ua num rua nub hov, nwg yuav raug muab txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg.
Ca le ua num rau nub, tassws nub xyaa yog nub Xanpatau yog nub kws caiv su tag tag le hab yog nub kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub. Yog leejtwg ua num rua nub Xanpatau yuav raug txem tuag.
Yog le nuav cov Yixayee yuav tsum ncu ntsoov su nub Xanpatau. Puab yuav fwm nub hov moog rua txhua tam ua lug cog tseg nyob moog ib txhws le.
Yog lub hom thawj rua kuv hab cov Yixayee moog ib txhws qha has tas Yawmsaub tswm lub ntuj lub nplajteb tau rau nub xwb tav taag, mas nub xyaa nwg su tsw ua num hab tau su lug sav.’ ”
Thaus nwg has rua Mauxe sau lub roob Xinai taag lawd nwg muab ob daim txag zeb kws Vaajtswv xuas ntiv teg sau nwg tej lug cog tseg rua huv, pub rua Mauxe.

Thaus cov pejxeem pum tas Mauxe nyob ntev heev tsw nqeg sau roob lug, puab txawm ua ke tuaj has rua Aloo tas, “Koj ca le sawv tseeg ua tej txoov daab  rua peb kws yuav coj peb kev moog. Tug Mauxe kws coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug peb tsw paub sov nwg ua le caag lawm.”
Mas Aloo has rua puab tas, “Ca le hle tej puj cu kub ntawm mej tej quaspuj hab mej tej tub tej ntxhais qhov ntsej coj tuaj rua kuv.”
Cov pejxeem suavdawg txhad hle tej puj cu kub ntawm puab qhov ntsej coj tuaj rua Aloo.

Aloo tau tej kub hov ntawm puab txhais teg tes nwg txawm muab nchuav hab swv cuab yeej txua ua ib tug thaav nyuj. Mas puab has tas, “Cov Yixayee 'e, tej nuav yog mej tej daab kws coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug.”
Thaus Aloo pum le nuav nwg txawm tib ib lub thaaj xyeem rua ntawm tug txoov daab nyuj hov xubndag. Mas Aloo tshaaj tawm has tas, “Pigkig yuav ua kevcai noj haus rua Yawmsaub.”
Mas nub tom qaab puab sawv ntxuv moog tua tsaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab coj tej tsaj xyeem ua kevcai sws raug zoo. Cov pejxeem kuj nyob tsawg noj haus hab sawv dha ua lomzem.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Koj ca le nqeg moog, vem koj haiv tuabneeg kws koj coj tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug hov tub ua phem ua qas lawm.

Puab tub tig hlo ntawm txujkev kws kuv qha rua puab sai kawg le lawm. Puab nchuav ib tug txoov daab thaav nyuj rua puab, hab pe hab tua tsaj xyeem rua tug txoov daab hov hab has tas, ‘Cov Yixayee 'e, tej nuav yog mej tej daab  kws coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Kuv pum haiv tuabneeg nuav lawm, puab yeej yog haiv tuabneeg kws tawv ncauj heev.
Vem le nuav koj tsw xob taav kuv, sub kuv txujkev npau tawg txhad tshwm plawg ua kuas puab puam tsuaj taag. Tassws kuv yuav tsaa koj ua ib haiv tuabneeg luj heev.”

Mas Mauxe thov Yawmsaub kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv tas, “Au Yawmsaub, ua caag koj npau tawg heev rua koj haiv tuabneeg kws koj swv koj tug fwjchim luj hab swv koj txhais teg kws muaj zug coj tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug?

Ua caag yuav ca cov Iyi has tas, ‘Vaajtswv npaaj yuav ua phem es coj puab tawm moog txhad muab puab tua rua tom tej roob hab muab puab ua puam tsuaj taag huv lub nplajteb moog?’ Thov koj thim koj txujkev npau tawg heev hab hloov koj lub sab tsw xob ua qhov phem nuav rua koj haiv tuabneeg.

Thov koj ncu txug Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yixayee kws yog koj cov qhev. Koj tau cog lug ruaj khov rua puab tas, ‘Kuv yuav ua rua mej caaj ceg fuam vaam coob yaam le tej nub qub sau ntuj, hab lub tebchaws nuav huvsw kws kuv cog lug ca lawd kuv yuav pub rua mej caaj ceg mas puab yuav tau ua qub txeeg qub teg moog ib txhws le.’ ”
Mas Yawmsaub txhad hloov sab tsw ua tej xwm txheej phem lawv le nwg tau xaav tseg tas nwg yuav ua rua nwg haiv tuabneeg.
Mauxe txhad tig hlo nqeg sau lub roob lug, nwg nqaa ob daim txag zeb kws sau Vaajtswv tej lug rua ob saab huvsw lug.
Ob daim txag zeb nuav yog Vaajtswv ua hab cov npe ntawv hov yog Vaajtswv sais rua huv daim txag zeb.
Thaus Yausua nov cov pejxeem lub suab nrov ntshu quas fwv nwg txawm has rua Mauxe tas, “Muaj suab nrov ua rog nraag lub chaw nyob.”
Tassws Mauxe has tas, “Lub suab kws nov hov tsw yog suab yeej rog hab tsw yog suab swb rog, tassws yog suab qw ua lomzem xwb.”
Thaus Mauxe lug ze lub zog lawm hab pum tug txoov daab thaav nyuj hab pum tuabneeg seev cev, tes nwg txawm npau tawg heev, nwg muab ob daim txag zeb laim pov tseg tawg taag rua ntawm taw roob lawm.
Nwg muab tug txoov daab thaav nyuj kws puab ua hov hlawv hab muab tuav ua moov w rua huv dej hab yuam cov Yixayee haus cov dej hov.
Mauxe txhad has rua Aloo tas, “Cov pejxeem nuav ua le caag rua koj es koj txhad coj lub txem luj le nuav lug raug puab?”
Aloo teb tas, “Yawm hlub, tsw xob npau tawg hlo le. Koj yeej paub cov pejxeem nuav lawm, puab seem quas lais moog rua txujkev phem xwb.
Puab has rua kuv tas, ‘Ca le ua tej txoov daab rua peb kws yuav coj peb moog. Tug Mauxe kws coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug peb tsw paub sov nwg ua le caag lawm.’
Kuv txhad has rua puab tas, ‘Leejtwg muaj puj cu kub ca le hle lug.’ Puab txhad muab rua kuv mas kuv muab nrum rua huv cub suavtawg, tes txawm tshwm tug thaav nyuj nuav tawm lug.”
Thaus Mauxe pum tas cov pejxeem lem hlo lawm, vem yog Aloo tso puab lem lawm ua rua puab raug puab cov yeeb ncuab thuaj luag,
mas Mauxe sawv ntsug ntawm rooj vaag huv lub zog hab has tas, “Leejtwg nyob Yawmsaub tog? Ca le lug ntawm kuv.” Mas Levi cov tub ki suavdawg txhad lug rua ntawm Mauxe.

Mauxe has rua puab tas, “Yawmsaub kws yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv has le nuav tas, ‘Mej txhua tug ca le rws ntaaj ntawm duav hab moog moog lug lug ntawm txhua lub rooj vaag huv lub zog hab txhua tug nyag tua nyag le kwvtij hab nyag tua nyag le phoojywg hab nyag tua nyag le kwvtij zej zog.’ ”
Mas cov Levi kuj ua lawv le Mauxe has. Mas nub hov cov pejxeem txhad raug tua kwvlaam peb txheeb leej.
Mauxe has tas, “Nub nua mej rov tsaa mej  ua cov kws ua Yawmsaub teg num, vem mej txhua tug nyag tawm tsaam nyag tej tub hab nyag tej kwvtij, nub nua Yawmsaub txhad le foom koob moov rua mej.”
Nub tom qaab Mauxe txhad has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Mej tau ua txhum muaj txem luj heev. Mas nwgnuav kuv yuav nce rov moog cuag Yawmsaub. Tej zag kuv yuav ntxuav tau mej tej kev txhum txem.”
Mauxe txhad rov moog cuag Yawmsaub hab thov has tas, “Cov pejxeem nuav ua txhum txem luj kawg. Puab ua tej txoov daab kub rua puab.
Tassws nwgnuav thov koj zaam puab lub txem. Yog koj tsw kaam, mas thov koj muab kuv lub npe thuam tawm huv koj phoo ntawv kws koj sau ca.”
Mas Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Leejtwg ua txhum rua kuv, kuv yuav thuam tug hov lub npe tawm huv kuv phoo ntawv.
Koj ca le moog, coj cov pejxeem moog rua lub chaw kws kuv has rua koj lawm. Kuv tug tubkhai ntuj yuav ua koj ntej moog. Txawm le ntawd los txug nub kws kuv txav txem kuv yuav rau txem rua puab.”
Mas Yawmsaub tso mob kis lug raug cov pejxeem vem yog qhov kws puab ua tug txoov daab thaav nyuj, kws Aloo ua ntawd.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le moog, koj hab cov pejxeem kws koj coj tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug ca le tawm ntawm nuav moog rua lub tebchaws kws kuv cog lug ruaj khov rua Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj tas, ‘Kuv yuav pub lub tebchaws rua koj caaj ceg.’
Kuv yuav tso ib tug tubkhai ntuj ua koj ntej moog lawv cov Khana‑aa, cov Amaulai, cov Hithai, cov Pelixai, cov Hivai hab cov Yenpu tawm hov ntawd moog.

Koj ca le moog kuas txug lub tebchaws kws muaj kua mig hab zwb ntaab ndwg ndo. Tassws kuv yuav tsw nrug koj moog ntshai tsaam kuv yuav ua rua koj puam tsuaj taag ntawm ib ntog kev, vem mej yog tuabneeg tawv ncauj.”
Thaus cov pejxeem nov tej xuv phem hov puab quaj ntsuag hab tsw muaj leejtwg coj saw nyaj saw kub hlo le,

tsua qhov Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Koj ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Mej yog tuabneeg tawv ncauj. Yog kuv nrug mej moog ib nyuas plag xwb kuv muab mej ua puam tsuaj taag. Vem le nuav mej ca le hle mej tej saw nyaj saw kub tseg hab kuv yuav txav sab saib kuv yuav ua le caag rua mej.’ ”
Cov Yixayee txhad le hle puab tej saw nyaj saw kub mas txwj ntawm lub roob Haule  puab tsw coj le lawm.

Mauxe pheej coj ib lub tsev ntaub moog tsaa rua saab nrau lub zog deb ntawm lub zog mas hu ua lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb. Mas txhua tug kws xaav ua nug rua Yawmsaub kuj tawm moog rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb kws nyob nrau lub zog.
Mauxe tawm moog rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub thaus twg, cov pejxeem suavdawg yuav sawv ntsug ntawm nyag lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub saib Mauxe moog txug thaus nwg nkaag rua huv lub tsev ntaub.
Thaus Mauxe nkaag moog rua huv lub tsev ntaub lawm, tug ncej fuab kuj nqeg lug nyob ntawm lub tsev ntaub qhov rooj, mas Yawmsaub nrug Mauxe has lug.
Cov pejxeem suavdawg pum tug ncej fuab lug nyob ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub thaus twg, mas suavdawg txhua tug kuj sawv tseeg hawm ntawm nyag lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub.

Yawmsaub pheej nrug Mauxe sws thaam tim ntsej tim muag yaam le ob tug kwvluag sws thaam. Tes Mauxe le rov qaab lug rua huv lub zog, tassws tug tub hluas Yausua kws yog Noo tug tub hab yog Mauxe tug tub qhe mas tsw tawm huv lub tsev ntaub moog le.

Mauxe has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Koj tau has rua kuv tas, ‘Ca le coj cov pejxeem nuav moog,’ tassws koj tub tsw qha rua kuv paub tas koj yuav khaiv leejtwg nrug kuv moog. Txawm le ntawd los koj tseed has tas, ‘Kuv paub koj zoo vem paub koj lub npe hab koj yog tug kws txaus kuv sab.’

Yog koj txaus sab rua kuv tag lawm, thov koj qha koj txujkev rua kuv pum nwgnuav sub kuv txhad paub koj hab yuav txaus koj lub sab moog le. Hab thov koj ncu tas cov tuabneeg nuav yog koj haiv tuabneeg hab.”
Yawmsaub has tas, “Kuv yuav nrug koj moog ntaag hab yuav pub kuas koj tau su.”
Mauxe txhad has rua nwg tas, “Yog koj tsw nrug kuv moog, thov tsw xob coj peb tawm ntawm nuav moog le.

Yuav ua le caag txhad paub tas kuv hab koj cov tuabneeg txaus koj lub sab? Kuj yog thaus koj nrug peb moog xwb kuv hab koj cov tuabneeg txhad le txawv dua lwm haiv tuabneeg huvsw kws nyob thoob plawg huv lub nplajteb los tsw yog?”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Yaam kws koj thov, kuv yuav ua lawv le ntawd. Tsua qhov koj txaus kuv lub sab hab kuv paub koj lub npe zoo.”
Mauxe txhad has tas, “Thov koj ua koj tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm rua kuv pum.”

Yawmsaub txhad teb tas, “Kuv yuav ua kuv txujkev zoo huvsw tshwm lug hlaa ntawm koj xubndag, hab kuv yuav tshaaj tawm kuv lub npe kws yog Yawmsaub  rua ntawm koj xubndag. Kuv xaav khuvleej tug twg kuv yuav khuvleej tug ntawd, kuv xaav taab ncuab tug twg kuv yuav taab ncuab tug ntawd.”
Yawmsaub has tas, “Tassws koj yuav pum tsw tau kuv lub ntsej muag, tsua qhov tsw muaj leejtwg pum es tseed muaj txujsa nyob.”
Mas Yawmsaub has tas, “Saib maj, muaj ib qho chaw nyob ze kuv kws koj sawv tau sau lub pob zeb ntawd.
Mas thaus kuv tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab saamswm hlaa moog kuv yuav muab koj zais rua huv kem zeb mas kuv yuav xuas kuv txhais teg roog koj moog txug thaus kuv hlaa dhau lawm,
kuv le rhu kuv txhais teg mas koj yuav pum kuv nraus qaum tassws koj yuav tsw pum kuv lub ntsej muag.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le txhwm dua ob daim txag zeb zoo ib yaam le thawj ob daim, mas kuv yuav sau tej lug kws nyob huv ob daim qub kws koj ua tawg lawm rua huv.
Ca le npaaj kuas txhwj rua pigkig mas sawv ntxuv nce tuaj rua sau lub roob Xinai hab tuaj cuag kuv sau lub ncov roob.
Tsw xob kheev leejtwg nrug koj tuaj hab tsw kheev leejtwg tuaj nyob sau lub roob ib thaaj twg hlo le. Tsw xob kheev tej yaaj tej tshws tej nyuj noj zaub ze ntawm lub roob nuav.”
Mauxe txhad txhwm ob daim txag zeb zoo yaam le thawj ob daim, hab nwg sawv ntxuv nce moog rua sau lub roob Xinai lawv le Yawmsaub has rua nwg, hab nqaa ob daim txag zeb ntawm txhais teg moog.
Mas Yawmsaub nyob huv tauv fuab nqeg lug hab nrug Mauxe sawv ua ke hab tshaaj tawm Yawmsaub lub npe.

Yawmsaub hlaa hlo ntawm Mauxe moog hab tshaaj tawm tas, “Yawmsaub, Yawmsaub, yog Vaajtswv tug kws khuvleej hab hlub, nwg tsw chim sai, nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab nwg txujkev ua ncaaj kws tso sab tau muaj nplua quas mag,

nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov muaj rua tuabneeg quas txheeb tam, nwg zaam txem rua tej kev ua phem ua qas hab kev faav xeeb hab kev ua txhum muaj txem. Tassws nwg kuj tsw suav tas tsw txhum, nwg yuav rau leej txwv lub txem poob moog rua cov mivnyuas hab cov xeeb ntxwv peb plaub tam.”
Mauxe txawm maaj nroog nyo hau ti nkaus aav pe hawm.

Nwg has tas, “Au tug Tswv, yog kuv txaus koj lub sab, txawm yog haiv tuabneeg nuav tawv ncauj los kuv thov koj nrug peb moog. Hab thov koj zaam peb tej kev txhum hab peb lub txem, hab txais yuav peb ua koj teej koj tug.”

Yawmsaub has tas, “Ntawm nuav kuv cog lug rua koj. Kuv yuav ua txujci phemfwj tshwm taab meeg koj haiv tuabneeg, yog tej txujci kws tsw tau ua dua rua huv lub nplajteb lossws ua rua huv lub tebchaws twg hlo le. Ib tsoom tuabneeg kws nyob puag ncig koj suavdawg yuav pum Yawmsaub teg num, tsua qhov tej kws kuv yuav ua rua koj hov yuav yog ib yaam kws txaus ntshai kawg le.
“Koj yuav tsum ua lawv le tej kws nub nua kuv has rua koj. Saib maj, kuv yuav lawv cov Amaulai, cov Khana‑aa, cov Hithai, cov Pelixai, cov Hivai hab cov Yenpu tswv tawm ntawm koj xubndag moog.
Yuav tsum ceev faaj tsw xob nrug cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws kws koj yuav moog txug hov cog lug sws raug zoo, ntshai tsaam yuav ua rooj hlua cuab koj.
Mej yuav tsum rhuav puab tej thaaj teev daab pov tseg hab tsoo puab tej ncej tseem ceeb tawg taag hab ntuv puab tej ncej daab Asela.
Mej tsw xob pe dua luas tej daab, tsua qhov Yawmsaub kws muaj lub npe hu tas ‘Khib xeeb’ yog Vaajtswv kws khib xeeb.

Yog mej cog lug nrug cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov sws raug zoo mas ntshai tsaam thaus puab deev puab tej daab hab tua tsaj xyeem rua tej daab hov tes puab yuav hu mej moog nrug puab koom, hab mej yuav noj tej kws puab muab xyeem rua tej daab hov,
hab mej yuav moog yuav puab tej ntxhais lug ua mej tej tub quaspuj tes puab tej ntxhais yuav moog deev puab tej daab hab yum mej tej tub moog deev puab tej daab hab.
“Mej tsw xob nchuav txoov daab rua mej pe hlo le.

“Mej yuav tsum ncu ntsoov ua kevcai noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb. Yuav noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb kuas puv xyaa nub rua lub swjhawm kws teem ca huv lub hli Anpis lawv le kuv has rua mej, tsua qhov mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug rua lub hli Anpis.
“Thawj plaab mivnyuas txhua tug yog kuv le, yog mej thawj tug mivnyuas tsaj kws yog tug txwv huvsw, yog thawj tug mivnyuas nyuj mivnyuas yaaj.

Thawj tug mivnyuas neeg luav mas mej yuav muab ib tug yaaj txhwv. Yog mej tsw txhwv kuj muab luv cej daab pov tseg. Mej thawj tug tub hlub txhua tug kuj yuav tsum txhwv hab. “Tsw xob ca leejtwg tuaj cuag kuv teg dawb teg do.
“Mej yuav tsum ua num rau nub xwb, nub kws xyaa yuav tsum su. Txawm yog lub caij laij teb caij sau qoob los yuav tsum su.
“Yuav tsum ncu ntsoov ua kevcai xyaa lub chib su  kws sau thawj phaum mog, hab ncu ntsoov ua kevcai sau qoob thaus qaab xyoo.
“Mej cov txwvneej suavdawg yuav tsum tuaj ua ke rua ntawm Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kws yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv lub xubndag ib xyoos peb zag.

Kuv yuav ntab lwm haiv tuabneeg tswv tawm ntawm mej lub xubndag moog hab pub kuas mej tau tebchaws daav quas zug. Lub swjhawm kws mej moog cuag Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ib xyoos peb zag hov, yuav tsw muaj leejtwg xaav txeeb mej lub tebchaws hlo le.
“Tsw xob muab tej tsaj kws tua xyeem le ntshaav xyeem nrug cov ncuav xyaw keeb ua ke. Tsw xob tseg tug mivnyuas yaaj kws muab ua kevcai hlaa dhau le nqaj ca nyob txug kaaj ntug.
“Thawj phaum qoob loos kws sau huv teb lug mas yuav coj tej kws zoo zoo tuaj rua huv Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lub tsev. “Tsw xob muab tug nam tshws cov kua mig lug hau tug mivnyuas tshws.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Tej lug nuav muab sau ca. Kuv nrug koj hab cov Yixayee cog lug ca lawv le tej nqais nuav lawm.”
Mauxe nrug Yawmsaub nyob hov ntawd plaub caug nub plaub caug mo, nwg tsw noj mov tsw haus dej le. Nwg sau tej lug cog tseg rua huv ob daim txag zeb, yog kaum txuj kevcai.

Mauxe nqeg sau lub roob Xinai lug, nwg nqaa ob daim txag zeb kws sau Vaajtswv tej lug ntawm nwg txhais teg lug. Lub swjhawm kws Mauxe nqeg sau lub roob lug nwg tsw paub tas nwg lub ntsej muag ci vem yog nwg tau nrug Vaajtswv has lug lawm.
Thaus Aloo hab cov Yixayee suavdawg saib Mauxe mas pum tas nwg lub ntsej muag ci, puab tsw kaav txaav lug ze nwg.
Tassws Mauxe hu puab lug. Aloo hab cov kws ua thawj huv cov pejxeem suavdawg txhad rov lug cuag Mauxe, hab nwg nrug puab has lug.
Tom qaab hov cov Yixayee suavdawg txaav lug ze, hab Mauxe txhad qha tej kevcai kws Yawmsaub tau has rua nwg sau lub roob Xinai txhua nqai rua puab noog.
Thaus Mauxe has rua puab taag lawm, nwg muab ntaub lug kauv nwg lub ntsej muag.
Thaus twg Mauxe nkaag moog rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag nwg kuj muab daim ntaub hov yaws moog txug thaus nwg tawm lug. Thaus nwg tawm lug hab qha tej kws Vaajtswv kuas nwg has rua cov Yixayee noog,
mas cov Yixayee saib Mauxe lub plhu kuj pum Mauxe lub ntsej muag ci, tes Mauxe txawm muab ntaub kauv nwg lub ntsej muag dua moog txug thaus nwg nkaag moog nrug Yawmsaub has lug.
Mauxe hu ib tsoom pejxeem Yixayee tuaj txoos ua ib ke hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Tej nuav yog tej kws Yawmsaub kuas mej ua.
Mej ua mej tej daag num rau nub xwb. Nub xyaa yog nub kws caiv su tag tag, yog nub Xanpatau kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub. Yog leejtwg ua ib yaam num rua nub ntawd mas yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.
Nub Xanpatau tsw xob rauv tawg huv mej tej tsev hlo le.”
Mauxe has rua cov Yixayee suavdawg tas, “Yawmsaub kuas mej ua le nuav,
mej suavdawg moog nqaa tej kws mej muaj tuaj pub rua Yawmsaub. Leejtwg lub sab daav kuj coj nwg tej hov txhua chaw tuaj pub rua Yawmsaub, yog kub hab nyaj hab tooj lab,
hab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo hab plaub tshws,
hab cov tawv txwv yaaj kws muab foo lab lawd, hab cov tawv ntshuab havtxwv, hab ntoo kub twg,
hab roj saam lub teeb, hab tej txum lom kws xyaw cov roj tsw qaab swv ua kevcai tsaa, hab xyaw cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab,
hab cov qai zeb av txho ci laam lug hab tej qai zeb hlaws muaj nqes kws muab xaws lu rua lub tsho efauj  hab lub awv.
“Ca txhua tug kws muaj tswvyim huv mej cov tuaj ua txhua yaam kws Yawmsaub kuas mej ua, yog Yawmsaub lub tsev,
kws yog lub tsev ntaub hab daim ntaub kws vuv txheej sau, hab cov khawb, cov txag taab, cov laag, cov ncej hab cov taw tag huv taw,
hab lub swb xaab hab cov laag kwv hab lub hau swb xaab roog kev txhum  hab daim ntaub kws thaiv,
hab lub rooj, ob tug laag kwv hab tej pestwj kws swv sau lub rooj, hab cov ncuav kws xyeem txawb rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag,
hab tug kaav teeb kws txawb teeb pum kev, tej pestwj kws swv tu lub teeb, cov teeb hab cov roj saam teeb,
hab lub thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab xyeem hab ob tug laag kwv, hab cov roj tsw qaab swv ua kevcai tsaa, hab cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab, hab daim ntaub kws ua qhov rooj tsev ntaub,
hab lub thaaj hlawv hov txhua chaw xyeem, daim tsuav ntxaij tooj lab, cov laag kwv hab tej pestwj kws swv sau lub thaaj, hab lub phaaj tooj lab hab lub chaw txawb lub phaaj,
hab cov ntaub xov laj kaab, cov ncej, cov taw tag ncej hab daim ntaub ua rooj vaag,
hab cov tswg kws txhus tsaa Yawmsaub lub tsev hab cov tswg kws txhus tuav laj kaab hab cov hlua,

hab tej tsoog meej mom kws ntus tau zoo zoo kws naav rua lub swjhawm moog ua Vaajtswv teg num huv lub chaw dawb huv, yog cev tsoog meej mom dawb huv kws pov thawj Aloo naav hab tej tsoog meej mom kws nwg cov tub naav rua thaus puab ua pov thawj le num.”
Tes cov Yixayee suavdawg txawm rov qaab ntawm Mauxe moog.
Txhua tug kws kub sab hab zoo sab txawm nqaa tej hov txhua chaw tuaj pub rua Yawmsaub swv ua lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab swv ua txhua yaam num rua huv, hab ua tej tsoog meej mom dawb huv.
Cov quaspuj quasyawg txhua tug kws zoo sab pub suavdawg coj tej npauj kub, puj cu, tej nplhaib hab tej paug teg hab tej saw kub tuaj. Txhua tug coj tej kub le nuav tuaj xyeem pub rua Yawmsaub.
Mas txhua tug kws muaj xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab tej xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo, hab plaub tshws hab tawv txwv yaaj kws foo lab lab hab cov tawv ntshuab havtxwv nqaa tuaj pub.
Txhua tug kws muaj nyaj muaj tooj lab kuj coj tuaj pub rua Yawmsaub, hab txhua tug kws muaj ntoo kub twg zoo swv kuj nqaa tuaj pub.
Cov quaspuj suavdawg kws txawj ua maaj ua ntuag kuj coj tej xuv maaj xuv ntuag kws xav hab yimlaaj hab lab hab coj xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo tuaj pub.
Cov quaspuj suavdawg kws zoo sab hab txawj rhau plaub tshws kuj coj xuv tshws tuaj pub.
Cov thawj coj kuj coj tej qai zeb av txho ci laam lug hab tej qai zeb hlaws kws muaj nqes tuaj xaws lu rua lub tsho efauj hab lub awv,
hab coj tej txum lom hab coj roj tuaj yog yuav swv saam teeb hab swv ua cov roj tsw qaab swv ua kevcai tsaa hab swv ua cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab hlawv xyeem.
Cov Yixayee cov quaspuj quasyawg suavdawg kws kub sab pub hov txhua chaw ua txhua yaam num kws Yawmsaub kuas Mauxe has rua puab ua lawd, kuj coj tuaj pub rua Yawmsaub lawv le puab zoo sab hlo pub.
Mauxe has rua cov Yixayee tas, “Saib maj, Yawmsaub tub xaiv Ulis tug tub Npexalee kws yog Hawj tug xeeb ntxwv, yog xeem Yuta,
hab Yawmsaub tub pub Vaaj Ntsuj Plig puv npo rua nwg kuas nwg muaj plaab plaw tswvyim hab txawj ntse paub ua txhua tsaav txhua yaam,
hab txawj sau qauv hab muab nyaj muab kub muab tooj lab lug ua tau txaij nraug quas zeeg,
hab nwg txawj npawm hab txhum tej qai zeb hlaws muab khawm lu rua lub miv taig, txawj sais ntoo txaij zoo nkauj, nwg txawj ua txhua yaam zoo zoo nkauj le.
Yawmsaub kuj pub Npexalee hab Auhaulia kws yog Ahixama tug tub yog xeem Ntaaj ob tug muaj sab qha lwm tug ua tau.

Yawmsaub pub tswvyim peevxwm rua ob tug nuav, ob tug txhad txawj ua tau txhua yaam num kws cov tub txawg nkauj txawg ua. Ob tug txawj sau qauv zoo zoo le, txawj swv xuv xav xuv yimlaaj xuv lab hab xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo ua paaj ntaub, hab ob tug txawj ua txhua tsaav txhua yaam hab txawj xaav sau qauv txaij nraug quas zeeg.

Npexalee hab Auhaulia hab txhua tug muaj peevxwm kws Yawmsaub tub pub plaab plaw tswvyim hab kev txawj kuas ua tau txhua yaam num ua lub chaw pe hawm Yawmsaub mas suavdawg yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le Yawmsaub tub has tseg lawd.”
Mauxe hu Npexalee hab Auhaulia hab suavdawg kws muaj peevxwm ua, kws Yawmsaub tub pub plaab plaw tswvyim rua puab lawd, yog txhua tug kws kub sab ua num kuas tuaj ua num.

Puab txais tej hov txhua chaw ntawm Mauxe txhais teg, yog tej kws cov Yixayee zoo sab coj tuaj pub ua lub chaw pe Yawmsaub lawd. Cov pejxeem kuj naj taagkig coj tej hov txhua chaw kws puab zoo sab pub tuaj pub.
Cov tuabneeg kws txawj ua txhua yaam num huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub txawm tso num tseg,
suavdawg ua ke moog has rua Mauxe tas, “Cov pejxeem coj hov txhua chaw tuaj ntau dhau txhua yaam num kws Yawmsaub kuas peb ua lawm.”
Mauxe txhad tshaaj tawm thoob plhawv zej zog rua suavdawg tas, “Quaspuj quasyawg tsw xob coj hov txhua chaw tuaj pub ua lub chaw pe Yawmsaub lawm.” Mas cov pejxeem txhad tseg tsw coj tuaj pub lawm,
vem cov kws muaj tub txaus ua txhua yaam num hab swv tsw taag.

Cov kws txawj ua mas puab muab kaum chaws ntaub maag ua Yawmsaub lub tsev, yog puab muab cov xuv maaj kws nkoov zoo zoo hab xuv xav xuv yimlaaj hab xuv lab ntus ua, hab cov Kws txawj ntus ntus ua duab Khelunpee  rua huv,
ib chaws ntaub ntev neeg nkaum yim tshwm daav plaub tshwm, txhua chaws ntaub daav ntev ib yaam nkaus.
Nwg muab tswb chaws ntaub xaws ua ke ua ib daig, muab tswb chaws xaws ua ib daig.
Nwg muab cov ntaub xav xaws ua ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ib, hab ua ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ob ib yaam nkaus.
Nwg ua tswb caug lub ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ib, hab ua tswb caug lub ntsej rua daim kws ob, saab npoo kws txuas ua ke kuas sws ncaaj nkaus,
hab nwg muab kub lug ua tswb caug lub khawb lug khawm ob daig ntaub hov kuas ua hlo ib daig ua Yawmsaub lub tsev.
Nwg muab plaub tshws lug ntus ua kaum ib chaws ntaub vuv hlo Yawmsaub lub tsev,
ib chaws ntaub ntev peb caug tshwm daav plaub tshwm, kaum ib chaws ntaub daav ntev ib yaam nkaus.
Nwg muab tswb chaws ntaub xaws ua ke ua ib daig, muab rau chaws xaws ua ib daig.
Nwg ua tswb caug lub ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ib, hab ua tswb caug lub ntsej rua daim ntug ntaub kws ob, saab npoo ntaub kws txuas ua ke.
Nwg muab tooj lab ua tswb caug lub khawb txhad khawm tau ob daig ntaub kuas ua hlo ib daig.
Nwg muab cov tawv txwv yaaj kws foo lab lawd lug ua ntaub vuv lub tsev ntaub hab muab cov tawv ntshuab havtxwv lug ua ntaub vuv txheej sau.
Nwg muab ntoo kub twg lug ua taab tsaa xov Yawmsaub lub tsev.
Cov taab ntawd ntev kaum tshwm daav ib tshwm txhais.
Ib daim txag taab mas nwg qhais ua ob tug taw txhad txuas tau ua ke. Nwg ua txhua daim txag taab le nuav coj lug ua Yawmsaub lub tsev.
Nwg ua neeg nkaum daim txag taab xov Yawmsaub lub tsev saab nraag,
hab muab nyaj ua plaub caug tug taw tag neeg nkaum daim txag taab le taw, ib daim txag taab ntxwg rua ob tug taw.
Nwg ua neeg nkaum daim txag taab xov Yawmsaub lub tsev saab peg,
hab ua plaub caug tug taw nyaj tag huv taw, ib daim txag taab ntxwg rua ob tug taw tag.
Nwg ua rau daim txag taab xov Yawmsaub lub tsev saab qaum tsev kws nub poob.
Nwg ua ob daim txag taab xov ob lub kaum tsev ntaub kws yog saab qaum tsev.
